Before Patch 5, good-aligned players had to rely on workarounds to recruit Minthara. It was briefly possible to recruit Halsin and Minthara together, but this was later patched out. Players quickly resorted to using mods, or an extraordinarily technical loophole that involved using Polymorph to transform her into a sheep.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 How To Solve The Necrotic Laboratory Puzzle
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA projected mind in the Necrotic Laboratory area of Baldur’s Gate 3 creates a fragmented puzzle that you must solve to open a path leading forward. Once you reach the Necrotic Laboratory in Act 2, you can see the splintered mind over a large red chasm next to a command console. Interacting with the console lets you manipulate the mind by creating a neural network across a series of multicolored nodes.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 How to Solve The Rune Puzzle In Nettie s Library
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Emerald Grove in Baldur’s Gate 3 has a secret puzzle involving runes that you can solve in Nettie’s Library to earn two rare rewards during Act 1. Your party can reach Emerald Grove after you defeat a group of goblins attacking the gate leading into the sanctuary near the Nautiloid crash. The uneasy alliance held by Tiefling refugees and the druids of the Grove makes up a good portion of the early story in Baldur’s Gate 3.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 Is About To Prevent You From Save Scumming
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA seemingly leaked achievement for Baldur’s Gate 3 suggests a new difficulty mode is coming to the game. Larian Studios will seemingly be adding Honour mode, which originates from the developer’s previous Divinity: Original Sin CRPGs. Honour mode limits the number of save files that can be kept, and also has sever consequences for a total party kill. Literature ReviewSave scumming has been a critical tool for many Baldur’s Gate 3 campaigns, but a new addition to the game could shake things up in a major way.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 Just Got 50x Closer To The True D&D Experience
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 is limited to only 11 playable races, far fewer than are in Dungeons & Dragons 5e. A mod addresses this, adding over 50 new playable races to BG3. The mod adds many races from 5e, but also from other games and popular homebrew settings. Literature ReviewBeing able to choose from dozens of different races and lineages is part of what makes D&D so fun, and this mod gives Baldur’s Gate over 50 new ones.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 Just Made One Major Choice Way Less Appealing
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPatch 5 for Baldur’s Gate 3 introduces a new epilogue, which offers more closure for Lae’zel. Lae’zel’s hidden epilogue is tied to the githyanki egg quest, and is easily missed because of certain choices provided to the player through dialog. Lae’zel’s journey in Baldur’s Gate 3 is difficult but transformative, and she deserves the happy ending provided by this epilogue after facing uncomfortable truths throughout the game. Literature ReviewPatch 5 added a secret epilogue for Lae’zel among its many changes, and it makes a major choice at the end of Act 1 worth skipping completely.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 Lore Hides One Disturbing Truth About A Grotesque Character
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 is a masterwork of environmental storytelling, with hidden details and Easter eggs throughout the game. In Auntie Ethel’s Putrid Bog, a bloodied camp reveals a grim secret: a child’s teddy bear with a muddy note inside. This has implications toward Auntie Ethel’s motives, highlighting her mounting desperation and sinister nature. Literature ReviewThe tiniest Baldur’s Gate 3 detail hides a dark secret about a diabolical villain’s terrible plot.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 Pros & Cons Of Romancing Lae zel In BG3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRomancing Lae’zel in Baldur’s Gate 3 requires dedication and patience, but it leads to one of the most rewarding character arcs in the game. Lae’zel prefers directness and violence, appreciating decisions that demonstrate intimidation or dominance, making her a unique romance option. Pursuing a relationship with Lae’zel means being unable to romance other Origin characters, like Shadowheart. Literature ReviewMaintaining a true emotional connection with the githyanki warrior might be harder than one would think, but the payoff is totally worth it.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 Race Politics Explained (In-Depth)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe race of characters in Baldur’s Gate 3 affects many different situation and interactions. Despite this, BG3 rarely gets in-depth with the Forgotten Realms’ lore, which is instead expounded upon in a number of Dungeons & Dragons sourcebooks. The long histories of the drow and githyanki races, for instance, are alluded to in BG3, but it’s never fully explained why most other races hate or fear them. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 features a fraction of races seen in the Forgotten Realms, but it doesn’t fully explain the dynamics and nuances between them.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 s Best Companion Isn t A Companion At All
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 is full of memorable companions, but Scratch is one of the best, despite not being a companion in the traditional sense. While Scratch may not have a rich story or engaging banter like other party members, he is low maintenance and worth having around for his genuinely helpful abilities. It’s easy to forget about summoning Scratch amid the chaos of managing a party, but he should not be overlooked as he can provide valuable support and add an enjoyable element to the game.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 s Creepiest Boss Is A Mini Version Of An Even More Terrifying Creature
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 features intimidating bosses, including the creepy Spectator, which resembles the iconic Beholder from D&D. The Spectator in Baldur’s Gate 3 has powerful eye rays that can disable opponents, although it is weaker than a Beholder. Beholders, along with other iconic creatures like orcs and wyverns, did not make it into Baldur’s Gate 3, but the game still offers a variety of challenging enemies. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 doesn’t tend to hold back from grisly foes, but one of D&D’s most fearsome enemies didn’t manage to make the cut in its full form.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 s New Game Mode Cuts Save Scumming For A Huge Reward
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPatch 5 of Baldur’s Gate 3 introduces new game modes, including Honour Mode, which increases the challenge by disabling save scumming. Players who can beat the game in Honour Mode will earn the Golden D20 award. Patch 5 also includes an improved inventory system that allows players to manage their companions’ inventories with a single UI, even when they are not in the active party. Performance improvements from the Xbox version are also integrated into this patch.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 s Strangest And Most Intimidating Enemy Actually Has A Deeper Lore
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 can be enjoyed without prior D&D knowledge, but some context may be missing for those unfamiliar with the Forgotten Realms. The game provides information about enemies like the illithid, but there is a lot more to know about their society and the world of the Forgotten Realms. The Netherbrain, the game’s antagonist, is unique among illithid elder brains, created out of circumstances directly related to BG3, not D&D at large.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 s Tav Is Actually The Most Powerful Spellcaster In Faerûn
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe protagonist in Baldur’s Gate 3 can out-magic even the most advanced spellcasters due to the player’s ability to save scum. Save scumming in Baldur’s Gate 3 mimics the effects of chronomancy, a school of magic not seen in Dungeons & Dragons since its second edition. The prevalence of save scumming in BG3 suggests that players enjoy the idea of turning back the clock, making a case for the reintroduction of chronomancy in official DnD material.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 Scenes Deemed Too Risque For Japan
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 will be released in Japan by Spike Chunsoft, but the Japanese version will have censorship, removing explicit content. Spike Chunsoft is known for handling localized versions of major western games, and they have experience in navigating the Japanese rating system’s restrictions. The censorship in the Japanese version of Baldur’s Gate 3 is in accordance with the Code of Ethics from the Japanese rating board CERO, and it is not surprising considering previous games that have undergone similar changes.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 Wins Game Of The Year At TGA 2023
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 wins the Game of the Year (GOTY) award at The Game Awards 2023. The competition for the GOTY award was tough, with strong nominations such as Alan Wake 2 and The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom. Baldur’s Gate 3 stands out due to its branching narrative, freedom of choice, and immersive gameplay, earning its recognition as the best game of the year. Literature ReviewThe winner of Game of the Year award at TGA 2023 (The Game Awards) has finally been revealed and it comes as no surprise considering its merits.

item.title: Baldur s Gate 3 You Shouldn t Skip The Githyanki Crèche Questline
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 offers multiple questlines to remove the mind flayer tadpole from the party members’ brains, including side and companion questlines. Players should prioritize completing the Githyanki Crèche questline in Act 1, as it provides important information and tough enemies. Engaging in Lae’zel’s companion quest can increase approval with her and help in choosing her as a romance option, but it may impact approval with other party members.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 10 Best Class & Background Combinations
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBy choosing the right mix of class and backgrounds in Baldur’s Gate 3 players will be able to make roleplay and earning inspiration a breeze. Backgrounds in Baldur’s Gate 3 serve two main gameplay functions, as well as aiding in roleplay choices throughout the game. When creating a character, the chosen background will determine what skill proficiencies they have as well as what inspires them. Earning inspiration in Baldur’s Gate 3 allows skill checks to be rerolled and can make all the difference during difficult moments in the story.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 10 Character Creation Mods For Making Your Perfect Tav
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDespite Baldur’s Gate 3 impressing in nearly every other respect, its character creation options are surprisingly limited. Without sliders or any other means to alter individual characteristics, BG3 Tavs and Dark Urges must be made by utilizing a series of preset options. Modders have taken up the slack, introducing new face options, hairstyles, eye colors, and more. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 feels lackluster in terms of character creation options. Luckily, mods can add choices that help you design your perfect Tav.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 10 Most Underwhelming Spells (& How They Can Be Fixed)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 includes a wide variety of spells from DnD fifth edition, with new spells that can be unlocked through quests and items. Some spells in the game, such as blade ward and poison spray, are underwhelming due to their short duration, inefficiency, or limited usefulness against certain enemies. Balance changes would make the spells more competitive in the game. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 has many powerful spells to choose from, but a few are vastly underpowered and need to be buffed.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 7 Dark Urge Builds Perfect For Roleplay
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Dark Urge Origin character in Baldur’s Gate 3 offers more freedom in terms of race and class selection, but still maintains an intriguing fixed backstory. Selecting the Dark Urge during character creation lets players create a custom character of any class. Some class and subclass combinations work especially well for Dark Urge playthroughs, though, fitting nicely with the character’s backstory. Literature ReviewThe Dark Urge Origin in Baldur’s Gate 3 has an intriguing but bloody backstory.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Act 1 Checklist (Everything You Dont Want To Miss)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAct 1 of Baldur’s Gate 3 has much to see, like recruitable characters, hidden bosses, and other secrets that might require a checklist. Many quests and choices have multiple outcomes. Baldur’s Gate 3 is specifically designed to be played through multiple times, making alternate story decisions in Act 1. This list is optimized to see the most, typically making strictly morally good and orderly selections. But, a more chaotic playstyle will close off some of this route.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 All Dribbles Clown Body Part Locations
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn Baldur’s Gate 3, players can search for the body parts of Dribbles the Clown. Seven body parts can be found all across Baldur’s Gate and Rivington. To start the quest to find Dribbles, visit the Circus of the Last Days in Rivington. The dimension-hopping Circus is visiting the Sword Coast, and there are many opportunities for the party to have fun. Players can trick a Djinni out of his jackpot, obtain a love reading for their chosen partner, and even commission a nude statue of themselves for camp.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 All Dribbles The Clown Body Part Locations
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn Baldur’s Gate 3, players can search for the body parts of Dribbles the Clown. Seven body parts can be found all across Baldur’s Gate and Rivington. To start the quest to find Dribbles, visit the Circus of the Last Days in Rivington. The dimension-hopping Circus is visiting the Sword Coast, and there are many opportunities for the party to have fun. Players can trick a Djinni out of his jackpot, obtain a love reading for their chosen partner, and even commission a nude statue of themselves for camp.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Best Barbarian Multiclass Build
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA multiclassed Barbarian is more than just a damage dealer in Baldur’s Gate 3. They move quickly and are even harder to kill. This Barbarian build can be used on any character. Karlach is the best option, as she already begins in the Barbarian class. But you can also make the main character a second Barbarian or speak to Withers to change classes in BG3. How To Multiclass a Barbarian in Baldur’s Gate 3

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Eldritch Knight Character Build (Tips, Tricks, & Strategies)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewEldritch Knights are a cunning class option in Baldur’s Gate 3. They can fight up close, dish out spells at range, or keep themselves well protected. Githyanki companion Lae’zel is already a Fighter and joins earlier enough to build her into a great Eldritch Knight. However, you may also want to use this build on other characters. This can even include training hirelings you have recruited from Withers.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Every Adamantine Forge Item (& How to Get Them)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Adamantine Forge provides some of the best pieces of equipment in Act 1 of Baldur’s Gate 3. Here’s how to unlock each of the weapons and armor. Once you have beat Grym in Baldur’s Gate 3, you will have unlocked access to the Adamantine Forge, a special location allowing you to forge limited items. The Adamantine Forge items are rare pieces of gear that can offer a significant bump to builds and are some of the best equipment you can obtain early in the game.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Every Cleric Subclass (Domain), Ranked Worst to Best
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYClerics in Baldur’s Gate 3 are versatile support classes, typically used to provide healing and buffs. Clerics have seven subclasses, known as domains, to choose from. Each cleric domain specializes in a different role, with some focusing solely on healing, while others excel in buffing party members or even dealing damage. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 has seven cleric subclasses, with each offering a different take on the traditional healer role in RPGs for players to choose from.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Every Secret Merchant Location
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are a lot of merchants in Baldur’s Gate 3, but some exceptional merchants are harder to find due to certain quests and unmet requirements. Warning: The following article contains spoilers for Baldur’s Gate 3. Each secret merchant falls into one of three categories; you either need to complete a special task to unlock their full list of wares, properly interact with them to unlock their wares or follow a certain story path to properly meet them.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Everyone That Can Join The Camp
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn Baldur’s Gate 3, 25 characters can join your Camp, allowing you to share meals, stories and moments with your companions throughout the story. You’ll return to camp to take Long Rests, which allows you to restore your party’s health and Spell Slots in preparation for more adventure. There’s also a social element to Rests, as you can also chat with your friends, experience unique story moments, and progress your romances.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Gets Surprise Xbox Release At The Game Awards
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe highly anticipated Xbox Series X/S port of Baldur’s Gate 3 has finally been released, ending a four-month wait for Xbox users. The Xbox release was delayed due to issues bringing the game to the Series S, but the requirement for feature parity between Series X and Series S versions has been waived. The game has received numerous patches to fix bugs and add content, resulting in a more polished experience for Xbox players.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 How To Complete House Of Hope (Walkthrough)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe House of Hope is the location of the devil Raphael in Baldur’s Gate 3, serving as a mansion-like dungeon in Avernus with many secrets to discover. The House of Hope can be reached by performing the Helsik Ritual in Baldur’s Gate 3. One of the best things to do in Act 3 is to visit the NPC Helisk in the Devil’s Fee shop, where you can buy the right items needed for the Ritual for around 20,000 Gold.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Is Almost Completely Missing Everyones Favorite Part Of D&D
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 replicates the thrill of DnD skill checks with visible dice rolls, sacrificing efficiency and immersion for the sake of replicating the tabletop game. The limited dice color options in Baldur’s Gate 3 are disappointing considering the popularity of unique designs with DnD players. While more dice options may come in the future, players can currently turn to mods for custom designs, showing the community’s love for dice.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Lets You Manipulate Astarion For A Really Powerful Potion
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA Baldur’s Gate 3 interaction offers a very powerful potion, but getting it involves taking advantage of Astarion. A character named Araj in Moonrise Towers offers a Potion of Everlasting Vigor in exchange for Astarion drinking her blood. Forcing Astarion to drink Araj’s blood will cause him to end any romance he may have with the player character, unless they manipulate Astarion further. Literature ReviewOne choice in Baldur’s Gate 3 seems like a cruel approach to companionship, but it’s the only way to get maximal benefits from a unique situation.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Players Are Still Missing Out On A Key Area
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 offers choices that impact the narrative, but some players are missing out on a crucial area that affects a key companion’s personal quest. Both the Underdark and the Mountain Pass can be visited in the game, but many players are unaware of this and are choosing one over the other based on gameplay difficulty instead of narrative reasons. The Mountain Pass is crucial for Lae’zel’s personal quest, as it is the home of the githyanki crèche where she believes she can find a cure for the mind flayer parasite.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 What Happens If You Give Araj Oblodra Your Blood
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAraj Oblodra in Baldur’s Gate 3 offers unique potions in exchange for a vial of True Soul blood. The potions offered by Araj are dependent on the player character’s race, are stackable, and can be useful in certain situations. Astarion has a separate deal with Araj where she offers a powerful potion in exchange for him biting her, but forcefully making him do so can have negative consequences. Literature ReviewThe mysterious drow alchemist Araj Oblodra has an interesting offer for the party when they meet her in Baldur’s Gate 3, but is it worth it?

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3 Where To Use Strange Flower Key
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAfter defeating enemies below the Open Hand Temple in Baldur’s Gate 3, you’ll find a Strange Flower Key that you may use to reveal a sinister plot. To use the Flowery Key, you need to head to Fraygo’s Flophouse, a bunkhouse and hostel on Wyrm’s Crossing. However, before leaving the Open Hand Temple, make sure to investigate the crime scene a bit more closely. If you’ve learned to Speak With the Dead, you can obtain extra information from the killers themselves.

item.title: Baldurs Gate 3s Gale Might Be A Rare Type Of Spellcaster
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGale’s stories about his magical abilities don’t add up, suggesting that he might be a rare sorcerer instead of a wizard. There are inconsistencies between how wizards typically gain their magic in Dungeons & Dragons and Gale’s claims about his magic. There is evidence that Gale was unusually powerful even before the events of Baldur’s Gate 3, possibly rivaling Elminster, and Mystra showed interest in him due to his extraordinary abilities.

item.title: Below Deck Alum Kate Chastain Is Returning To The Traitors Season 2 For A Second Chance At The Prize
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBelow Deck star Kate Chastain will be returning to The Traitors US for a second time, surprising fans and herself. Kate’s episodes of The Traitors US will start on January 25, and she will be on high alert after being deceived in the previous season. There is speculation that Kate may not last long in the game as the new players may view her as a potential traitor. Her time on the show will be memorable regardless.

item.title: Below Deck Med Tumis Stress Is At All-Time High As Charter Season Finally Comes To An End
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBelow Deck Mediterranean season 8 had the most dramatic twists and turns in the franchise’s history, surpassing previous seasons. Tumi, the chief stew, is under immense pressure in the season 8 finale as she has to organize difficult activities for demanding guests. Tumi’s controversial and unprofessional actions have made her a controversial figure, but she still has a chance to redeem herself with viewers by executing the final charter perfectly.

item.title: Below Deck Season 11 News, Release Date, Cast, & Everything We Know
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBelow Deck season 11 is set to premiere on February 5, 2024, on Bravo, with a new captain and an exciting cast. Captain Lee, a mainstay of the show, may be retiring from the series after a long career at sea, with Captain Kerry filling his shoes. The trailer for Below Deck season 11 promises drama and changes, as the new captain takes charge and tries to navigate the wild crew.

item.title: Best Bars In Cyberpunk 2077, Ranked By Vibes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCyberpunk 2077 offers a variety of bars and clubs for players to enjoy, each with its own unique atmosphere and vibe. These establishments provide a break from the game’s dystopian world and allow players to fully immerse themselves in the roleplaying experience. The bars and clubs also play a role in quests and missions, adding depth and relevance to the game’s storyline. Literature ReviewHanging out in a bar in Cyberpunk 2077, getting a drink and listening to the conversations, or chatting with the bartender can be an immersive treat.

item.title: Best BG3 Wizard Multiclass Build To Become An Arcane Master
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo create an unbeatable spellcaster in Baldur’s Gate 3, Wizard players can multiclass into Sorcerer to enhance their spells with Sorcerer Metamagic. Wizards in Baldur’s Gate 3 wield spells and can add new magic from scrolls to their spellbooks. This ability is one of the most powerful class features in the game, giving your character access to an expanded knowledge base of spells. You can maximize your Wizard’s casting power by multiclassing into Sorcerer, the game’s other major spellcaster class, to take advantage of Metamagic.

item.title: Best Fall Crops To Grow In Stardew Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFall in one season in Stardew Valley that players will want to maximize their profit. Some of the best crops can be grown this time of year. You can grow a total of 14 different crops in Fall, and it’s important that you start planning out your Fall season before Summer ends. Some of the best crops for the season are highly profitable but take weeks to grow.

item.title: Best Gaming Interviews of 2023
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY2023 provided insight into the personalities and contributors in the gaming industry through interviews with game directors and actors. Neil Newbon, the voice behind Astarion in Baldur’s Gate 3, described the project as an extraordinary experience filled with love, support, and genuine friendships. Producer Zhenyu Li discussed the freedom his team had during the development of Zenless Zone Zero and emphasized the importance of producing a great and refined product.

item.title: Best Heavy Build For The Finals (Weapons, Specializations & Gadgets)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Heavy is the most devastating class in The Finals. But, it is slow and easy to hit. This means you want to secure areas to be ready for the enemy. Due to the lack of mobility, Heavy characters rely more on team composition. You will want to create opportunities for Light builds in The Finals to ambush and flank. You will also want to stick close to Medium-class players who offer support and protection.

item.title: Best Landing Spots in Fortnite Chapter 4 Season OG
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFortnite Chapter 4 Season OG brings players back to the original island. Classic locations and landmarks are among this season’s best landing spots. Fortnite’s return to Chapter 1 is out now, and you can experience this blast from the past until December 2nd. The island map will still change every week, as Epic moves the Fortnite island map forward through time. Classic Points of Interest will reappear, and legacy items will be unvaulted.

item.title: Best Light Build For The Finals (Weapons, Specializations & Gadgets)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Light class is the fastest option in The Finals. A good build can sneak in, kill several targets, and get out without being attacked back. While there are recommended builds, there is no overall best. You want to adjust your build to counter-pick enemy teams or even single troublesome players. The Finals released suddenly during The Game Awards 2023, so the player base is still experimenting with the gameplay meta.

item.title: Best Medium Build For The Finals (Weapons, Specializations & Gadgets)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Medium fits well on any team in The Finals. It is versatile and leans towards support, but can still contribute good damage with a good build. The Medium class is the glue that will hold the rest of the team together. You often want to be close to at least one of your allies. If you instead feel like roaming the map solo, a stealthy Light class build would be a better fit.

item.title: Best Melee Weapons In Starfield (& How To Get Them)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewStarfield offers a limited selection of melee weapons, but some prove highly effective in combat, allowing for some of the best roleplay experiences. You’ll immediately notice that melee weapons are simple but effective tools that complement an aggressive or stealth-driven playstyle. These tools never use ammo, have to be reloaded, or need to be repaired in any way. The most powerful weapons in Starfield are the ones that offer a great amount of lethal force for little to no risk in battles against the many different enemies you might face in your travels.

item.title: Beyond Good And Evil 20th Anniversary Edition Release Window, Changes, & New Additions
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBeyond Good & Evil - 20th Anniversary Edition is set to release in early 2024 to celebrate the game’s milestone birthday, offering improved graphics, resolution, and performance. The remaster will include quality-of-life improvements such as reworked controls and autosave features, as well as content additions like a new treasure hunt and speedrun mode. While the full platform options haven’t been confirmed, the game will be available on Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S, and it is likely to release on other majormodern systems as well.

item.title: BG3 Is Hiding The Creepy Lore Of One Early-Game Race
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 touches on violent and tragic associations of DnD races, but some fantasy races, like gnolls, are left unexplored in terms of their creepy lore. The story of Yeenoghu, the god of gnolls, could have added more intrigue and peril to Act 1 of Baldur’s Gate 3, as it aligns thematically with the game’s exploration of loyalty and agency. The gnoll encounter in Baldur’s Gate 3 represents a significant difficulty spike and could benefit from more build-up and exploration through a quest line to enhance the player experience.

item.title: BG3 Is Setting New Standards For Game Updates (& Starfield Should Take Note)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 sets a high standard for post-launch support, with major patches addressing a wide range of issues and introducing requested features and improvements. Starfield, on the other hand, has received limited post-launch support, with relatively few updates only addressing the most basic issues. Starfield has received greater post-launch support through the modding community, even before official mod tools have been made available by Bethesda. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 didn’t stop at raising the bar after launch, and the updates it’s received show just how much better games like Starfield could be.

item.title: BG3 One Act 1 Decision Is The Most Disturbing Way To Deal With Emerald Grove
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe first act of Baldur’s Gate 3 revolves in part around the Emerald Grove, where a group of druids is poised to massacre tiefling refugees. One route through the conflict will result in maximum bloodshed, essentially leaving the grove unoccupied. This route is arguably more evil than simply siding with Minthara and letting the goblins destroy the grove. Literature ReviewIt’s easy for the Emerald Grove situation in Baldur’s Gate 3 to end in violence, but one specific method has the most horrific results.

item.title: BG3 s Follow-Up Already Sounds Too Good To Be True
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 has impressed players with its wide variety of character choices, deep customization, and intricate mechanics. Larian’s CEO Swen Vincke has promised to “push boundaries” with the next big game, but it is too early to know what it will be or if it will live up to expectations. The next game could be another Baldur’s Gate, another Divinity, or something else entirely. Literature ReviewLarian has promised big things after Baldur’s Gate 3, but is it too early to make that kind of guarantee?

item.title: BitLife How to Become a Fashion Designer
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBecoming a Fashion Designer is one of the most desirable occupations in Bitlife, but as with all other careers, you’ll have to work hard to get it. Fortunately, unlike becoming an Astronaut in BitLife, you do not need to purchase any extra packs to pursue this career. Furthermore, you don’t have to go as far as getting a STEM degree, either. Therefore, becoming a Graphic Designer is a bit easier than some other game careers.

item.title: BitLife How To Become an Astronaut
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBecoming an Astronaut in BitLife can take a lot of effort, since this career can only be achieved by following a specific path with your character. You need to buy the Astronaut Special Career Pack for BitLife before considering pursuing this profession. While this does come free with the Boss Mode attachment to the game, those who don’t have this addition will have to buy it as an extra feature.

item.title: BitLife How To Get a STEM Degree
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewGetting a STEM degree in BitLife is not as easy as players are required to attend a University and study majors like Engineering or Mathematics. Getting a STEM degree in BitLife works very similar to real life. You will be required to be an expert in subjects like Chemistry, Physics amongst others. To get a degree in one of the fields of study, you will need to apply to a University, and once you are accepted, you will have a choice to select a subject.

item.title: BitLife How to Get The High Roller Ribbon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe High Roller Ribbon is one of the most difficult end-of-life achievements to earn in Bitlife, and earning it will require no shortage of luck. Unfortunately, finishing your life with the High Roller Ribbon is more difficult than obtaining the hardest of careers in BitLife, like how to become an Astronaut. This is because you must amass a large sum of money throughout your life by wagering, and let’s just say the house isn’t always on your side.

item.title: BlizzCon 2023 Diablo 4 Interview Joe Piepiora And Tiffany Wat
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTwo of the biggest names behind Diablo 4 discuss what is coming up with the Vessel of Hatred expansion, Abattoir of Zir, Midwinter Blight, & Season 3. In between the opening event and Campfire Chat, two of the lead developers sat down to talk a little with Screen Rant regarding what is coming in Diablo 4’s future. Production Director, Tiffany Wat, and Associate Game Director, Joe Piepiora were gracious enough to discuss some of the hot topics, such as the upcoming Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred expansion and content that is just around the corner for Season 2 and the holiday Midwinter Blight.

item.title: BlizzCon 2023 World of Warcraft Interview Linny Cooke Saverline & Timothy Jones
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe development of WoW Classic has been shaped by community feedback, with the team aiming to recreate nostalgic moments while incorporating quality-of-life improvements. There is potential for Classic to “catch up” to modern WoW, but the team will evaluate what players want on a case-by-case basis. The Season of Discovery introduces level bands and phased content, allowing the team to build upon the existing world and create new experiences for players while maintaining the nostalgic feel of Classic.

item.title: BlizzCon 2023 World of Warcraft Interview Maria Hamilton & Kristy Moret
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe WorldSoul Saga, a series of expansions in World of Warcraft, will have a faster content rollout than previous expansions, with more parallel work and multiple teams working on different expansions simultaneously. The WorldSoul Saga will offer a cohesive narrative across the expansions but will also have independent and exciting standalone stories in each expansion’s zones, quests, and world-building. The Early Access period for The War Within expansion will not provide access to max-level content, such as Mythic raiding or dungeons, to ensure a leisurely start to the campaign and prevent players from feeling pressured to join Early Access.

item.title: BlizzCon 2023 World of Warcraft Interview Principal Designer Eric Holmberg-Weidler
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewUpcoming World of Warcraft arc The WorldSoul Saga features the highly-anticipated Warbands system; we speak to its designer, Eric Holmberg-Weidler. Principal Game Designer Eric Holmberg-Weidler was in attendance, and is himself a relatively recent recruit at the house Blizzard built. His work on World of Warcraft began at the tail end of Shadowlands and into Dragonflight, which featured numerous significant upgrades - including its titular flying dragon mounts - which brought new attention to the formative MMO, as well as some much-requested updates that improved the systems in the game.

item.title: BOTW & TOTK Forgot An Important Piece Of Zelda Lore
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBreath of the Wild and Tears of the Kingdom celebrate the franchise’s history, but ignore the important Golden Goddesses and their role in creating Hyrule and the Triforce. Hylia has become the primary deity in Hyrule, with statues and worship, while the Golden Goddesses are largely forgotten. The absence of the Golden Goddesses could be temporary, and future Zelda games may explore their mythology and bring them back into prominence.

item.title: Breath Of The Wild Explains Why Link Never Talks
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild provides an answer to why Link is a silent protagonist. Aside from certain interjections, Link has never been fully voiced throughout the entirety of the Zelda series. BOTW explains why its Link is so quiet, but it also highlights a fallacy in perceiving Link as a true silent protagonist. Literature ReviewBOTW gives a narrative justification for why Link is always silent, but it also feeds into a misconception about The Legend of Zelda’s protagonist.

item.title: Breath Of The Wild s Two Endings Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe true ending of The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild can be unlocked by finding all of Link’s forgotten memories before defeating Calamity Ganon. The difference between the two endings is minimal, with the true ending simply providing an extra cutscene and wrapping up the story more neatly. The true ending leads seamlessly into the sequel, Tears of the Kingdom, as it connects to a memory where Link returns the Master Sword to its pedestal in Korok Forest.

item.title: Bully 2 Still Needs To Happen, But Not As A GTA 6 Clone
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBully 2 should move away from the concept of “Grand Theft Auto in school” and instead mimic the fresh and unique setting of Red Dead Redemption games. A one-room schoolhouse in an old west setting could allow Bully 2 to focus on a core group of characters, building relationships and exploring the impact of the protagonist’s actions on NPCs. Bully 2 would offer a new take on the American west, allowing Rockstar to explore subversions and satirical criticisms within the tropes of the genre, while maintaining authenticity and avoiding glorification.

item.title: Buying GTA 5 s $150m Golf Club Is Actually Easier Than You Thought
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn Grand Theft Auto V, players can set out to purchase businesses such as the Los Santos Golf Club to make a passive income for them. Making money in Grand Theft Auto V can be a challenge, but there are numerous ways to do so. One of the ways to do this is to acquire a business that can make money in the background while the player does other things.

item.title: Call Of Duty Isn t The Best-Selling Game Of The Year, Breaking A 5-Year Tradition
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAfter five years of dominance, Call of Duty has been dethroned as the best-selling game in the United States. This is only the third time since 2009 that a game other than Call of Duty has claimed the top spot. Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 still managed to be the year’s second best-selling game, topped only by Hogwarts Legacy. Literature ReviewFor only the third time since 2009 Call of Duty has failed to be the best-selling game in the US, but the bestseller isn’t much of a surprise.

item.title: Call of Duty Modern Warfare 3 Interview Composer Walter Mair On Scoring The Iconic Series
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCall of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 celebrates the franchise’s 20th anniversary with sandbox-style gameplay and revitalized classic maps from its predecessor. The game features an immersive and dynamic score that interacts with player actions, thanks to the collaboration between composer Walter Mair and the audio team. The development timeline for Modern Warfare 3 was quick, but with the support of resources and a well-organized team, Mair was able to create a unique and memorable musical experience for the game.

item.title: Canceled Rockstar Games & Projects Youll Probably Never Get To Play
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRockstar Games focused primarily on releasing GTA and Red Dead titles since 2013, leaving other IPs like Bully and Agent abandoned or canceled. The highly-requested sequel to Bully, called Bully 2, was in development but seemingly ended between 2010 and 2013 due to developers being pulled off the project. Rockstar Games canceled many other projects including a zombie survival game called Z, a spiritual sequel to The Warriors called We Are The Mods, and a Spec Ops title developed by Rockstar Vancouver.

item.title: Changing This Starfield Weapon Feature Would Make The Game A Lot More Fun
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWhile Starfield has a number of different weapons to use, its entire melee class is underwhelming. Melee weapons lack variety, with very little difference in animations, no difference in reach, and more. There are a number of ways Starfield’s melee weapons can be improved without completely overhauling the game. Literature ReviewWhile Starfield lets players access a wide variety of weapons, a change to the weapons of one particular play style could make it more fun to use.

item.title: Cheating On Your Partner Is Now Totally Fine In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA fan-created mod for Baldur’s Gate 3 allows players to engage in polyamory. While the mod opens up new romance possibilities, it is prone to limitations and bugs. Multiple playthroughs are still recommended to fully explore the romance options in Baldur’s Gate 3. Literature ReviewPlayers can now engage in multiple romances at once when playing Baldur’s Gate 3, but they should be somewhat careful of the consequences. Players can now romance multiple partners in Baldur’s Gate 3 if they use a special polyamory mod created by a fan.

item.title: Cities Skylines 2 DLC Delay Is The Best News For Players
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCities: Skylines 2 launched with numerous bugs and issues, prompting the developers to prioritize patches and fixes. The previously announced DLC roadmap for the game has been delayed to ensure the game reaches a satisfactory level before additional content is released. The developers are focused on improving performance, addressing bugs, and providing editor/modding support, with longer-term patches and fixes taking priority over quick fixes. Literature ReviewMany DLC packs that had been announced as coming to Cities: Skylines 2 in the next year are now being delayed, but that is good news for the game.

item.title: Cities Skylines 2 Tax Rate Guide
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTaxes may be driving your city into debt in Cities: Skylines 2, but when managed properly, they can be one of your most profitable revenue sources. Every mayor is looking to make money fast, and an excellent way to accomplish this is by learning how to export water and electricity. However, that alone won’t keep you afloat. As a result, you must properly manage your taxes to prevent your city from going under.

item.title: Claim This Epic Games Store Free Mystery Game For December 29
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEpic Games Store is giving away Snakebird Complete as its mystery game for December 29. Snakebird Complete compiles two games, Snakebird and Snakebird Primer, and features adorable hybrid snake-bird creatures navigating through puzzles. The Epic Games Store daily holiday giveaways will continue until January 4, with a total of 16 free games available. Literature ReviewThe Epic Games Store is continuing its holiday celebration with yet another free game giveaway on December 29, this time a charming puzzler.

item.title: Claim This Epic Games Store Free Mystery Game For January 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Epic Games Store is giving away 20 Minutes Till Dawn, a roguelike shooter game as part of its holiday celebration on January 2, 2024. The game will be completely free until January 3, 2024, when another free game will become available instead. Once players have claimed the free game, it is theirs to keep even after the giveaway has ended. Literature ReviewThe Epic Games Store is continuing its holiday celebration with yet another free game giveaway on January 2, this time a roguelite shoot ’em up.

item.title: Claim This Epic Games Store Free Mystery Game For January 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA Plague Tale: Innocence is the daily free game offered by the Epic Games Store for January 3, 2024. The game centers around the story of two siblings escaping persecution during the French Inquisition and the Black Death pandemic. This offer is part of the Epic Games Store’s daily giveaways, with A Plague Tale: Innocence being the second-to-last game before the return of weekly giveaways on January 4. Literature ReviewThe Epic Games Store is continuing its holiday celebration with yet another free game giveaway on January 3, this time a stealth action adventure.

item.title: Claiming Rewards In Genshin Impact Is About To Get A Whole Lot Easier
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGenshin Impact 4.3 leaks reveal long-awaited quality-of-life updates. These additions will allegedly make claiming rewards and leveling characters easier. Quality-of-life updates have been as important as new content in Genshin Impact. Literature ReviewAlthough new characters and events are the highlights of each version, Genshin Impact 4.3 may add some long-awaited quality-of-life updates. A set of new Genshin Impact 4.3 leaks has been shared, revealing that a few long-awaited quality-of-life updates are finally being added to the game, which may make claiming rewards a whole lot easier.

item.title: Clever Baldur s Gate 3 Players Managed To Kill Unkillable Characters
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 offers enormous freedom to kill anyone, but some characters are meant to be invincible due to their power or storyline significance. Players have discovered a trick using illithid powers to kill certain supposedly invincible characters, but it doesn’t have much impact on the game’s story or consequences. The developers have been patching the game to fix such exploits, so players interested in trying this trick should do so soon.

item.title: Clever Skyrim Choices Let You Live Alone In Jorrvaskr Without Any Violence
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Jorrvaskr mead hall in Whiterun can be cleared out without violence, allowing players to become the sole owner and lord of the hall. To achieve this, there are a few steps and decisions that need to be made. Requirements for this to happen tie into the main quests in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. Literature ReviewThere’s a ton one can do in Skyrim, but one very smart set of choices lets them live in the lap of luxury in Skyrim’s most famous town.

item.title: Composer Walter Mair Details His Unique Writing Process On Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCall of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 was developed in half the usual development time, pushing everyone involved to create a massive game release. Despite the time crunch, the shortened schedule allowed for creative exploration and the creation of unique sounds and themes for the game. The studio had faith in composer Walter Mair’s ability to deliver a top-notch score, allowing him the freedom to experiment and create memorable melodies.

item.title: Cookie Clicker Every Shadow Achievement (& How to Get Them)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are a total of 16 shadow achievements for Cookie Clicker on Steam. These are more difficult to unlock than the regular ones. Cookie Clicker’s shadow achievements are described as “either unfair or difficult to attain” and require much more effort to unlock than other achievements. This is made even more difficult because some shadow achievements in Cookie Clicker have bizarre prerequisites. For example, the “True Neverclick” shadow achievement requires players to bake one million cookies without clicking the giant cookie even once.

item.title: Coral Island Macy Romance Guide (Best Gifts & Heart Events)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewMacy is a dateable photographer who wanders around Coral Island, taking pictures of nature. She loves video games and her pet lobster Stephen. Since Macy was born on a different island, she lives in the Coral Inn, run by Alice and Suki. When she sends gifts in the mail to the player, she may send some pizza, some blue quartz, or a black sea urchin. Her favorite gifts may take effort to cultivate effectively, but if you want to marry Macy, they’re worth the effort.

item.title: Coral Island Nina Romance Guide (Best Gifts & Heart Events)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewNina is an interesting potential partner in Coral Island, as she does not actually live on the island at the start of the game, arriving in Summer. Nina comes from a well-off family who moved away from Coral Island many years ago. She’s intelligent, well-traveled, flirty, and humble. She’s close to the Coral Inn twins, Suki and Alice, and has her friend Lily look after the Abandoned Villa when she isn’t there.

item.title: Coral Island Pablo Romance Guide (Best Gifts & Heart Events)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPablo is one of two dateable blacksmiths in Coral Island. He’s a charming, flirty, and helpful fellow with an odd love for all things pickled. As you get to know Pablo, you will better understand why he bounces around town, helping people when he can. His Heart Events are closely tied to Rafael and showcase the two brothers’ unique relationship. Once you get him to 5 Hearts, he can send you Gold Bars in the mail.

item.title: Coral Island Rafael Romance Guide (Best Gifts & Heart Events)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRafael is a quiet and reserved blacksmith in Coral Island. He spends most of his time working in the shop or caring for the nearby graveyard. Part of Rafael’s appeal is that he is easy to find and talk to, although he takes a while to come out of his shell. On the other hand, he is a bit more picky with his favorite gifts than other romance options in Coral Island.

item.title: Coral Island Scott Romance Guide (Best Gifts & Heart Events)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewScott is a dateable archeologist who works at the local Museum in Coral Island. He’s the only townie who will appreciate a geode as a gift. Scott is an active individual, so he bounces around Starlet Town a lot throughout the week. He has a wide range of interests, making it easy to collect his favorite gifts. His Heart Events slowly build up to a secret project and reveal the nerd under his shield of romantic charm.

item.title: Cut Venom Content From Marvel s Spider-Man 2 May Be Saving Up For Carnage
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTony Todd revealed that 90% of his performance as Venom was cut from Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, suggesting a significant amount of unused content. The game originally had plans for Miles Morales to bond with a symbiote, opening up potential storylines and gameplay opportunities. There is potential for this cut performance to be used in Marvel’s Spider-Man 2’s DLC, which may feature Carnage. Literature ReviewTony Todd has revealed that 90% of his work for Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 was cut from the final game.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 All Cyberpunk Slang Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFamiliarizing yourself with Cyberpunk 2077 slang terms enriches immersion and gameplay experience. The game incorporates technical jargon and foreign words in its varied vernacular. Understanding common slang terms like “corpo” and “solo” enhances comprehension of conversations and missions. Literature ReviewFrom delta to gonk, becoming familiar with Cyberpunk 2077’s slang terms and what they mean can be crucial to getting the most out of the experience. For the cybernetic citizens of Cyberpunk 2077, futuristic slang is part of everyday conversation - but for players conversing in the modern day, it can be a point of confusion.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 All Delamain Car Locations (Epistrophy Quest)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo complete the Epistrophy Side Job quest in Cyberpunk 2077, players must search Night City for seven runaway Delamain Cabs with rogue AI. To get the questline started, you must speak to the taxi AI in Delamain HQ. The AI will give V a special Scanner that will let them locate rogue Delamain taxis scattered around the city. Some cars in Cyberpunk 2077 will be easy to find; however, many of them will require some extra effort to recover.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Hidden Dogtown Location Reveals More Lore About An Important Decision
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA small, secret area in Cyberpunk 2077’s Phantom Liberty DLC reveals the backstory behind a previous mission. The DLC contains many secrets and Easter eggs that tie into other Cyberpunk 2077 quests and provide more depth to the world of Night City. By exploring Leon Rinder’s secret hideout in Dogtown, players can learn more about his character and how their quest decision may have impacted the story. Literature ReviewA tiny, hidden area in Cyberpunk 2077’s Phantom Liberty provides a wealth of backstory on an important quest character.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 How To Get in The Riot Club
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAn unfortunate bug has prevented many from getting into a place called The Riot Club in Cyberpunk 2077, blocking you from pursuing certain missions. You might hear about The Riot Club as you try to finish the “Violence” or “I Don’t Wanna Hear It” missions, which both take place within the establishment. The Club can be found in the Watson District, on Palm View Street, near the bridge leading toward the Kabuki Sub District.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 How To Help Ironclad (Phantom Liberty DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn Cyberpunk 2077’s new Phantom Liberty DLC, you can help reprogram a desolate robot named Ironclad to free him during a hidden quest in Night City. You might receive an incoming call from robot 1R-0NC-LAD when you visit the EBM Petrochem Station Market, a massive section of Dogtwon inside a deteriorating stadium. A series of electric sparks can be seen from a shipping container where the robot lies helpless.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Phantom Liberty Data Shard Reveals Death Of A Major Character From The Witcher
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCyberpunk 2077’s DLC, Phantom Liberty, includes a touching Easter Egg reference to a character from CD Projekt RED’s beloved franchise, The Witcher. The hidden Datashard in the DLC confirms one character’s death and reveals their final wish to have their ashes scattered on the moon. The presence of a small porcelain urn near the datashard suggests that someone intends to fulfill the character’s last wish. Literature ReviewA bittersweet Easter egg concerning a notable figure in The Witcher can be found on a datashard hidden deep in Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Pros & Cons Of Killing Fingers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYV eventually meets Fingers, a dubious ripperdoc in Cyberpunk 2077, and ultimately has the choice of killing him. Fingers is known to prey on Night City’s sex workers and drug addicts, taking advantage of them so he can later abuse the power he’s gained. Though the choice may appear difficult, there are actually very few downsides to killing Fingers. Literature ReviewFinn “Fingers” Gerstatt is a ripperdoc in Cyberpunk 2077 with deplorable practices.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Releases New Content, But It s Not An Update
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNight City Archives offers short-form videos that provide an overview of the history of Night City in Cyberpunk 2077, presented in the style of in-game interfaces. The series is a great resource for both newcomers and enthusiasts to learn and refresh their knowledge about the lore and context of Cyberpunk 2077. While the number of episodes planned is unknown, Night City Archives is an exciting new way to explore the world of Cyberpunk 2077 and delve into its rich setting.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 s Lack Of Pets Makes Sense, But It s More Complicated Than You Think
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe lack of animal life in Cyberpunk 2077 is due to habitat destruction caused by urban expansion and resource extraction.. Pet ownership in Night City is expensive and restricted, with the ultrarich being the only ones who can afford and maintain pets. However, V can adopt an iguana and a cat. Literature ReviewThere are a few perfectly good reasons for Cyberpunk’s general lack of pets and wild animals. Here’s everything in the lore to suggest why.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition Announced, Releases Early December
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition releases early Dec for Xbox Series X/S, PS5, and PC. The PS5 version of Ultimate Edition includes a digital code for the expansion, while the Xbox version has it on the disc. The previous physical release of Cyberpunk 2077 was problematic, but recent improvements and updates have redeemed the game. The Ultimate Edition is a good option for physical media collectors. Literature ReviewCyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition will contain the game’s Phantom Liberty DLC and will be released in time for the holidays both digitally and on disc.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition For Xbox And PlayStation Have One Huge Difference
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Ultimate Edition of Cyberpunk 2077 for PS5 won’t include the Phantom Liberty DLC on a disc, unlike the Xbox and PC versions. PS5 players will have to digitally download the DLC using a voucher code, which takes up more hard drive space and diminishes the game’s resale value. This decision may be due to Sony’s requirement for developers to create a new Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) if they include DLC on game discs, which CD Projekt Red may have wanted to avoid for time and budget reasons.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077s Adam Smasher May Finally Live Up To His Reputation
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAdam Smasher was underwhelming as the final boss in Cyberpunk 2077, with players defeating him in seconds using cheesy builds. Patch 2.1 aims to fix this by making Adam Smasher a more formidable opponent, closer to his portrayal in the Cyberpunk: Edgerunners anime. Changes include improvements to his fighting style, behavior AI, and the addition of iconic abilities such as the Sandevistan. Literature ReviewCyberpunk 2077’s newest update will make the final boss fight with Adam Smasher much harder and closer to the reputation he gained in Edgerunners.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077s Coolest Gang Has A Tragic Origin Story
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Mox gang in Cyberpunk 2077 was formed in response to the death of Elizabeth “Lizzie” Borden, a club owner who defended her workers from violent clients, and was subsequently murdered by a rival gang. The Mox honor Lizzie Borden by protecting Night City’s sex workers and operating out of her former club, called Lizzie’s Bar. Their name and logo pay tribute to her defiance against oppression. Over time, The Mox has evolved into a more profit-driven gang, demanding fees for protection services.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077s New Metro Is Only Missing One Thing
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe inclusion of a metro system in Cyberpunk 2077 adds believability and immersion to Night City’s transportation options. The metro system in the game will have 19 stations, making it easily accessible from anywhere in the city and offering new NPC interactions and city views. The absence of pickpocketing in Cyberpunk 2077 is a strange exclusion, considering it is a common feature in open-world games and could add an interesting criminal element to the metro experience.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077s Night City Is Way Older Than You Think
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNight City, the setting of Cyberpunk 2077, has a dark and evolving history, starting as Coronado City and later named after its murdered founder, Richard Night. Megacorporations, such as Arasaka, saved Night City from gang wars and transformed it into a corporate utopia, but it was later destroyed by a nuclear attack. Arasaka plays a significant role in the city’s history, both as the savior during the Unification War and as a source of resentment for the militaristic expansion of the New USA.

item.title: D&D 10 Best New Cards From The Deck Of Many Things 5e
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe new cards added to The Deck of Many Things in The Book of Many Things mostly have positive effects, making it approachable for new players without penalizing their characters. The Path card grants a permanent 10 ft. movement speed increase, which is especially beneficial for monks or rogues. The Celestial card allows the character to grow wings and gain a flying speed of 30 ft., adding a fun and game-breaking ability if allowed by the DM.

item.title: D&D All New Character Options In The Deck Of Many Things
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Dungeons & Dragons sourcebook The Book of Many Things offers new options for character customization and gameplay, introducing character customization options themed around games of chance. The Book of Many Things introduces two new character backgrounds, which cater to gambling-themed characters. Additionally, the sourcebook includes a new feat for spellcasters. Literature ReviewD&D’s new Deck of Many Things and Book of Many Things bundle adds a number of new character customization options to the game.

item.title: D&D Character Ideas That Are Less Cliché Than Your Last One
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCreating a unique and interesting Dungeons & Dragons character can be a challenge, but it makes the game more enjoyable. Avoid common character tropes like lone wolf rangers and lovable rogues to make your character stand out. Explore unconventional character concepts like a naive pirate, a servant turned sorcerer, or a cheerful necromancer to add a twist to familiar stereotypes. Literature ReviewMaking unique characters for D&D can be a challenge since it’s easy to fall back on clichés.

item.title: D&D In 2024 A Never-Ending Dungeons & Dragons Edition Is A Major Problem
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDungeons & Dragons fifth edition is approaching its 10th anniversary, and Wizards of the Coast is set to release a new ruleset in 2024. The upcoming revision, One D&D, promises to be a perpetually evolving edition of DnD, but lacks clarity and raises concerns about the future of the game. The goal of eliminating editions from DnD fails to recognize the social nature of the hobby and the need for clear rules, making a perpetual edition unplayable for most gaming groups.

item.title: David Harbour Is Right About Starfield (Mostly)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDavid Harbour’s opinion of Starfield aligns with the consensus about the game, demonstrating his understanding of the Starfield community’s perspective. Starfield has some flaws, including immersion-breaking details and a disconnected approach to exploration, which have garnered criticism and impacted its recognition. Starfield is still considered a step in the right direction for Bethesda after the reception of Fallout 76. Literature ReviewStarfield is a remarkable game in many ways, and the Stranger Things actor has taken notice, but he neglected to mention a few notable issues.

item.title: Dead Cells 10 Best Weapons You Shouldn t Miss Out On
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDead Cells has a ton of different weapons you can choose from during a run, but the best ones stand out above the rest to guarantee success for a run. While builds are very focused on individual preferences in Dead Cells, you always have options from the same five categories of items. Melee weapons hit enemies with strings of close-range attacks, while Ranged weapons prefer to fire projectiles from far away.

item.title: Defeating Baldur Gate 3 s Grym Is Simple If You Do This Trick At The Adamantine Forge
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrym is one of the tougher bosses in Baldur’s Gate 3’s first act, but there is a strategy to make it easy. Having a druid in the party opens up the option to use Crushing Flight to deal over 1,000 damage to Grym under certain circumstances. Halsin can be used for the strategy, but many parties may encounter Grym before Halsin becomes an active party member. Literature ReviewThe Adamantine Forge fight can be a big challenge in Baldur’s Gate 3, but there’s one way to make an easy victory happen in the blink of an eye.

item.title: Demonologist How To Use The ESG Item
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAn item called an ESG can reveal hidden ghosts in Demonologist for a very brief time, giving you a crucial piece of evidence against specific spirits. According to the ESG’s item description, it is used to “raise the energy of paranormal entities to display the ghost itself” on top of the device. This makes the ESG one of the best equipment pieces to buy first in Demonologist since it shows you exactly what you and your team are against.

item.title: Den of Wolves Dev Teases Lost GTFO Features, More Lore [EXCLUSIVE]
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDen of Wolves will have features that didn’t make it into GTFO, including a lore library for easier storytelling. GTFO’s lore was difficult to keep track of, but Den of Wolves aims to present it in a more digestible way. With more creative freedom, Den of Wolves can implement ideas from GTFO that would work well in its context. Literature ReviewExclusive: Newly-announced heist game Den of Wolves will have features the developer originally wanted to implement in previous title GTFO.

item.title: Den Of Wolves Interview Shady Sci-Fi Corporations & Learning From GTFO
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDen of Wolves is an upcoming sci-fi heist game from 10 Chambers, the co-founders of the Payday franchise. The game is set in the year 2097 on the remote island of Midway City, featuring larger-scale heists with a sci-fi twist and a thought-provoking narrative inspired by real-world events and media like Ghost in the Shell and Blade Runner. The game’s co-op aspect is key, requiring players to strategize and gather intel and tools before embarking on bigger jobs, and it aims to surprise heist fans with mind-bending sci-fi concepts and unique gameplay experiences.

item.title: Destiny 2 All Recipes & Ingredients Guide (The Dawning 2023)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are several recipes to cook and ingredients to farm in Destiny 2. Here is the complete guide for 2023’s edition of the Dawning event. This year, the annual activity is happening during the Season of the Wish (also known as S23), the same period that reintroduced the Dragon’s Breath Exotic Rocket Launcher in Destiny 2 and set players on a journey to recover Riven’s eggs in order to get assistance from the Ahamkara.

item.title: Destiny 2 How To Get The Pre Astyanax IV Bow (& God Roll)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Pre Astyanax IV is a new legendary Bow added in Season of the Witch in Destiny 2. Find how to get the God Roll from a Vanguard Nightfall. The Pre Astyanax IV drops from the Heist Battleground: Mars in the Vanguard Nightfall playlist. This activity was originally released in Season of the Chosen in Destiny 2. Higher difficulty will increase the chances of obtaining the desired weapon.

item.title: Destiny 2 How To Get The Retraced Path Trace Rifle (& God Roll)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRetraced Path is a Legendary Trace Rifle that was added during Destiny 2’s 30th Anniversary update. This Solar weapon is excellent for add clear. Many players prefer Trace Rifles as they are quite precise and now have a Solar/Void option. There are quite a few other Legendary Trace Rifles that have been added, but the Retraced Path is quite versatile and fits many playstyles. Since Retraced Path is a Legendary gun, Guardians can bring a strong Exotic weapon that synergizes with a Solar subclass.

item.title: Diablo 4 How To Unlock World Tier 3 Nightmare (Higher Difficulty)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo play Diablo 4 on a higher difficulty, players must unlock World Tier 3: Nightmare to scale up the enemies, dungeons, and rewards within the game. Before you can think about World Tier 3, you first have to beat Diablo 4’s main story with at least one character on the difficulties offered when you first start the game. You have two options between World Tier 1 (Adventurer) and World Tier 2 (Veteran), which determine the obstacles you’ll face.

item.title: Diablo 4 Season 3 Is Bringing Back One Of Diablo 3s Best Features
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAlthough Diablo 4’s third season has not had its name revealed, announcements at BlizzCon 2023 gave players an idea of what kind of content to expect. D4 Season 3 will feature a new challenge called The Gauntlet, which is a new and improved version of Challenge Rifts from Diablo 3. In The Gauntlet, players will race to finish non-linear dungeons with a fixed seed, identical monster types and locations, and no loot until the timer runs out, emphasizing combat over item collection.

item.title: Diablo 4 Vessel Of Hatred May Bring Back An Iconic Diablo Boss
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDiablo 4: Vessel of Hatred, the upcoming expansion, will take players to the jungles of Kurast and introduce a new playable class. The expansion will likely focus on the Prime Evil Mephisto and his influence in Kurast, a corrupted paradise. The story of Neyrelle, a young girl aiming to defeat Mephisto, is left unresolved, leaving players to speculate on her intentions and ultimate fate. Literature ReviewDiablo 4’s first expansion will not only continue the main campaign story but could bring back a boss with a long history in the Diablo franchise.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley 2024 Roadmap New Expansions & Updates
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDisney Dreamlight Valley had a successful year in 2023, and in 2024, players can expect new content for both the base game and the Expansion Pass DLC. The base game will receive updates in late winter and early spring, introducing new realms and villagers like Mike Wazowski, Sulley, and possibly Daisy Duck. The Expansion Pass, A Rift In Time, will continue with Chapters 2 and 3 being released in Spring and Summer 2024, along with the addition of new villagers.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley All A Rift in Time Recipes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe A Rift In Time DLC in Disney Dreamlight Valley is full of new food that can be combined into a vast number of recipes for every meal. There are a lot of new things people can do in the A Rift In Time DLC, including moving villagers between the Valley and Eternity Isle. There are also a host of new characters, new villagers, and many new quests for players to spend time completing.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley All Gem Locations In Eternity Isle
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewWithin Disney Dreamlight Valley, Eternity Isle houses new gems for players to find and unlock, which are scattered throughout the various biomes. The new gems are just one of many new additions to Disney Dreamlight Valley with the “A Rift In Time” expansion, and players will have to explore all of Eternity Isle to find all of them. There are many new resources and activities, as well as a plethora of new quests to unlock the new characters that have been added to the game, such as Gaston.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley Every Active Free Reward Code (January 2024)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are 15 active reward codes in Disney Dreamlight Valley as of the end of 2023, each with fun cosmetics to decorate your fantastical village. To redeem your reward codes, head to the Settings menu of your game and click on Help. From there, type your code into the redemption bar and click Claim. Soon after, the rewards should appear in your mailbox for collection. As of the end of 2023, there are 15 active codes in Disney Dreamlight Valley.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley Finally Has Multiplayer, But There Are Some Issues
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDisney Dreamlight Valley’s multiplayer feature, Valley Visits, is still in its early stages and lacks significant gameplay options. Players must unlock Vanellope and obtain a Valley Visit Station to invite friends to their Valley. Crossplay is supported for most platforms, except for PlayStation. Multiplayer activities are limited, but players can buy items, change outfits, pick flowers, take photos, drop and pick up items, and collect Pixel Shards. Literature ReviewMultiplayer has been a feature that many have looked forward to having in Disney Dreamlight Valley, but in its current state, it isn’t very useful.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley How to Complete Sugar Rush
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSugar Rush in Disney Dreamlight Valley requires players to significantly increase their in-game sugar intake to complete the Duty’s objective. Much like real life, “sugar rush” is a sudden burst of energy after consuming food that has a lot of sugar. For the “Sugar Rush” duty, you need to do precisely the same: consume a lot of sugary food. This means your character must eat Candy to complete this duty.
