The storage space issue is not unique to Modern Warfare 3, as many modern games demand large installations, which can be a problem for consoles with limited storage capacity.

item.title: Goat Simulator 3 Every 5G Tower Location
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPlayers who locate and activate the 5G Towers in the open world of Goat Simulator 3 will unlock additional in-game content and a bonus cutscene. Once players locate a tower, they must activate each one by completing an electricity puzzle which will contribute to the completion of the 5G upgrade test. These towers have been scattered across San Angora, but each 5G hub can be located and activated with relative ease.

item.title: Goat Simulator 3 Multiplayer Guide How to Play with Friends
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe fun of Goat Simulator 3 is best played with friends in multiplayer, where you can run wild as a screaming farm animal and cause chaos once again. There is currently no crossplay between systems as of this time of writing, and online multiplayer cannot host people playing in local split-screen mode. Anyone joining together must make the decision to either play online or offline, but not both.

item.title: Goat Simulator 3 s Most Chaotic Hat Is Worth The Effort Here s How To Get It
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe most chaotic hat in Goat Simulator 3 will take some effort to earn, but it is well worth it for the sheer amount of chaos caused afterward. Cosmetics are a big deal for goats, proven by the fact that you can get a Goat Simulator 3 skin in Fortnite. There is a wide range of hats, clothes, shoes, and even other types of goats to unlock throughout the game, all of which come with their superpower.

item.title: God Of War Ragnarök 10 Best Relics, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChoosing the right Relics is crucial for optimizing gameplay and making Kratos as strong as possible in God of War Ragnarok. Relics have varied effects and can provide offensive, defensive, buffing, or healing abilities. Some of the best Relics include Motsognir’s Call, The Hilt of Ridill, and The Hilt of Angrvadall, each offering unique advantages in combat. Literature ReviewRelics are an important part of combat in God of War: Ragnarök.

item.title: God Of War Ragnarök All 10 Berserker Boss Battles, Ranked By Difficulty
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBerserker fights in God of War Ragnarök are some of the hardest challenges in the game, offering unique threats for Kratos to overcome. Some Berserker boss battles, like Harđrefill and Hvíserkr, are relatively easy to defeat and can be tackled early on in the game. The rewards for defeating the Berserkers may not be worth it in terms of in-game items, but the sense of satisfaction and storytelling value can make the fights appealing.

item.title: God of War Ragnarok DLC Is Almost Here (And Completely Free)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSanta Monica Studio surprises fans with free Valhalla DLC for God of War Ragnarök, promising a deeply personal and reflective journey for Kratos. The DLC incorporates brand-new elements inspired by the roguelite genre, adding a fresh and unique experience for players. Fans can look forward to diving into Valhalla on December 12, 2023, as the DLC will be completely free to enjoy. Literature ReviewGod of War Ragnarok’s roguelite DLC Valhalla has been revealed at The Game Awards 2023 and will be completely free.

item.title: God of War Ragnarok Valhalla - How To Unlock Burdens of Valhalla
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn the Valhalla DLC for God of War Ragnarok, players can activate new challenges for Kratos called Burdens that can reward him handsomely. There are different kinds of upgrades in God of War Ragnarok: Valhalla, some permanent and some only temporary. The rewards from a run can be spent to unlock the permanent upgrades, and things like Glyphs and Burdens can unlock rewards that temporarily help you make it to the end of a run.

item.title: God Of War Ragnarök Valhalla - Who Helios Is & Why Kratos Decapitated Him
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGod of War Ragnarok’s Valhalla DLC is not just an additional mode, but an epilogue that confronts Kratos’ past as the Greek god of war. Kratos reconnects with the decapitated head of Helios, the god of the Sun in Greek mythology, in Valhalla. Helios’ head is a convenient personification of Kratos’ unprocessed guilt pertaining to his actions in God of War 3. Literature ReviewThe ancient Greek Sun god plays a major role in God of War Ragnarok’s Valhalla DLC, and his history with Kratos goes back to even before God of War 3.

item.title: God Of War Ragnarök Valhalla Ending Explained In Detail
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGod of War Ragnarok’s Valhalla DLC introduces a postgame roguelike game mode. Even though the gameplay loop is recursive, with gradual meta-progression accompanying temporary rewards, Valhalla has additional story content following Ragnarok. God of War Ragnarok: Valhalla’s ending has Kratos reconciling with his past actions, ready to start a new chapter. Literature ReviewAlthough God of War Ragnarök: Valhalla serves as a fun roguelike mode, it also makes significant contributions to the overall narrative of the game.

item.title: God Of War s Valhalla DLC Has The Perfect Rewards For Longtime Fans
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGod of War Ragnarok’s free DLC, Valhalla, takes players to the Norse afterlife and offers a roguelite epilogue to the main story. Valhalla brings back the iconic Blade of Olympus, a key weapon from previous God of War games. The DLC also adds a classic Kratos appearance to Ragnarok, making the Ghost of Sparta look like he did in the original Greek saga. Literature ReviewGod of War Ragnarok’s free roguelite DLC, title Valhalla, may take place after the base game, but deals a lot with Kratos’ past as an Olympian god.

item.title: God of War Shattered Gauntlet of Ages Guide
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Shattered Gauntlet of Ages is an upgradeable Talisman in God of War that will grow in power every time Kratos imbues it with a new enchantment. The in-game description of the Shattered Gauntlet says that “fragments of its former strength lie scattered throughout the realms.” While you start the missions tied to this artifact in Midgard, you have to complete various favors that may take place in other locations.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 5 12 Secret Areas That You Had No Idea About
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrand Theft Auto 5 has been out for over a decade, but there are still hidden places in the game even dedicated players may not have seen. All over Los Santos and San Andreas are interesting or helpful spots tucked out of the way. Some hidden GTA 5 locations may require performing glitches, as there are a number of areas that weren’t meant to be accessed during gameplay. Literature ReviewGrand Theft Auto 5’s map is sprawling and detailed, meaning even over a decade after release, there are still some secrets you might not have seen.

item.title: GTA 5 s Michael De Santa Teases His Return For GTA 6
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNed Luke’s cryptic response to a fan’s question about Michael’s appearance in GTA 6 suggests that he may be involved in the game. Luke’s tweet could be a nod to the Wanted system in GTA games, and hint at Michael’s cover being blown. Michael could appear as a quest giver in a series of movie-related missions. Literature ReviewVoice actor Ned Luke seems to be teasing Michael’s return in GTA 6.

item.title: GTA 6 Is Already About To Beat GTA 5 In One Way (& It s Not Even Out Yet) [UPDATED]
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGTA 6’s reveal trailer is rapidly gaining views, putting it on track to beat the record held by its predecessor. The trailer has already become the most-liked trailer on YouTube, surpassing Avengers: Infinity War and Battlefield 1. Despite leaks and an early trailer release, the hype for GTA 6 remains strong, with the game set for a release in 2025. Literature ReviewRockstar Games revealed the first trailer for GTA 6, which already seems to be on its way to beating a major record held by its predecessor, GTA 5.

item.title: GTA 6 May Already Be Making A Big Xbox Mistake
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGTA 6’s upcoming release may pose a problem for the Xbox Series S, due to its lower specs and performance issues with more technically demanding games. The Xbox Series S is significantly weaker than the Series X, which sometimes requires it to ditch certain game features. Rockstar’s previous games, like Red Dead Redemption 2, have had performance issues on lower-end consoles, suggesting that GTA 6 on the Xbox Series S may face similar problems.

item.title: GTA 6 Needs To Steal Red Dead Redemption 2s Most Important Story Feature
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRed Dead Redemption 2’s strong characterization and camp system could be a valuable addition to Grand Theft Auto 6, enhancing its story and building memorable relationships. Incorporating the camp system into GTA 6 would make its world richer and more grounded, adding authenticity to its satirical elements and creating robust characters. A camp in GTA 6 could serve as a base of operations for a criminal empire, offering useful services and potential perks through an expanded upgrade system, while still allowing players to enjoy the distinct pleasures of the game.

item.title: GTA 6 Rumor Would Be A First (& Change The Franchise Forever)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA recent leak suggests that Rockstar Games plans to release new ongoing content for Grand Theft Auto 6, potentially changing the franchise forever. This approach could be a way for Rockstar to keep players engaged and reduce crunch culture during development. While GTA 5 lacked this specific content, GTA 6 may prioritize single-player story mode, offering dedicated expansions for those who prefer it over GTA Online. Literature ReviewThe latest Grand Theft Auto 6 rumor to emerge from GTAForum could change Rockstar’s most popular franchise forever - that is, if it is true.

item.title: GTA 6 s Map May Be Hiding In Plain Sight In This Official Image
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRockstar Games may have hidden Grand Theft Auto 6’s map in its first official artwork, sparking speculation among fans. Highly observant fans have analyzed the artwork and believe they have found clues to the map’s locations, including Vice Beach, a city, and scattered islands. The inclusion of multiple cities in the state of Leonida, as shown in the enhanced version of the poster, could make GTA 6’s map larger and more expansive than previous titles.

item.title: GTA 6 s Setting & Location Everything We Know About Leonida & Vice City
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGTA 6 takes players back to Vice City, but in a modern-day setting, showcasing a vibrant and realistic adaptation of Miami, Florida. The game features Vice Beach, based on the iconic Miami Beach, known for its crowded beaches, luxury hotels, and Art Deco buildings. GTA 6 will expand the map to include areas based on the Everglades and possibly the Florida Keys, offering diverse environments and interesting gameplay opportunities.

item.title: GTA 6 Trailer 1 Everything We Learned About Lucia
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGTA 6 introduces Lucia, the first female protagonist of the GTA series since its 2D era, who already has a criminal past. Lucia and Jason are a modern Bonnie and Clyde duo, going on a crime spree in the streets of Leonida. The trailer hints at a “situation” that pushes Lucia and Jason back into a life of crime, with possible ties to established criminal organizations in Vice City.

item.title: GTA 6 Trailer Release Date Confirmed Where & How To Watch
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrand Theft Auto 6’s highly anticipated reveal trailer will finally drop on December 5 at 9am ET. The trailer will be shared on the official Rockstar Games YouTube account and website. This release is part of Rockstar Games’ 25th Anniversary celebrations. Literature ReviewRockstar Games has finally announced the release date for Grand Theft Auto 6’s first trailer. Here’s when and where it will be available to watch. Rockstar Games has finally announced the release date for Grand Theft Auto 6’s first trailer.

item.title: GTA 6 Trailer Released Early After Leak, Rockstar Confirms Release Year For Next Massive Game
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAfter years of waiting, Rockstar has finally revealed the first trailer for Grand Theft Auto 6, showing off the game’s location and characters. As with Rockstar Games’ previous reveal trailers for Grand Theft Auto 5 and Red Dead Redemption 2, Grand Theft Auto 6 provided a look at some of the overhauled Vice City’s breathtaking landscapes, and a glimpse at some of the denizens players are likely to cross paths with.

item.title: GTA 6 Weapon Change Is Copying The Wrong Rockstar Game
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGTA 6 may potentially adopt gunplay mechanics from Max Payne 3, offering a fresh and entertaining take on first-person shooter elements, according to recent alleged leaks. The exciting prospect of Max Payne 3’s satisfying and visually spectacular gunplay being incorporated into GTA 6 is met with enthusiasm by fans. GTA 6 may also take inspiration from Red Dead Redemption 2 by implementing a limitation on carryable inventory and weapon hosting, adding a new level of challenge and realism.

item.title: GTA Online How to Become a Cop (& Why You Want To)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCops are a major thorn to all of the criminals of Los Santos in GTA Online, but it is possible for players to become cops themselves in Director Mode. Ironically, you have to break the law before you can start enforcing it. There are no Police Academies in the city for you to enroll in a course or take on missions that would help you earn a badge for your character.

item.title: GTA Online How to Get The Railgun (Location & Uses)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Railgun is one of the most deadly weapons in all of the Grand Theft Auto series. Here’s how players can get find and locate it in GTA Online. The Railgun can be bought from the secret vehicle Gun Van vendor in GTA Online. Since this gun is extremely powerful, it was fitting to have it sold by a mysterious vendor who is hard to track. The Gun Van also offers significant discounts for other weapons if you need something other than the Rail Gun.

item.title: Guaranteed Shiny Catching Method In Scarlet & Violet Is Surprisingly Easy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA new method of Shiny Hunting in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet makes finding these rare Pokémon easier. The method involves counting the number of Pokémon in a group and waiting for specific conditions to uncover a Shiny. The method can save time, especially when searching for Pokémon that are hard to identify as Shinies. Literature ReviewA simple new Shiny Hunting method discovered for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet makes finding the elusive Pokémon a far smoother process than before.

item.title: Half-Life How To Play With Friends In Multiplayer (25th Anniversary Update)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe 25th Anniversary Update to Half-Life includes the ability to play with your friends in multiplayer, but this can be a little tricky to set up. Anyone who wants to return to Black Mesa or dive into it for the first time should pick up the game while it is discounted on Steam. This supreme sale during the Anniversary Update will not last forever, but it is the best way to obtain this classic FPS as of this time of writing.

item.title: Helldivers 2 Release Date, Story, & Gameplay Details
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHelldivers 2, a squad-based shooter, is a highly anticipated follow-up to the original game with a different style and scope. The game emphasizes team-based decision making and coordinated loadouts to overcome challenging levels and encounters. Helldivers 2 releases on February 8, 2024, and will be available on PlayStation and PC with crossplay capabilities. Literature ReviewHelldivers 2 is an ambitious evolution of an interesting squad-based shooter. Here’s everything to know about the upcoming release of the game.

item.title: Hidden Baldur s Gate 3 Side Quest Makes An Earlier Lose-Lose Decision A Lot Better
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSide quests in Baldur’s Gate 3 can be easily missed without quest markers or speaking to NPCs, resulting in small moments being overlooked, such as finding a home for a stray cat. Exploring the Underdark in Act 1 can lead to encounters with Derryth and Baelen, apothecaries who need help retrieving Noblestalk. The party’s choices can affect the outcome of this section, including whether Baelen dies. If Baelen dies, Derryth can be found alone in Act 3 at Bonecloak’s Apothecary, which can lead to a hidden quest and one of the game’s few heartwarming endings.

item.title: Hidden Cyberpunk 2077 Detail May Reveal The Location Of Cyberpunk 2 (Orion)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYProject Orion, the sequel to Cyberpunk 2077, may take place in a real-world location like Chicago in the year 2080, as hinted by a transit poster found in Cyberpunk 2077. The Cyberpunk universe has referenced other real-world locations before, so exploring new American locations in the sequel is a possibility. Chicago already has a detailed backstory in the Cyberpunk universe, including a deadly bio-plague and subsequent reconstruction, making it a potentially interesting setting for Project Orion.

item.title: Hidden Red Dead Redemption 2 Detail Hints At America s Tragic Past
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRDR2 includes a nameless grave marker memorializing Chinese workers who died building the Transcontinental Railroad in the late 19th century. Many Chinese railroad workers were buried in unmarked graves, and it’s likely that some were referred to by numbers instead of names. This detail in RDR2 is based on historical fact. RDR2 also references New Orleans’ original Chinatown, which was forced to move in 1937. The game’s recreation provides a respectful nod to this tragic piece of American history.

item.title: Hideo Kojima s New Horror Game OD Sure Sounds A Lot Like PT
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewHideo Kojima’s new horror game, OD, has finally been revealed, and there are a number of parallels between it and the canceled Silent Hill game, PT. Following its premiere at The Game Awards, OD’s trailer was uploaded to the Kojima Productions YouTube channel. The trailer shows very little about the game, but does provide a haunting first look at its cast, which includes Sophia Lillis, Hunter Schafer, and Udo Kier.

item.title: Highly-Addictive Steam Game Is Only $2 And Perfect For The Holiday Break
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGeometry Dash is an indie rhythm-based action platformer that is challenging and fun, and it can be purchased for only $1.99 during the Steam Winter Sale. The game’s simple design and lack of complex storyline or character development make it perfect for playing during social events or downtime, and it is available on both PC and mobile devices. The recent Geometry Dash 2.2 update has added new levels and enhancements to the game, making it even more exciting and enjoyable for both new and experienced players.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy 10 Best Talents To Make You Powerful, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYUnlocking the 10 most powerful talents in Hogwarts Legacy can greatly benefit witches and wizards in their battles against enemies. (100 characters) Talent points in Hogwarts Legacy are nonrefundable, so players need to be strategic in selecting their talents. (100 characters) Spells like Avada Kedavra Mastery and Protego Mastery offer unique and powerful abilities for dark magic users and those focused on defense. (100 characters) Literature ReviewWith so many available perks, players can create all sorts of character builds - but everyone should take advantage of Hogwarts Legacy’s best talents.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy A Bird In The Hand Quest Guide
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn A Bird In The Hand, Hogwarts Legacy players must help Poppy Sweeting solve puzzles to find and protect a nest of Golden Snidgets from poachers. To start A Bird In The Hand, you need to have used all unlocked spells in Hogwarts Legacy to help Poppy free a Dragon during the Fire and Vice main story quest. This opens Poppy’s relationship questline, where you can help Poppy confront the poachers and build a steady friendship with her.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy Every Character Related To Someone From The Books
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHogwarts Legacy is set in the 1800s, introducing new characters and exploring the magical world before the events of the Harry Potter series. Some characters in the game, like Matilda Weasley and Garreth Weasley, are directly related to characters from the books, but their exact relationships are harder to determine due to the time frame. Other characters, such as Professor Phineas Nigellus Black, are also related to well-known book characters, providing interesting connections and speculation for players.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy Every House Exclusive Quest, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHogwarts Legacy offers quests that are specific to each house, allowing players to experience different storylines and areas of interest in the castle and surrounding areas. The quests eventually lead players back to the same point in the main story, but they provide different styles and background info on characters. Each house quest introduces players to the ghost of Richard Jackdaw, a former Hogwarts student, and delves into his backstory and adventures before his demise.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy How Professor Weasley Is Related To Ron
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYProfessor Matilda Weasley is likely Ron Weasley’s great-great-great-great aunt, based on their shared ancestry and the four-generation gap between them. It is unlikely that Professor Weasley has any direct children, as she longed for a more stable lifestyle and is still unmarried during the events of Hogwarts Legacy. While there is a moment in the game where players can choose whether to lie to Professor Weasley, there are no consequences for dodging the truth.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy On Switch Is 100% A Game For Muggles
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHogwarts Legacy on the Nintendo Switch is a long-awaited port that falls short in several areas, including poor graphics, lengthy loading times, and the loss of a seamless open world. The delays in releasing the Nintendo Switch version have led to some fans losing interest, potentially hindering the game’s critical and commercial success. Despite its flaws, being able to play Hogwarts Legacy on the Switch is an impressive achievement considering the hardware limitations, making it a valuable option for players on the go.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy On Switch Is Missing The Most Obvious Feature
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHogwarts Legacy finally arrives on the Nintendo Switch, introducing a wider audience to a pre-Harry Potter adventure set over 100 years ago. The Switch version lacks motion controls for spell casting, missing out on the immersive experience it could have offered. While the portability of the Switch is a plus, the game has technical limitations, including downgraded graphics and longer loading times compared to other consoles. Literature ReviewHogwarts Legacy is finally available on the Nintendo Switch, but this port doesn’t use a feature that could’ve made it feel truly magical.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy Pros And Cons Of Choosing The Dark Wizard Path
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBecoming a dark wizard in Hogwarts Legacy grants significant combat advantages with powerful spells like Crucio, Imperio, and Avada Kedavra. Dark spells in Hogwarts Legacy have additional benefits, such as causing a Cursed status on enemies and breaking through protective barriers. Using dark magic in Hogwarts Legacy has minimal negative consequences, primarily damaging the student’s reputation and receiving disapproval from certain characters. Literature ReviewThe Unforgivable Curses can certainly be a tempting venture, but do the risks of using dark magic in Hogwarts Legacy outweigh the rewards?

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy Where To Get Dugbog Tongue
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA key ingredient for crafting the Focus Potion, Dugbog Tongue lies on enemies in Hogwarts Legacy close to the swamps of the open world. You must first buy the Focus Potion recipe from J Pippin’s Potions, a Hogsmeade shop, before you can use Dugbog Tongue. The Focus Potion has such a positive benefit that the recipe needed to unlock the item stands at an expensive 1,200 Gold. You must scrounge about the open world for any secrets or sell unused gear to accumulate enough gold to purchase the recipe.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - All Active Redeem Codes (January 2024)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRedemption Codes are an easy way to gain a small amount of Stellar Jade monthly in Honkai: Star Rail. Here is every active code for January 2024. While a single redemption code may only be 50 or 60 Stellar Jade, every bit of currency helps when pulling for a desired character, such as Ruan Mei in Honkai: Star Rail. You only need 160 for one Warp and a few Redemption Codes each month.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - Argenti Character Ascension (& Materials)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewYou will need to farm the proper materials to Ascend Argenti and level his abilities in Honkai: Star Rail. Here’s what they are and how to get them. In battle, Argenti uses Physical DMG. Along with Huohuo and Hanya, Argenti is one of the new characters that were announced during the Honkai: Star Rail 1.5 livestream. This playable hero is only obtainable whenever his banner is featured in the gacha system.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - Argenti Character Builds (Light Cones, Relics, Team Comps)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewUnlock Argenti’s potential as a main Physical DPS in Honkai: Star Rail. Here are his best Light Cones, Relics, Ornaments, stats, team comps, and more. Argenti is different from several other Erudition characters, many of which rely on follow-up attacks to deal damage. Jing Yuan in Honkai: Star Rail is one such example. Argenti does not actually have a mechanic that allows him to strike with secondary attacks.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - Dr. Ratio Character Ascension (& Materials)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewYou can start unlocking Dr. Ratio’s full potential as a 5-star DPS character in Honkai: Star Rail by Ascending him and leveling his Traces. After that, you will have to rely on his limited-time banner coming into rotation to obtain Dr. Ratio. This character specializes in dealing a high amount of single-target damage, making him lethal. Before getting to this stage, however, you will have to farm and muster up the required materials to level him up to 80, going through the several stages of character Ascension that often act as thresholds.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - Dr. Ratio Character Builds (Light Cones, Relics, Team Comps)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewYou should optimize Dr. Ratio with a good build and strong team comp in Honkai: Star Rail to unlock his full potential as a 5-star DPS character. If you do not have the 5-star version of Dan Heng, then Dr. Ratio is a fantastic substitute, especially because of how his gameplay is tailored toward melting HP bars. In addition to that, you can also get a copy of a free Dr.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - Hanya Character Ascension (& Materials)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewHanya is a new 4-star support Harmony character in Honkai: Star Rail. Here are all the materials you need to farm to fully max her out. Hanya operates differently than most of the other Harmony characters so far. Her Skill allows the team to recover Skill Points when they land hits on opponents marked by her, while her Ultimate boosts an ally’s SPD and ATK, making her good company for a DPS like Seele in Honkai: Star Rail, for instance.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - Hanya Character Builds (Light Cones, Relics, Team Comps)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewProperly build Hanya in Honkai: Star Rail and unlock the potential of a support unit who is perfect for hypercarry teams focused on maximum damage. Because of her alignment with Harmony, Hanya’s main focus in battles is to provide support for the rest of her team – most of which stem from buffs. She can increase the SPD and ATK of party members, which makes them more effective in fights.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - Huohuo Character Ascension (& Materials)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewHuohuo is a 5-star healer that you can obtain in Honkai: Star Rail. Here are all the materials you need to farm to fully level her and her abilities. Huohuo uses Wind in combat and follows the Path of the Abundance. In essence, this means that she operates as the team’s healer. Huohuo actually heals her teammates and, in fact, is also capable of dispelling debuffs, making her a very valuable ally to have.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - Huohuo Character Builds (Light Cones, Relics, Team Comps)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewHuohuo is a powerful healer in Honkai: Star Rail who is capable of also acting as a stat booster for her team comp. Here are her best builds. Being able to remove debuffs in a fight against Phantylia in Honkai: Star Rail, for instance, is vital, as the enemy can reduce the Max HP of party members, putting them at risk when taking damage. In addition to that skill set, Huohuo can also buff party members, increasing their Energy Regeneration and boosting their ATK stat.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - Ruan Mei Character Builds (Light Cones, Relics, Team Comps)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRuan Mei’s Weakness Break buffs make her a top-tier support unit in Honkai: Star Rail with plenty of strong options for Relics and Light Cones. As a 5-Star character, Ruan Mei has a limited-time run on a character banner. You can pull for her on the Floral Triptych banner from December 27th, 2023, to January 17th, 2024. Once this banner ends, you won’t be able to obtain Ruan Mei until her banner has a rerun.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail - Xueyi Character Builds (Light Cones, Relics, Team Comps)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewXueyi is a new 4-Star Destruction character in Honkai: Star Rail whose kit revolves around reducing Toughness and building a follow-up attack. If you want to get Xueyi as a New Year’s addition to your roster of characters, the new year is the perfect time to pull for her. Xueyi has a drop rate boost on the Floral Triptych and A Lost Soul character banners running from December 27th, 2023, to January 17th, 2024.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail 1.6 - Every Confirmed Playable Character
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHonkai: Star Rail 1.6 will introduce three new playable characters. These additions will bring more options and customization to the game. Two of the heroes are 5-star characters, while one is a 4-star. Literature ReviewThree new playable characters have been confirmed for Honkai: Star Rail 1.6, two of which are 5-star heroes. Here are more details about them. The new playable characters in Honkai: Star Rail 1.6 were confirmed by HoYoverse much ahead of the actual version’s release.

item.title: Honkai Star Rail How To Unlock Dr. Ratio For Free
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDr. Ratio is a powerful single target damage dealer in Honkai Star Rail. He will be free until patch 2.1, released sometime in 2024. Dr. Ratio is free as part of Honkai Star Rail’s 1.6 update. This promotional deal will last until the release of patch 2.1, but no official date has been announced. After that period, Dr. Ratio will likely enter a random “Warp” gacha draw. While some players might still gain him for free, the chance will no longer be guaranteed.

item.title: Honour Mode Shows One Of Baldur s Gate 3 s Biggest Flaws
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHonour Mode in Baldur’s Gate 3 offers a unique challenge with a single save slot, eliminating save-scumming. The single-save nature of Honour Mode adds tension and forces players to live with their decisions and failures. However, the single-save nature can also make running into bugs and glitches more frustrating and potentially waste hours of progress. Literature ReviewHonour Mode offers some of the most challenging content in Baldur’s Gate 3, but also manages to expose one of the game’s biggest shortcomings.

item.title: Horizon Forbidden West Every Legendary Armor, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThere are 11 total Legendary armor sets in Horizon Forbidden West . They’re the best in the game overall, but each one provides unique advantages to suit a particular playstyle. Six new Legendary armor sets were added by the Burning Shores DLC. Some Legendary armor sets are rewarded for quest completion. Others can be purchased from clothing merchants, and still others must be claimed with Arena Medals. Literature ReviewThere are a total of 11 Legendary armor sets in Horizon Forbidden Shores, including those from the Burning Shores DLC.

item.title: Hot Wheels Unleashed How To Turn On Split Screen (& Use On Every Platform)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn a world where online multiplayer is the norm for video games, it’s great to be able to use split screen in Hot Wheels Unleashed for any platform. It’s important to note that Player 2 cannot unlock achievements in Split-Screen mode, but they have access to the same content available to Player 1. For example, if Player 1 has every secret car in Hot Wheels Unleashed, then Player 2 can use those vehicles as well.

item.title: House Flipper 2 How To Find Every Bessie Collectible
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBessie the Beaver is a collectible waiting to be found across the story mode campaign of House Flipper 2 and can net the player an achievement. With many of the improvements over the first game in House Flipper 2, players can do a few things they were not previously able to do, including build a custom house in Sandbox Mode and create or flip basements and bunkers. This gives players a lot of freedom to relax, unwind, and figure out whatever makes them most relaxed.

item.title: How Arthur Morgan (SPOILER) In Red Dead Redemption 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRegardless of how it is played, Arthur Morgan contracts tuberculosis and dies by the end of Red Dead Redemption 2. Tuberculosis was a deadly disease in the 1800s with limited treatment options. Arthur catches tuberculosis during a mission when Thomas Downes coughs infected blood on him. Literature ReviewThere’s one particular mission in Rockstar Games’ Red Dead Redemption 2 which changes the course of protagonist Arthur Morgan’s life forever. [Warning: The following story contains major spoilers for Red Dead Redemption 2.

item.title: How Avatar Frontiers Of Pandora Connects To The Way Of Water
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY“Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora” tells a unique story within the franchise, co-existing with the movies. The game takes place in a different area of Pandora, allowing for a new narrative that doesn’t overlap with the films. The game explores some parallel themes to “Avatar: The Way of Water,” but with its own protagonist and distinct storyline. Literature ReviewAvatar: Frontiers of Pandora tells its own unique story, but will be canon to the movies, taking place around the same time as The Way of Water.

item.title: How Baldurs Gate 3 Can Raise The Level Cap Without Breaking The Game
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 has a level cap of 12, DnD already has a workaround, where the maximum level could be extended to 20. The BG3 level cap for a single class could be kept at 12, but the character level extended to 20, avoiding the issue of high-level spells needing to be implemented. Multiclassing in Baldur’s Gate 3 allows players to gain spell slots as if they were single-classed, providing an answer to concerns about high-level gameplay.

item.title: How D&D Can Help You In Real Life
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYD&D has real-world benefits for both young people and adults, teaching valuable skills that can be applied in life. The game promotes communication, problem-solving, adaptability, and coping with failure, among other skills. D&D provides an escape from personal issues and offers a safe space to explore complex subjects and develop confidence. Literature ReviewD&D has many skills that transfer well into the real world, and by using D&D and those skills, players will have the tools to tackle many problems.

item.title: How Mario, Luigi, Wario, and Waluigi Are Related
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThere has been a lot of speculation over the years about how Mario, Luigi, Wario, and Waluigi are related. Mario and Luigi are brothers, as evidenced by their shared last name and Luigi’s introduction in Mario Bros. Wario is not related to Mario and Luigi and was originally created as a childhood acquaintance and villain in Mario Land 2. Literature ReviewThe original game is called Super Mario Bros., but are Mario, Luigi, Wario, and Waluigi actually one big family, or does it only seem that way?

item.title: How Marvel s Spider-Man 2 Sets Up Marvel s Spider-Man 3 s Story & Villains
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s Spider-Man 2 sets up future plot points like the introduction of Venom and the potential transformation of Cletus Kasady into Carnage. The arrival of Cindy Moon, also known as Silk, suggests the possibility of her becoming another playable hero in Marvel’s Spider-Man 3. Norman Osborn’s plan and the involvement of Doc Ock hint at a menacing plot that could potentially result in Peter Parker’s demise, adding a shocking twist to the series.

item.title: How Saving Throws Work In Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSaving Throws protect characters in Baldur’s Gate 3. It is rolled to resist dangerous conditions. You’ll want to keep yours high and hamper foes. Offensive-minded characters will also want to know how Saving Throws functions but in reverse. You may instead make your magic more potent to resist, including basic beginner spells in BG3. Or find out which Saving Throw is an enemy’s weakest - most creatures only have one or two strong Saving Throws, while the others can be exploited.

item.title: How To Activate Smart Steering In Mario Kart 8 (& How It Works)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe smart steering feature in Mario Kart 8 lets new and less experienced players have better control when turning corners or overtaking other players. When setting up a kart in Mario Kart 8, you will be able to enable or turn off the feature by using one of the menu options. Once enabled, you will have better control when turning corners or overtaking other players. It is worth pointing out that this feature will only assist you and will not make your Kart into a self-driving vehicle.

item.title: How To Add a Sim To a Household In The Sims 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAdding Sims to Households in The Sims 4 can be done naturally through progression or forced using methods such as merging families or cheats. The first way to add a Sim to a household in The Sims 4 is by merging families with the “Merge Household” mechanic. First, select an active household from your library and then open the gallery. Next, find the Sim you wish to add to your current family and choose “Place Household.

item.title: How To Beat (Living & Undead) Erlik In Prince of Persia The Lost Crown
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA massive boar called Erlik is a recurring boss in Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown that you can try to defeat in both their living and undead forms. [Warning: The following article contains minor spoilers for Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown.] The first time you come across Erlik in Prince of Persia: TLC’s modern Metroidvania world is at the very eastern edge of the Hyrcanian Forest.

item.title: How To Beat Amon In Like a Dragon Gaiden The Man Who Erased His Name
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA boss named Amon is one of the hardest enemies you can try and beat in Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name if you unlock their fight. There are two Amon boss fights, one against Tetsu Amon and another against Gai Amon that are connected to the Coliseum’s Team Hell Rumble mode. These fights see you and a group of recruited characters taking on waves of enemies in Bronze, Silver, Gold, and eventually Platinum matches.

item.title: How To Beat Arlo In Pokémon GO (December 2023)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTrainers can once again face off against Team GO Rocket’s Arlo in Pokémon GO this December 2023 and with the right team, he can be easily defeated. Defeating Arlo will offer a rare opportunity for players to catch a strong Shadow Pokémon, making it worthwhile to try and beat him. Alongside Cliff and Sierra, Arlo is one of the three leaders that Trainers need to defeat before they can face Team GO Rocket Boss Giovanni.

item.title: How To Beat Arlo In Pokémon GO (January 2024)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTrainers can once again face off against Team GO Rocket’s Arlo in Pokémon GO this January 2024 and with the right team, he can be easily defeated. It is worthwhile to try and take down the three leaders, including Arlo, as it will offer a rare opportunity for you to catch a strong Shadow Pokémon. It is also required if you are looking to face off against the strongest AI opponent in the game Team GO Rocket Boss Giovanni.

item.title: How to Beat Auntie Ethel (The Hag) In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAuntie Ethel may seem sweet as she calls you Petal, but the Hag hidden within puts up a fight in Baldur’s Gate 3 that requires a strategy to win. During this conversation, players may choose to aid the boys in searching for their sister or deal with them for poor Auntie Ethel. The best course of action here is to knock the boys out by using non-lethal attacks.

item.title: How To Beat Cliff In Pokémon GO (December 2023)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewYou can beat Team GO Rocket Leader Cliff in Pokémon GO easily if you pick the right line-up that is super-effective against him this December 2023. Like all other Team GO Rocket Leaders, Cliff saw a change in his lineup in late October, but this has not changed further for December 2023. You will need to defeat grunts before facing Cliff, but you will need to get past him if you want to take on Team GO Rocket boss Giovanni.

item.title: How To Beat Cliff In Pokémon GO (January 2024)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewYou can beat Team GO Rocket Leader Cliff in Pokémon GO easily if you pick the right line-up that is super-effective against him this January 2024. Cliff’s line-up hasn’t changed in Pokémon GO since October 2023, so there won’t be any surprises if you have challenged him in recent months. If you want to go on to challenge Giovanni in January 2024, you will first need to overcome Cliff’s tough squad.

item.title: How To Beat Crispin In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe first member of the Blueberry League Elite Four to beat is Crispin, a powerful Fire-type trainer in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC. Those looking to face Crispin must first complete his Elite Trial, which involves making a spicy sandwich in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet. You have to gather different ingredients, including Onion, Chorizo, Mustard, Chili Sauce, and Jalapeño. Defeating trainers in the Trial will let you get other food items you can trade away for the materials you need, and let you make the sandwich with ease.

item.title: How To Beat Cynthia, The Drowned Lady In Alan Wake 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCynthia, the Drowned Lady, is seen in the fifth chapter in Alan Wake 2 during Inspector Saga’s story as a dark spirit you must beat in a boss fight. Those who played the original Alan Wake may remember Cynthia as a character from that game, who has now unfortunately succumbed to the dark forces that plague the land. There are two phases to this boss fight, one as the apparition lurks underwater and another when Cynthia becomes exposed.

item.title: How To Beat General Uvishka In Prince Of Persia The Lost Crown
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe first boss you face in Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown is General Uvishka, a fearsome enemy warrior who you have to beat in two intense phases. General Uvishka is part of the tutorial level for Prince of Persia: TLC, and is found not too long after you are taught the basic fighting mechanics against Kushan soldiers. Even without time-warping abilities, Sargon has every tool they need to take down this fearsome leader.

item.title: How To Beat Giovanni In Pokémon GO (December 2023)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo get a chance at capturing a Legendary Shadow Pokémon, you will need a strong party. Here are the best counters for Giovanni in December 2023. The Pokémon that Giovanni uses in two of his three rounds are subject to change and are occasionally altered after a few months. His first Pokémon never changes. Compared to the three Team GO Rocket leaders, preparing a party to counter Giovanni is much easier.

item.title: How To Beat Giovanni In Pokémon GO (January 2024)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTeam GO Rocket Boss Giovanni returns for trainers to face in Pokémon GO with a familiar line-up for January 2024 led by Legendary Shadow Regigigas. If you haven’t already defeated him, beating Giovanni in January gives you the chance to catch the Legendary Normal-type Pokémon Regigigas. You will once again need to first defeat the three Team GO Rocket leaders, Arlo, Sierra, and Cliff, before being able to face Giovanni at Pokéstops.

item.title: How To Beat Hel In Assassin s Creed Valhalla Forgotten Saga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe new Forgotten Saga expansion to Assassin’s Creed Valhalla introduces the powerful Queen of Niflheim, Hel, as a boss you can learn to beat. You start the Forgotten Saga in Assassin’s Creed Valhalla differently from the base game since the expansion is actually a roguelite instead of the standard gameplay you might expect. Every time Odin dies, he starts back at his camp with randomized armor and weapons.

item.title: How To Beat Jahandar (or Manticore) In Prince of Persia The Lost Crown
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne of the more difficult boss fights in Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown is against the deadly Manticore named Jahandar as you travel in the Citadel. Jahandar stands in the way of your search to find Prince Ghassan in the upper sections of the Lower City, but only when you have fully repaired the Goddess Statue. Several purple orbs caused by the time curse must be destroyed to fix the damaged structure.

item.title: How To Beat Lava Elementals In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Lava Elemental is a tough enemy found in the Underdark in Baldur’s Gate 3. Players will need to employ specific tactics to defeat this foe. Exploring the Adamantine Forge in Baldur’s Gate 3 allows the party to claim pieces of unique Adamantine gear, making it one of the most important side quests in Act One. Although you don’t actually need to beat the Lava Elemental for this quest, it’s still highly likely that you’ll encounter it while exploring the area.

item.title: How To Beat Marbled Gohma In Zelda TOTK (Fire Temple Boss)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Marbled Gohma is the Fire Temple Boss in Zelda TOTK. Link will need to beat it by targeting its weak spot with the help of Goron, Yunobo. Like the other Temple bosses in Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, the Marbled Gohma appears as a boss, and Link does not have to fight alone. The Goron Yunobo assists you throughout this fight with a Charge Attack that Link can use to attack Gohma’s legs and stagger the Cyclops.

item.title: How To Beat Moragia In Zelda TOTK (Tips, Tricks & Strategies)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAn aerial boss battle takes place against Moragia in Zelda: TOTK, which may take several strategies and tricks to beat using a hovering Zonai vehicle. You will encounter Moragia during the “Yunobo of Goron City” quest, one of the four major Regional Phenomena that Link must investigate. As you arrive at Death Mountain, you will learn that the monster is made of magma, and you must defeat it with Yunobo’s help.

item.title: How To Beat Scratch (Final Boss) In Alan Wake 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe final boss of Alan Wake 2 tests everything you’ve learned as you must beat Scratch, an evil creature of darkness whose corruption must be stopped. From this point on, expect heavy spoilers for the ending sections of Alan Wake 2. Scratch has possessed Alan Wake for this battle as you play as Inspector Saga, who originally came to the town of Bright Falls to solve a series of ritualistic murders.

item.title: How To Beat Sierra In Pokémon GO (December 2023)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo beat Sierra in Pokémon GO in December 2023, you will be required to form a powerful team. Here are the best counters for Sierra this month. Although it is not too often, leaders of Team GO Rocket occasionally change their lineup, which requires Trainers to adapt accordingly. The strategy to beating Sierra in November 2023 has now changed slightly, as she altered one of the possible Pokémon in her lineup.

item.title: How To Beat Sierra In Pokémon GO (November 2023)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTeam GO Leader Sierra returns for trainers to face in Pokémon GO with a new line-up for November 2023 and is tough to beat without the right Pokémon. To be able to complete the new Special Research Task fully, you will need to beat Team GO Boss Giovanni this November, but this can only be done once you have beaten the three Team GO leaders including Sierra. Sierra’s team has changed in recent months, but she will still use three out of seven Pokémon in battle.

item.title: How To Beat The BB League Elite Four (Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Elite Four trainers of the Blueberry League (BB) are hard opponents to beat in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC, unless you’re prepared. One piece of advice before challenging the Elite Four is to make sure your Pokémon are at least Level 75 or higher. The signature Pokémon of nearly all the Elite Four members is Level 80, but the rest of their team is usually between Levels 75-78.

item.title: How To Beat The Nightingale In Alan Wake 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRobert Nightingale is the first boss fight of Alan Wake 2. It serves as Saga’s initial major threat and a form of gameplay tutorial. Nightingale mainly shows up during “Return,” which are Saga Anderson’s story chapters in the real world. His boss fight serves as the first major challenge and a form of tutorial on Saga’s gameplay. Several prompts and in-game hints will appear by default. How To Defeat Nightingale Boss - Phase 1

item.title: How To Beat The Sword Master In Prince Of Persia The Lost Crown
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Sword Master is the second boss you face in Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown, and is the opponent who can only be beat with a careful strategy. There are no upgrades or items that Sargon would ordinarily be able to use against many of the bosses seen later in the cursed Citadel in Prince of Persia: TLC. However, you still have basic combat skills from the tutorial level, where you fought against the Kushan army.

item.title: How To Beat The Undead Prisoner In Prince of Persia The Lost Crown
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Undead Prisoner is a boss you have to beat in Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown as you try to make your way toward the forests beyond the Citadel. Make sure to spend Time Crystals at The Mage’s shop in The Haven area to upgrade the amount of Potions Sargon has in Prince of Persia: TLC. While you may not have access to time travel mechanics in the game yet, you do have the opportunity to improve your ability to heal.

item.title: How To Beat Your Friends At Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Tips & Tricks For Pro Players)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThough there is no foolproof trick to win Mario Kart 8 Deluxe every time, there are several things that can increase the chances of winning. Some of these tips include holding onto specific items, choosing your setup carefully, and even practicing course shortcuts. Though this may not guarantee a win every time, playing more strategically can increase the odds significantly, more than just running the current meta.

item.title: How To Become a Lawyer In BitLife
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are many professions you can pursue in BitLife, including a Lawyer, whose dedication to the law becomes a reflection of this hard career path. This path’s humanitarian nature means that you must follow a specific route throughout your education. You do not need a STEM degree in BitLife to eventually take on a position at a law firm, so don’t feel worried about pursuing a degree that would expand your background.

item.title: How to Build a Fast Travel Hub in Valheim
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAs time passes in Valheim, your need for teleporters can grow fast, but with everything else you need to build you may want to make a travel hub room. The best way to make a Portal “hub” comes from making at least two Portals near each other as you expand your base. You will need plenty of materials to construct each Portal, and you may want to build a fast travel area in a space that can be protected from enemies.

item.title: How To Build The Armory In Assassins Creed Valhalla
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne of the structures you can build for your settlement in Assassin’s Creed Valhalla is the Ravensthorpe Armory, but this project demands many items. The only location where you can build an Armory is in a Level 3 or higher settlement you’ve chosen to expand in Assassin’s Creed Valhalla. Creating the Armory is easy and requires you to spend 100 Foreign Supplies once your settlement meets this prerequisite.

item.title: How To Carry More Items In Modern Warfare 3 Zombies
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewItems and loot from each deployment in Modern Warfare 3 Zombies are sometimes too abundant to carry, unless you make space for more in your loadout. One reason why expanding your inventory is so important comes from the different Schematics in Modern Warfare 3 Zombies, which allow you to craft various weapons and gear. These take up a slot in your item storage and are not permanent editions to your Acquisition Stash until you exfil from the map.

item.title: How To Carry Two Primary Weapons In Modern Warfare 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 you need to equip either the Gunner Vest or Overkill Vest to carry two of the primary weapons at one time. Traditionally, in Call of Duty games, you carry one primary weapon, such as one of the best Assault Rifles available, and a secondary weapon, such as a handgun or a melee weapon. However, carrying two primary weapons opens up new possibilities in matches, such as carrying an SMG for close combat alongside a Sniper Rifle for long-range.

item.title: How To Cast Meta Quest 2 To Your TV
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPlayers can cast the Meta Quest 2’s content to a TV so that they can share the experience with other people in the same room. It is worth pointing out that the video cast on the TV will be slightly compressed and won’t be true 3D like in the Meta Quest 2 headset. However, it will be clear enough so that everyone in the room can see what you will be experiencing in the headset.

item.title: How To Catch All Legendary Pokémon In Scarlet & Violet The Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are 25 wild Legendary Pokémon available for catching in Pokemon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC, but each one must be unlocked with an item. However, this is no easy feat, as these exclusive Pokémon are only available after defeating the BB League Elite Four and Kieran, the final boss of the Indigo Disk DLC. Not only that, but many of the legendaries are quite tricky to catch even once located, so players truly have their work cut out for them if they hope to catch ’em all.

item.title: How To Catch Shrimp In Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo catch Shrimp in Disney Dreamlight Valley, Dreamers must be on the lookout for a particular color of fishing nodes along the shores of Dazzle Beach. Bouillabaisse, in particular, is a required dish that you will need to make during the Dreamlight Valley Friendship Quest “Dinner with a Friend.” Goofy will task you to catch several types of sea creatures, including Shrimp. While it is evident that Shrimp can be caught by fishing, the game does not explicitly tell players where or how to acquire the crustacean.

item.title: How To Change Your Appearance In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewYou can now change your character’s appearance in Baldur’s Gate 3. Here’s what you can alter and what is off the table when using the Magic Mirror. There are a few limitations when it comes to changing your appearance after you have already started the campaign, so you will not be able to essentially create a new character mid-game. Nevertheless, this option is easily one of the best changes in Baldur’s Gate 3’s Patch 3.

item.title: How To Charge Controllers For Meta Quest 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewControllers used for the Meta Quest 2 use power similarly to controllers of normal consoles used for gaming, but they do not charge in the same way. Some consoles sell separate charging stations for their controllers, both wired and wireless in some cases. The Meta Quest 2 has additional products you could purchase that automatically charge your controllers in a dock designed to reactivate your virtual reality devices.

item.title: How To Clear The Tur Dulra Stronghold In Diablo 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAn Stronghold known as Tur Dulra can be found in Diablo 4, but this area’s enemies can be difficult to clear as you try to cleanse Sanctuary of evil. The Tur Dulra Stronghold can be found in Scosglen, west of your map toward the coast. Similar to the number of Strongholds in the Fractured Peaks, three of these areas are in this part of Sanctuary. Tur Dulra’s level is determined by what World Tier you’re playing on, indicating the average strength of enemies found and giving you a recommended level to reach with your character.

item.title: How To Complete Rarely Affectionate (Part 2) Quest In Honkai Star Rail
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Rarely Affectionate (Part 2) side quest in Honkai: Star Rail sees players try to complete some repairs for Pascal, the companion robot of Clara. After the Sinners Misled and Credence Falsified main story quests, the Rarely Affectionate series of missions will open up for you to pursue. You must be Trailblaze Level 34 to receive the first messages from the character Clara in Honkai: Star Rail that marks the Robot Settlement as the starting point for this quest.

item.title: How To Complete The Dawning Quest In Destiny 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Dawning quest returns during the holiday season for Destiny 2 Guardians to complete and earn limited-time event rewards through a special Boon. “The Dawning” quest starts when you visit Eva Levante in The Tower, which you can see has greatly changed with the event’s reappearance. Talking to Eva begins the mission in Destiny 2, where this kind NPC asks you to spread some holiday cheer to fellow Guardians.

item.title: How To Complete the Slice & Dice Challenge in BitLife
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIf you want to complete the Slice & Dice Challenge in Bitlife, players will have to live a life of crime that puts some blood on your hands. Unfortunately, you must own the Black Market expansion pack to complete the Slice and Dice challenge in BitLife. This will allow you to buy weapons from an arms dealer in-game, which is required to complete the tasks tied to the challenge.

item.title: How To Complete Walton s Treasure Hunt In Zelda Tears of the Kingdom
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewWalton’s Treasure Hunt is a quest you can find in Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom as you explore Korok Forest, and complete to earn three rare items. Before you can access this quest, you have to free the Korok Forest after you get through the Lost Woods in Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom. This is done by traveling into the large Chasm at the center of the Woods, where Link must take down fearsome enemies.

item.title: How To Craft (& Use) Portals In Valheim
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFast travel is extremely important for getting from place to place in Valheim, so you’ll need to craft and use Portals to teleport over far distances. Making Portals is one of the first things to know in Valheim that helps you explore the overwhelming large world you and your friends are in. A Portal acts as a fast travel point between two places you can set up as you please.

item.title: How To Craft The Aeterna Sword In Star Ocean The Second Story R
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBreak the game and conquer all the party’s enemies with the all-powerful Aeterna Sword in Claude’s hands in Star Ocean: The Second Story R. While Star Ocean: The Second Story R is a remake, the game’s original version also had this sword, but it was called the Eternal Sphere. This sword can be equipped for Claude or Dias, but it is more suited to Claude. There are three main steps for getting the Aeterna Sword, and you will need Claude to have a decent level.

item.title: How To Craft Your Own Gear In Avatar Frontiers of Pandora
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAlthough it is a bit of a perplexing process, learning how to craft your own gear in Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora is well worth the time and effort. The most confusing aspect of crafting is that it uses many of the games’ systems in conjunction with one another. As a result, determining how to obtain the best materials and produce the best gear can take time and effort.

item.title: How To Cut Down Cactus In LEGO Fortnite
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo cut down Cactus in LEGO Fortnite, players must use the upgraded Rare Forest Axe. Crafting this item requires several rare crafting resources. The first step you will need to take is to find the Dry Valley desert biome. Unlike Fortnite’s main Battle Royale mode, which has great seasonal landing spots and landmarks, LEGO Fortnite’s worlds are all procedurally generated. You’ll eventually need to find the Dry Valley to progress, but due to random generation, finding it is a matter of luck.

item.title: How To Do a Triple Threat Attack In Persona 5 Tactica
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn Persona 5 Tactica, one of the many possible moves includes the Triple Threat Attack, which will form a triangle of fire around the party’s enemies After Persona 5 Tactica was previewed earlier this year, it is now available on Game Pass for both Console and PC. Combat is a big part of this game, which revolves around party members that can be swapped in and out, as well as turn-based tactics.

item.title: How To Earn Gols Fast In My Time At Sandrock
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewYour main source of money in My Time At Sandrock are Gols, a currency you can earn fast by obtaining specific upgrades and keeping up with missions. The easiest way to collect Gol comes from completing each Mission tied to the main story, especially the ones early in the game. With the Knives Out update to My Time At Sandrock, there is far more story content you can finish for a large amount of Gol as a reward.

item.title: How To Evolve Cottonee Into Whimsicott In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCottonee is a Grass-/Fairy-type Pokémon in Scarlet and Violet that can be caught in the Indigo Disk DLC. This monster can evolve into Whimsicott. Despite its cute and innocent appearance, Whimsicott can hold its own in battles with its impressive speed and debilitating moves. A good example is Cotton Spore, which can reduce the opponent’s speed by two stages, making it a valuable asset in battles. Fairy-type is also incredibly powerful on the team, being an excellent counter to both Dragon- and Dark-type Pokémon in Scarlet and Violet.

item.title: How To Evolve Dipplin Into Hydrapple (Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn order to evolve Dipplin into the new Hydrapple in the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, you need to follow some steps. This sister school to Naranja and Uva Academies is located in the Unova region, but in the middle of the ocean. There, you can focus on tough battles in the Terarium but also find the many Pokémon that compose the Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC’s Blueberry Pokédex.

item.title: How To Evolve Galarian Slowpoke Into Slowbro & Slowking (Pokémon S&V Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewGalarian Slowbro has been re-introduced in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet via the Indigo Disk DLC, but evolving it will require hunting on the beaches. To be able to get the Galarian poison-type versions of Slowbro and Slowking, players will need first to track down the Galarian Slowpoke, who will only be found in the Indigo Disk DLC Coastal Biome of terrarium. Galarian Slowpoke can usually be found along one of the beaches in the sand.

item.title: How To Evolve Hisuian Qwilfish Into Overqwil In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewHisuian Qwilfish and Overqwil return from Legends: Arceus in the Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC. Here’s how to get both these creatures in the Gen 9 games. While the original creature does not evolve into any Pokémon, Hisuian Qwilfish has an evolution called Overqwil. This is considered a Gen 8 monster. To obtain Overqwil in Pokémon Legends: Arceus, you had to evolve it from Hisuian Qwilfish. The process involved a special training method, which saw Hisuian Qwilfish utilize Barb Barrage in its Strong Style 20 times in battle and then level up.

item.title: How To Evolve Inkay Into Malamar (Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewInkay is a weird Pokemon to evolve in Pokemon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC, turning into a Malamar if you use an old trick from previous games. Inkay are ubiquitous pocket monsters to find in the Coastal Biome quadrant of Blueberry Academy in the expanded content. This area can be fine-tuned to include rare starter Pokémon in Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk, but you don’t need to do this to find an Inkay.

item.title: How To Evolve Kubfu Into Urshifu (Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Pokemon Kubfu in Pokemon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC can evolve into two different forms of Urshifu depending on the item you give it. You can evolve two types of Urshifu from Kubfu: Single Strike Style Urshifu or Rapid Strike Style Urshifu. The Scroll of Darkness item turns Kubfu into the Single Strike variant, and the Scroll of Waters creates the Rapid Strike version. Ordinarily, these Scrolls were obtained through Battle Towers, but there is a different method for getting them in the DLC for Pokemon Scarlet & Violet.

item.title: How To Evolve Milcery Into Alcremie (Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are over 70 forms of Alcremire that Milcery evolves into in Scarlet and Violet with Sweets and mixing types at different times of the day. To find Milcery in the wild in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, first make sure to purchase the downloadable content, The Indigo Disk. Unlock and fly over to the Polar Biome in the Blueberry Academy and look for a big cave in the middle of the map.

item.title: How To Evolve Seadra Into Kingdra In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewEvolving Seadra into Kingdra will require players to hunt down a specific item in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet and find a partner to trade with. Quite like some other Pokémon, Seadra must be traded while holding a specific item to evolve into Kingdra. The item in question, a Dragon Scale, can be obtained easily through one of two ways. The first method involves progressing the Indigo Disk DLC Pokédex, while the other will require completing BBQs in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk to earn BP.

item.title: How To Evolve Tyrogue Into Hitmontop, Hitmonchan & Hitmonlee (Pokémon S&V Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTyrogue has three different evolutions in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC, and which one you get depends on your Pokémon’s stats. However, when it comes to Tyrogue’s evolutions, things can get a little complicated. If you want to get a specific version of its evolution, you’ll need a Tyrogue with the appropriate stats. This may appear troubling at first, but it’s a far easier process than evolving some of the other Pokémon in the game, such as how to evolve Milcery into Alcremie.

item.title: How To Export Electricity In Cities Skylines 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe demand for expansion in Cities: Skylines 2 can leave you spending a lot of money, making the export of electricity a good way to get it back. A good rule of thumb regarding electricity is that you should always generate more power than your city needs, and never just the bare minimum. Making money fast in Cities: Skylines 2 only comes after you put yourself into a good position to start taking risks.

item.title: How To Export Water In Cities Skylines 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewStriving for an efficient water export in Cities: Skylines 2 is one of the best and quickest ways you can make money early in the game. As mentioned, exporting water is one of the ways you can make money fast in Cities: Skylines 2. In addition, you can export electricity to double your profits. However, you must prioritize making these services as efficient as possible early in the game.

item.title: How To Farm Bomb Flowers Zelda Tears of the Kingdom (The Fast Way)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBomb Flowers are very useful items for combat or solving puzzles in Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, so players should try to farm plenty in fast ways. One of the most common uses for Bomb Flowers is for breaking cracked rock formations, which are seen in caves or across Hyrule in different locations. During the early stages of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, this plant is the only way to get past these rocks.

item.title: How To Farm Gems In Devil May Cry Peak of Combat
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewGems are the primary currency of Devil May Cry: Peak of Combat, and can be farmed by completing specific missions and challenges within the game. One of the obvious ways to gain a lot of Gems fast is to buy the Gem Packs and Value Cards offered by the in-game shop of DMC: Peak of Combat. Value Cards automatically give you 100 Gems per day for 30 days, giving you a constant supply for a limited time.

item.title: How To Farm Midwinter Blight Tribute Tiers In Diablo 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Midwinter Blight seasonal event for Diablo 4 offers a ton of new gear and rewards, especially for any character that farms various Tribute Tiers. There are three Tribute Tiers your character can achieve throughout The Midwinter Blight. Reaching these “ranks” will give you two prizes for every level and a special Midwinter Ward reward for those who make it to Tier 3. Characters on World Tier 3 in Diablo 4 or above may have a harder time advancing through Tiers due to the higher difficulty.

item.title: How To Farm Nourishing Extract In Monster Hunter World
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewNourishing Extract is a material in Monster Hunter World that can be used to create some of the most helpful consumable items for a hunt. The primary way of gathering Nourishing Extract is by hunting Odogaron, Dodogama, and Paolumu. Each of these monsters has a chance to drop the material as a hunt reward. Breaking parts and capturing do not increase these rates. Hunters should focus on completing quests and investigations that feature any of these three monsters.

item.title: How To Farm Purple Flower Coins Fast In Super Mario Bros. Wonder
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPurple Flower Coins are used to unlock new areas and buy powerful items in Super Mario Bros. Wonder, making them an item you’ll want to farm fast. Some Toad workers around various Worlds will ask for Purple Flower Coins to unlock new paths, leading to new levels and other stages you can’t normally reach. Those trying to find secret areas like the W1 Pipe-Rock Plateau Special Course in Super Mario Bros.

item.title: How To Farm Stellar Tera Shards In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk (The Fast Way)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewStellar Tera Shards are a rare but important item in The Indigo Disk DLC, but you won’t be able to farm them effectively until late in the game. Terastallization is a major mechanic in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet, as it changes the type of the affected Pokémon.
