It is the main mechanic behind the ever-popular Tera Raid Battles and adds a new strategic edge to Pokémon battles as a whole.

item.title: How To Feed Chickens In Stardew Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn Stardew Valley, players need to feed their chickens hay, which can be bought or harvested from grass, in order for them to grow and produce eggs. To get started with raising chickens, you must first build a Coop that can house up to four chickens. You can purchase the farm building from Robin for 4,000 gold, 100 stone, and 300 wood. Once the coop is built, you can purchase a chicken from Marnie for 800 gold.

item.title: How To Find (& Beat) Alternate Sargon In Prince Of Persia The Lost Crown
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAlternate Sargon is a dark version of yourself that you must beat four separate times in Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown as you find new locations. There are four Alternate Sargon boss fights in Prince of Persia: TLC, but only one is required as part of a quest within the main story. Similar to how you can beat Living and Undead Erlik, extra fights can be found when you explore your map of the Citadel.

item.title: How to Find (& Catch) Archaludon (Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewArchaludon is a Steel-/Dragon-type you can find in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC when you catch a Duraludon and evolve it with an item. There is no place to catch Archaludon in The Indigo Disk, or find the Pokémon in the wild areas of the expanded content’s new map. However, you can capture Duraludon in the Polar Biome area to obtain the Pokémon that evolves into the desired Steel-/Dragon-type.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Articuno In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewArticuno is one of the three Legendary birds of the Kanto region. Trainers can catch this Pokémon after the Indigo Disk DLC in Scarlet and Violet. As more types have continued to be added to the franchise, the Ice-type has progressively weakened defensively. Currently, there are four weaknesses and only one resistance. However, Generation 9 has replaced the move Hail with Snowscape, which creates a snowstorm and raises the defense of Ice-type Pokémon by 50%.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Every Gen 1 Pokémon Starter in Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe classic starters from Red & Blue are all available in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC, but they require effort to unlock. Bulbasaur, Charmander, and Squirtle can each be found in different specialized biomes run by the Blueberry Academy. While you head to Blueberry Academy at the start of the DLC, you’ll have to progress through the main storyline more before you can start working on the biomes.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Every Gen 2 Pokémon Starter in Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe iconic Gold, Silver, & Crystal starter Pokémon Chikorita, Cyndaquil, and Totodile return for you to find and catch in the Indigo Disk DLC. The character Clavell will invite you on a trip to the Blueberry Academy to start off The Indigo Disk DLC. Going through the story of this content will eventually unlock the League Club - a place where you can earn Battle Points (BP) to spend on quests in the Terarium.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Every Gen 3 Pokémon Starter in Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewStarter Pokémon have arrived with the Indigo Disk DLC, including the Treeko, Torchic, and Mudkip from the Gen 3 Ruby, Sapphire, & Emerald games. The new and returning Pokémon to Scarlet & Violet’s DLC include a variety of fan favorites, like the Ruby, Sapphire, & Emerald starters. You have to finish the main story of the game and the first part of the DLC to access The Indigo Disk.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Every Gen 4 Pokémon Starter in Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewEvery Diamond & Pearl starter from the Sinnoh Region returns in the Indigo Disk DLC as Pokémon you can find by boosting the diversity of map areas. The Diamond & Pearl starters are exclusive Pokémon to Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s The Indigo Disk DLC, so you have to purchase the expansion to have access to these iconic creatures. The steps to unlocking each Pokémon are tied to the League Club, the group you earn Battle Points (BP) from by finishing quests.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Every Gen 5 Pokémon Starter (Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewWith the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet & Violet, you can now catch Gen 5 Black & White Starter Pokémon after completing some club requests. When you arrive at Blueberry Academy at the start of the Indigo Disk DLC, you’ll see that the area is split into four biomes. As you progress through the main story, you’ll unlock a feature called the Support Board, where the League Club helps the other clubs and students at the Academy.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Every Gen 6 Pokémon Starter (Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Gen 6 Starter Pokémon from X & Y can join your adventures in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet through the Indigo Disk DLC and its special biomes. The Starter Pokémon will not appear in the Blueberry Academy biomes until you progress through the main story. Early on in the DLC, following your tutorial for BBQs (Blueberry Quests), you will have to fight Carmine, who will then formally invite you to the school’s League Club.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Every Gen 7 Pokémon Starter (Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC introduces a way to catch every starter from past Generations, including those from Gen 7’s Sun & Moon. The areas around Blueberry Academy are split into four diverse Biomes for you to explore when you start the second part of the expanded content. The map size of Indigo Disk DLC already has a variety of Pokémon to encounter, but even more can be added.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Every Gen 8 Pokémon Starter (Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAll starters have been added to Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC, including the Gen 8 Sun & Moon starters, Grookey, Scorbunny, & Sobble. Unfortunately, though every previous generation’s starter Pokémon has been added to the Indigo Disk DLC Pokédex, none will be available from the start. Instead, players will need to progress in the game, specifically in earning BP, which unlocks all Pokémon starters. How To Find (& Catch) Every Gen 3 Pokémon Starter in Indigo Disk DLC Starter Pokémon have arrived with the Indigo Disk DLC, including the Treeko, Torchic, and Mudkip from the Gen 3 Ruby, Sapphire, & Emerald games.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Glastrier In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet & Violet brings back the Legendary creature Glastrier for you to find and catch by completing various quests. The quests tied to unlocking Glastrier are exclusive to Pokémon Scarlet, but there are ways to get the Legendary in Pokémon Violet despite this. Similar to finding the Legendary bird Zapdos, Glastrier appears on your map once you get a Treat item tied to the Pokémon.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Gouging Fire (Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewGouging Fire is a new Legendary beast to find in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC, but it can be hard to catch this ancient form of Entei. Gouging Fire is a Paradox Pokémon in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk and is, therefore, only available in one game version. Pokémon Scarlet is the only place to obtain this Entei variant, but you could receive one in a trade if you only have Pokémon Violet.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Iron Boulder (Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Legendary Pokémon Iron Boulder is a rare creature you can find and catch in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC if you finish a quest. Many new versions of old Legendary Pokémon have been added to the expanded content, including creatures like Gouging Fire in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC. Iron Boulder is exclusive to Pokémon Violet and can only be acquired for Pokémon Scarlet through trading.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Iron Crown in Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCatching Iron Crown in the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet requires unlocking its encounter and locating it. Here’s how to do it. Instead of being a Steel- and Fighting-type creature, Iron Crown is a Steel- and Psychic Pokémon. Like most other futuristic Paradox Pokémon, Iron Crown maintains most of the structural design of its predecessor but substitutes its biological corporeal elements for various plaques of steel and tubes that contain some sort of liquid.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Kyogre In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCatching Kyogre in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk will require you to get a Treat Key from Mr. Snacksworth by completing Blueberry Quests. Kyogre is a Water-type Legendary from Ruby & Sapphire (Gen 3) who can start a dangerous storm in its vicinity. The legendary Pokémon is a powerful team member to have, and in order to catch Kygore, you will have to complete many Blueberry Quests, a procedure you have to follow to catch every Legendary Pokémon in Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC.

item.title: How to Find (& Catch) Latias In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewLatias is obtainable in the Pokémon Scarlet and Violet Indigo Disk DLC after the player has finished the main story line of the Blueberry Academy. Latias is an exclusive Legendary to Pokémon Violet, unlocked through Blue Berry Quests or BBQs. However, through internet connectivity, Pokémon Scarlet players can obtain her through Group BBQs. After completing the main quests in The Indigo Disk, an NPC called Snacksworth will be waiting for you at the entrance to the Blueberry Academy.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Latios in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBefore you can catch Latios in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC, you need to unlock its encounter and find its spawning location. How to Find (& Catch) Latias In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC Latias is obtainable in the Pokémon Scarlet and Violet Indigo Disk DLC after the player has finished the main storyline of the Blueberry Academy. Beloved Pokémon from the series, such as Metagross, Minior, and several of the previous starters made their way into the Generation 9 games.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Meloetta (Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewMeloetta is one of the many legendary pocket monsters that have become available in the Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC. According to Pokédex entries for Meloetta, the singing of this Mythical Pokémon can control the feelings of those who hear it, pacifying aggressive foes. In battle, Meloetta can use its signature move, Relic Song, to switch between the Normal-/Psychic-type Aria Forme and the Normal-/Fighting-type Pirouette Forme.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Minior In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewWith no direction from the Pokédex, catching a Minior in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC can be an especially hard undertaking. Minior are especially hard to locate Pokemon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC because the Pokédex does not specify where to look for them. Furthermore, Minior is a Rock-type Pokémon that comes in eight different colors, with some of the variants, such as Black (Shiny) being especially rare.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Raging Bolt in Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRaging Bolt is a new Paradox Pokémon introduced with the Indigo Disk DLC for Scarlet and Violet. Here’s how to unlock it and Raging Bolt’s location. In fact, Area Zero itself is getting a few new Paradox Pokémon for you to hunt. One such creature is Raging Bolt. This is the ancient Paradox form of Raikou, the Legendary Electric-type from Generation 2. Raging Bolt is part of the same unnamed group as Walking Wake, which is Suicune’s ancient Paradox version.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Raikou In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Electric-type Legendary hound Raikou returns from the Johto region for you to find and catch in the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet & Violet. Raikou should not be confused with Raging Bolt in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC, which is only available in Pokémon Scarlet. The familiar Legendary can be caught in both editions, but you have to finish the main story of the base game to reach the rare Pokémon.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Reshiram In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Vast White Legendary of the Unova Region, Reshiram, can be caught in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet around the East Province of Paldea. Once you have finished Indigo Disk’s story, go to the entrance of the Blueberry Academy. An NPC in a suit and tie named Snacksworth will be standing to the left of the entrance. Interact with him to start searching for all Legendary Pokémon in Indigo Disk, including Reshiram.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Solgaleo in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo unlock and then find Solgaleo’s location in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, you will first need to complete a few tasks in the Indigo Disk DLC. The creature is one of the many Legendary Pokémon from previous titles that made their way into the Gen 9 games (Pokémon Scarlet and Violet). Like all of these Legendary monsters, there is a specific set of tasks to unlock Solgaleo’s encounter.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Terapagos In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewEven though the Terapagos is a guaranteed catch in the Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC, you’ll have to put up a worthy fight to obtain it. Warning: The following article contains spoilers for Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC. The good news is that catching a Terapagos is not a game of luck or chance; everyone is guaranteed to encounter and catch the Legendary Pokémon as it is tied to the main story.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Terrakion In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTerrakion is one of 25 Legendary Pokémon available for catching as part of Pokemon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk’s post-game, but it requires an item. Essentially, Snacksworth is willing to exchange Legendary Pokémon snacks in exchange for completing Solo BBQs and Group BBQs in Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC. While speaking with him, he will instruct how many more BBQs must be completed for the next snack, and for those who have already started, he will hand out whatever has been earned thus far.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Virizion In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewHere’s how to unlock Virizion’s encounter in the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet and its exact location in the region of Paldea. Like all returning Legendaries in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC, Virizion’s encounter must be unlocked by progressing through the story and gaining access to a special NPC called Snacksworth. This character is located near the entrance of Blueberry Academy, where you first arrive at the sister school to Naranja and Uva Academies from Paldea.

item.title: How To Find (& Catch) Zapdos In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewZapdos can be found flying through the skies of Pokémon Scarlet and Violet after completing the Indigo Disk DLC and receiving the Zapdos Treat. Once the main story of The Indigo Disk has been completed in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, go to the entrance of the Blueberry Academy. As stated before, an NPC called Snacksworth will gift you treats after completing 10 BlueberryQuests or BBQs. These treats let you find Legendary Pokémon around the Paldrea, Kitakami, and Blueberry Academy maps.

item.title: How to Find (& Fly) An Ikran in Avatar Frontiers of Pandora
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAn Ikran is a massive winged creature that you can find and fly as a mount in Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, letting you explore the world in new ways. You find an Ikran during the “Take Flight” quest, a well-named mission tied to the 11th Chapter of the main story. Although this is close to the ending of Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, there are still plenty of things to do with your mount once you bond with it.

item.title: How To Find (& Rescue) Zevlor In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Tiefling Prince Zevlor is someone you can find and rescue in Baldur’s Gate 3 once you reach the Mind Flayer Colony area near the end of Act 2. In order to save Zevlor, you need to help the Tieflings during Act 1 of Baldur’s Gate 3. This means you cannot slaughter the Tiefling group; otherwise, the quest to save Zevlor will not be available later on. Once you reach the Moonrise Towers in Act 2, the “Rescue the Tieflings” quest ties into the events from earlier where members of that group were captured.

item.title: How To Find (& Use) Soul Coins in Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSoul Coins are rare items you can find within locations and quests in Baldur’s Gate 3 that you may use to power up a specific companion in battle. A Soul Coin does not weigh anything when in your inventory and is worth 10 Gold Pieces. While this item may not seem much at first, reading the “Soul Coin: A Treatise” will give you more information about this currency.

item.title: How to Find (& Use) The Memory Shard in Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Memory Shard is a rare item you can find in Baldur’s Gate 3 and use to locate a legendary location in the Underdark called the Adamantine Forge. This means you will need to reach the Underdark in Baldur’s Gate 3’s Act 1. You can reach the Underdark by using a hidden door in the Shattered Sanctum after you get past the Ogre in the Defiled Temple. You will need to locate the Selunite Temple in the Underdark in order to get the Memory Shard.

item.title: How To Find (& Use) The Strange Battery In Risk Of Rain Returns
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFinding the Strange Battery in Risk of Rain Returns is a challenge in and of itself, but figuring out what it does can be equally difficult. Risk of Rain Returns is another great roguelike game similar to Hades, in that players will restart over and over to unlock all the content and find all the secrets. It is also a remake of the original game, following Risk of Rain 2 that reviewed quite positively.

item.title: How to Find Dr. Jansen in Modern Warfare 3 Zombies
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA special Extraction mission in Modern Warfare 3 Zombies asks you to find Dr. Jansen, a character whose position is hard to find on the Urzikstan map. The orders to discover Dr. Jansen come after you have completed another mission called “Where’s Dr. Jansen?” Finishing that quest allows you to drop into Urzikstan again and travel to an exfil, or a portal that transports you to a different map for the mission.

item.title: How To Find The Ghost Ship In Prince of Persia The Lost Crown
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Ghost Ship In Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown is hidden away with no clear route marked on the map, but it offers great treasures. Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown marks a successful return for the series, albeit in a very different 2D scrolling style, but this does make finding secrets that bit harder. While the in-game map has key locations marked, it isn’t the most helpful in showing you which way you need to go.

item.title: How To Find The Nightsong In Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFinding the Nightsong is one of Baldur’s Gate 3’s longest quests, with deep links to companion quests and choices that can affect the final battle. Luckily, you don’t need to do much extra prep to find the Nightsong as long as you have a strong party composition and a solid character build planned out. To start the Find the Nightsong quest, chat with Aradin, the adventurer in the Emerald Grove, after fighting the goblin raiders at the gates.

item.title: How to Finish the Masterwork Weapon in Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne of the rarest weapons to create in Baldur’s Gate 3 is the Masterwork Weapon, a special tool that you can finish as part of a side quest in Act 1. The “Finishing the Masterwork Weapon” side mission appears as your party explores the Blighted Village close to Druid Grove. A house on your right entering the Village leads to Highcliff’s Journal, a book you can find to the left of the destroyed fireplace.

item.title: How To Free Orpheus In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewNear the end of Baldur’s Gate 3, you have several chances to free Orpheus, prince of the Githyanki, depending on the choices made along your journey. : 10 Characters Worth Saving In Baldur’s Gate 3 How To Rescue Orpheus In Baldur’s Gate 3 (BG3) There are two paths that help you free Orpheus in Baldur’s Gate 3, either using the Orphic Hammer to break his chains or sacrificing a character to become a Mind Flayer.

item.title: How To Get (& Use) a Radar Booster In Lethal Company
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRadar boosters act as lures and traps against many entities in Lethal Company. They can distract entities and blind them with a bright flash. The radar booster is one of the most useful tools available to you due to the Version 45 flash update. The radar booster can flash and stun about twelve different creatures in the Lethal Company Bestiary, giving at least a few moments for you to attack or get away.

item.title: How To Get (& Use) The Mirror Of Loss In Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Mirror of Loss is a strange magical artifact in Baldur’s Gate 3 you can only use in Act 3 for a rare exchange to your character’s Ability Scores. Your party can find the Mirror of Loss in the Temple of Shar once you travel through enough of Act 2’s main quests. You might even spot the magical effects from the artifact as you complete the Gauntlet of Shar puzzles in Baldur’s Gate 3 within the same area.

item.title: How To Get (& Use) The Resonance Stone In Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Resonance Stone is a unique purple orb found in Act 2 of Baldur’s Gate 3. This item gives a strange condition with both pros and cons for using. Steeped in Bliss gives everyone within its range a boost in energy to correspond with their euphoria. However, the condition also makes its victims open to psychic suggestions. Mechanically, the condition provides an advantage for physical checks but a disadvantage for mental Saving Throws and a new vulnerability to Psychic damage.

item.title: How To Get 100% Exploration In An Area In Genshin Impact
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewGetting 100% exploration for all areas in Genshin Impact is a great endgame activity for those who have beaten most the game’s story content. Similar to how you increase your Adventurer Rank in Genshin Impact, each named region in the game has levels of progress you can see. By looking at your main map, you will see that 100% completion of an area means finding every collectible that spawns in that zone.

item.title: How To Get A Piranha In Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAmong the new fish added into Disney Dreamlight Valley through the Rift in Time expansion, Piranha’s are among some of the most rare to find. Not only is the Piranha necessary to complete a few quests in the Rift in Time expansion, but several new recipes in Disney Dreamlight Valley specifically require this fish, such as Piquant Piranha Soup. However, like every other fish in the game, it has specific requirements that must be met to catch it.

item.title: How To Get Ability Patch In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIf Trainers are looking to unlock the unique Hidden Ability of one of their Pokémon in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, they will need an Ability Patch. However, getting an Ability Patch is much harder as it requires you to participate in 6-Star Tera Raids. You can only access these raids once you’ve completed Pokémon Scarlet and Violet’s main story, defeated all Gym Leaders a second time, and won the postgame tournament at Naranja/Uva Academy.

item.title: How To Get Balloons In LEGO Fortnite (& What Theyre For)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBalloons are one of the most flexible and fun items in LEGO Fortnite. Crafting them involves using a Spinning Wheel and Loom to weave Silk. Balloons in LEGO Fortnite come in two variants: Small Balloons and Large Balloons. You can easily get high up in the air by attaching them to platforms and other structures, allowing you to take scenic hot air balloon rides. They’re also great for exploration, allowing you to survey and find great new landing spots and village sites from a unique perspective.

item.title: How To Get Blast Cores In LEGO Fortnite
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewLEGO Fornite characters can boost their fire power with the rare Blast Core item used for crafting but keep in mind their explosive properties. The reason why you need to find Blast Cores in LEGO Fortnite is for the Metal Smelter. This not only upgrades your items but lets you craft useful survival materials as well. Epic-tier level equipment is also necessary later on in the game, so these Cores are extremely important to find.

item.title: How To Get COD MW3 Monster Energy Rewards
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThanks to a new cross-promotion, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 players can receive and redeem codes for in-game rewards from cans of Monster Energy. You won’t find these codes on an in-game can of Perk-a-Cola; instead, you will need to head out into the real world and buy cans of Monster Energy to grab these rewards. According to Activision, there are a couple of ways to get your codes: by pulling tabs on the cans or uploading your purchase receipts if you live in certain regions.

item.title: How To Get Elven Wood In LOTR Return to Moria
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne of the most important resources to get in LOTR: Return to Moria is Elven Wood, which can be used to craft various upgrades and important tools. Many sources of Elven Wood do not regenerate over time, meaning that you only have a limited number of projects for which you can use the material. You may have to choose to build a certain tool with the Wood, repair a weapon in LotR: Return to Moria, or simply not craft something that you might not need right away.

item.title: How To Get Every Time Power In Prince of Persia The Lost Crown
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPrince of Persia: The Lost Crown has six time powers that alter how Sargon can travel across the battlefield and the city of Mount Qaf on his quest. Each of the six Time Powers in Prince of Persia: TLC can be collected throughout the game’s main story. You can’t beat the game without obtaining these abilities. However, when you come across paths that are too far to access, you may want to know when you can go back and explore this hidden area.

item.title: How To Get Fertilizer in LEGO Fortnite (& What Its For)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFertilizer is an important resource for farming crops in LEGO Fortnite. To find it, players must search near animals such as cows and sheep. Unlike other rarer resources such as LEGO Fortnite’s Marble Slabs, Fertilizer doesn’t need to be crafted or processed from other materials. Instead, it’s a fairly common drop as long as you know where to look, and there are quick and easy ways to collect lots of Fertilizer in LEGO Fortnite’s early, mid, and late-game stages.

item.title: How To Get Gengar In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet (No Online Trading)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPokémon Scarlet and Violet offer an opportunity to obtain Gengar in-game, a Pokémon which is normally received through trading with other players. Haunter evolves into Gengar at any level when it is traded; however, you can get this Pokémon solo, but it still requires trading with an NPC. The Gen 1 Pokémon is not only an essential part of completing your Pokédex but also a great aggressive team member.

item.title: How To Get Gold Safe Keys In Yakuza Like a Dragon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBlackmarkets and making money tend to go hand in hand while playing Yakuza: Like a Dragon. Find the keys to Golden Safes to make even more money. There are three main steps included in the process of retrieving the golden safe keys. The first involves changing Kasuga’s job to Foreman. The second is to find black market merchants across Yokohama and lastly, if you are completely broke, you can repeatedly meet with the man hiding in Korea town.

item.title: How To Get Harris IP Address in Cyberpunk 2077 (The Hunt Quest)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are a multitude of interesting quests for players to complete in Cyberpunk 2077. This guide shows how to get Harris’ IP Address during The Hunt. You must first complete the “I Fought the Law” side quest in order to get Harris’ IP address. Once you have completed the side quest, “The Hunt” quest should now be available in the missions menu. Once you start the quest, you will be asked to locate Rivers’ Nephew.

item.title: How To Get Knotroot In LEGO Fortnite
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewKnotroot is an essential mid-game crafting resource that can be found in caves in LEGO Fortnite. However, to harvest it, players need upgraded tools. You won’t need Knotroot straight away, but once you’ve set up your village and recruited a few LEGO Fortnite Villagers, it quickly becomes essential. Unfortunately, it isn’t immediately obvious where you can find some, and you will also need the Uncommon quality Forest Axe to harvest it.

item.title: How To Get Malignant Rings In Diablo 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFor those hoping to boost their stats, the Malignant Rings in Diablo 4 are a good way to make your character build even more OP than before. The Malignant Rings are powerful tools in Diablo 4’s Season 2 that can boost different class builds. Other Legendary Aspects might be more useful for other players who have different builds, but the Malignant Rings are a useful item for those who are already taking advantage of the Caged Malignant Hearts.

item.title: How To Get Markoheshkir Legendary Staff In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne of the best items for spell casters in Baldur’s Gate 3 is the Markoheshkir, a legendary staff that you can get to channel magic and deal damage. You can find the Markoheshkir Legendary staff in Ramazith’s Tower, the home of a powerful mage whose home is part of the Lower City within Baldur’s Gate 3. The fastest way to reach the Tower is to go to the upstairs area of the Sorcerous Sundries shop.

item.title: How To Get Monster Toughbone In Monster Hunter World
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewGetting Monster Toughbone in Monster Hunter World will take some clever hunting for those hoping to obtain it for crafting materials or to sell. In the Iceborne expansion for Monster Hunter World, quite a few things are introduced to the game, with the Monster Toughbone being one of them. With the DLC came new monsters, items, and a reward called Monster Toughbone. Players will have to have Iceborne to acquire this item and any of the crafting recipes that require it.

item.title: How To Get More Time Crystals In Prince of Persia The Lost Crown
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIf you want to buy upgrades or amulets in Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown, you’ll need to farm a lot of Time Crystals. Luckily, they’re easy to find. If you explore the world and complete quests, you’re sure to collect a lot of Time Crystals. While crystal ore deposits, boss battles, and treasure chests offer plenty of goodies, they don’t respawn. This means that the further you get into the game, the fewer Time Crystals you can collect through quests and exploration.

item.title: How To Get Pecharunt In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Epilogue
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewHere’s how to unlock the encounter with Pecharunt in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, tips on how to beat it, and the best Poké Ball to catch it in. This article contains spoilers for the events of Pokémon Scarlet and Violet’s Epilogue: Mochi Mayhem. There, players will experience a short story involving a mystery plaguing Mossui Town’s residents and will have the chance to encounter and catch Pecharunt. Pecharunt is a dual Poison- and Ghost-type Pokémon that has been pulling some strings for a while and is associated with the Legendary Pokémon Ogerpon, also from the land of Kitakami.

item.title: How To Get Rid Of Copper Rocks In Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIf you want to remove copper rocks in Disney Dreamlight Valley so you can explore more of Eternity Isle, it’s time to upgrade your Royale Pickaxe. As you progress deeper into Eternity Isles, you will be required to remove both small and large copper rocks. Doing so will yield copper, a material used in various crafting recipes. More importantly, however, you will want to break large copper rocks to access the expansion’s new areas, which contain valuable items such as collecting gems on Eternity Isles.

item.title: How To Get Shiny Blue Zircon In Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewShiny Blue Zircon and regular Blue Zircon are rare gems in Disney Dreamlight Valley that are exclusive to one region of Eternity Isle. Unfortunately, Shiny Blue Zircon has no applications in the game yet, other than being sold at Goofy’s Stall for an impressive 2,000 Star Coins. That being said, it could very well be an important resource in future updates and why you’ll want to hold onto it.

item.title: How To Get Spare Parts Fast In Avatar Frontiers of Pandora
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIf you plan on taking advantage of the special ammo types in Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, then you’ll need all the Spare Parts you can get. One of the best beginner tips for Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora is to search for spare parts right away. This is the quickest way to improve your equipment in the game’s early stages. Simultaneously, you’ll want to stockpile Spare Parts for the late game to rely on those special ammo types when you need them most.

item.title: How To Get The Bhaalist Armor Set In Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThose who accept dark urges to murder in Baldur’s Gate 3 have a chance to get the Bhaalist Armor set, which has magical properties to help in combat. Not every class has the proficiency to wield Light Armor like the one from the Bhaalist set. However, if you build your character to get a particular Feat in Baldur’s Gate 3, you might be able to add light armor to the list of gear you can use.

item.title: How To Get The Blade Of Olympus In God of War Ragnarok Valhalla
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewGetting the Blade of Olympus, one of the most powerful weapons in the Valhalla DLC for God of War Ragnarok is a worthwhile quest for Kratos. Warning: The following article contains spoilers for Baldur’s Gate 3. Kratos’ story in God of War Ragnarok now starts a new adventure in the Valhalla DLC, venturing through his past in a roguelite fashion. Kratos has a lot of different weapons, upgrades, and customization choices to make to get through the DLC in one piece, but some are more powerful than others.

item.title: How To Get The Crossbow In Alan Wake 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Crossbow can be a powerful weapon in Alan Wake 2, but you can only get this hunter tool from a Cult Stash hidden deep in the dangerous woods. The Crossbow sits inside a Cult Stash or a container that usually gives you plenty of valuables such as ammo, batteries, or even health items. Most of these act like puzzle boxes you must solve by figuring out a combination code that opens the Stash.

item.title: How To Get The Cruel Sting In Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Cruel Sting can be one of the best Longsword weapons in Baldur’s Gate 3 depending on your build. Here’s where and how to unlock it. The main difference presented by Cruel Sting in comparison to some other swords in the game is its unique weapon ability called Sting The Helpless. With it, if the equipping character is a drow elf, they will deal 1~4 Poison damage against Restrained targets.

item.title: How To Get The Dragons Breath Exotic Rocket Launcher In Destiny 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDestiny 2’s Season of the Wish revamped a classic Destiny 1 weapon called Dragon’s Breath. Here’s how to get the Exotic and its Catalyst. However, unlike many other Rocket Launchers in the game, Dragon’s Breath’s munitions do not simply explode upon contact with the enemy or surface. Instead, rounds fired by Dragon’s Breath stick to whatever they hit and periodically eject incendiary fuel that inflicts Scorch. The longer the Rocket Launcher goes without firing, the more fuel the following shot spreads – additionally, igniting nearby targets helps partially replenish the fuel used by Dragon’s Breath.

item.title: How To Get The Fastest Horse In Red Dead Redemption 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIt can be a drag to explore the Wild West on the wrong steed, but thankfully, getting the fastest horse in Red Dead Redemption 2 solves this problem. The fastest breed of horse doesn’t appear until you have finished Chapter 6 of the main story, making it a creature you won’t see until very late into the game’s content. This makes acquiring this mare one of the best things to do after beating RDR2, along with other rare mounts.

item.title: How To Get The Gravitational Aspect In Diablo 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDiablo IV’s Gravitational Aspect offers a unique upgrade for the Sorceress’ Ball Lightning skill. To get it, players need to farm for Legendary Items Diablo 4’s Codex of Power Aspects are essentially powerful character upgrades. They unlock once you’ve completed certain dungeons, and you can imprint them on gear items to enhance your character’s skills and abilities. However, the Gravitational Aspect is slightly different, as it’s one of the few Aspects that isn’t linked to the Codex of Power or a specific dungeon.

item.title: How To Get The Lidless Wall In Diablo 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Lidless Wall is a Legendary Unique shield for the Necromancer class that makes it easy to clear waves of enemies in Diablo 4’s toughest dungeons. While the Lidless Wall is a dream item for Necromancers in Diablo 4, obtaining it may be a nightmare. Not only is it not a guaranteed drop, it’s an extremely rare one. To make matters worse, you specifically have to grind for it in World Tier 3: Nightmare or World Tier 4: Torment.

item.title: How To Get The Master Sword in Zelda Tears of the Kingdom
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIt’s not an adventure without the Master Sword and Tears of the Kingdom is no exception. Here is exactly how to get Link’s classic sword. Before even finding the Master Sword, you must improve Link’s Stamina for the journey ahead by collecting Stamina Vessels in Tears of the Kingdom. These artifacts add to your overall Stamina ring, sometimes even adding another meter on top of the one you already have.

item.title: How to Get the Mini Seelie Pet & Effects in Genshin Impact
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewGetting a Mini Seelie in Genshin Impact Version 4.3 is a fun plus to participating in the returning Lost Riches event focused on the Seelie guides. Although there are 6 different types of Mini Seelies in Genshin Impact’s Lost Riches, a player can only purchase one. However, as this event comes back, players can collect more. The newest one exclusive right now to this event is the Brilliance Seelie, which can swim next to the player underwater in Fontaine.

item.title: How To Get The Mourning Frost (Baldur s Gate 3 Act 1 Secret Weapon)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewMourning Frost is one of the best quarterstaffs in Act 1 of Baldur’s Gate 3. Here’s how you can unlock the three pieces needed to craft it. Among the scarcity of remarkable gear in Act 1, especially for mages, as they do not usually benefit from the items provided by the Adamantine Forge in Baldur’s Gate 3, Mourning Frost is a great item to add to your inventory.

item.title: How To Get The Perfect Ending In Mass Effect 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOf the five ways Mass Effect 3 can end, the Perfect Ending is the most difficult to achieve. Players need high Total Military Strength to get it. The best ending considered for Mass Effect 3 is when Commander Shepard and his entire Normandy squad survive along with planet Earth. However, to achieve this ending, you will need to meet the same requirements as the original. The process involves getting as many War Assets as possible.

item.title: How To Get The Screwdriver In Alan Wake 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFor those who want to get in every locked door in Alan Wake II, they will need to find the screwdriver to improvise in lieu of keys. In Alan Wake II, there are two main playable protagonists, Alan and Saga, that the players can switch between mostly at will after the beginning of the game. It is during Saga’s storyline that players will be able to find the screwdriver, as it is a necessary piece for advancing her story.

item.title: How To Get The Sentient Amulet In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewWhile exploring the Adamantine Forge in Baldur’s Gate 3, you can find the Sentient Amulet. Players can resist its curse and unlock a new quest. During Act One, you will reach the Grymforge region while exploring the Underdark. Here, you will need to resolve a conflict between the people of Emerald Grove and Goblins. You can deal with the Goblins by poisoning their Party in Baldur’s Gate 3, which will lead you to explore the Underdark, thanks to Halsin’s advice.

item.title: How To Get The Shotgun In Alan Wake 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFinding the shotgun in Alan Wake 2 will make a difference for the difficult boss fights throughout the game, and luckily, players can find one early. There are two different storylines that line up with the two main characters. Players can choose which storyline they follow first at different places in the narrative, although the game will make that decision for you at times. That being said, both protagonists will need all the weapons they can get to survive their journey throughout the game.

item.title: How To Get The Spellsparkler In Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Spellsparkler is a quarterstaff for magical characters in Baldur’s Gate 3 obtained as a reward from Counsellor Florrick for rescuing her. The Spellsparkler comes with the Electric Blood ability. With the Spellsparkler equipped, you get two Lightning Charges after using a spell or cantrip. The Spellsparkler also has the Topple action, which can knock targets Prone for easier assault and resets after a short rest. The Spellsparkler is a reward for rescuing Counsellor Florrick from a massive fire.

item.title: How To Get The Steel Pickaxe In LOTR Return To Moria
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewReaching new areas will prove impossible without a Steel Pickaxe in Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria, so crafting one quickly is important. Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria is a new survival crafting game that allows them to take control of a sturdy Dwarf to craft and build new items. These Dwarves are hardy and will need to stay on their toes to face the darkness of Moria and return to the surface.

item.title: How To Get The Sword of Chaos In Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA Very Rare weapon called the Sword of Chaos is a magic item you can get in Baldur’s Gate 3 if you choose to challenge an intimidating force of evil. Since the Sword of Chaos is classified as a Greatsword, only characters who have proficiency with martial weapons can reliably use this item. Make sure to check someone’s class features if you are wondering if they can use the Sword or not.

item.title: How To Get The Sword of Marvels Early In Star Ocean The Second Story R
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Sword of Marvels is a strong weapon in Star Ocean The Second Story R. By getting it earlier than intended, you can breeze through half the story. The Sword of Marvels does eventually fall out of favor, mostly once you get to the final portions of the game or while doing New Game Plus. If you have already progressed too far, obtaining the sword might not be worth the effort.

item.title: How To Get The Tears of Blood Glyph In Diablo 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSeason 2 of Diablo 4 has introduced many new items to get for upgrading builds, including The Tears of Blood Glyph, which scales up to level 200. Paragon Glyphs like The Tears of Blood are typically special items dropped from dungeons around your map and are upgraded by spending experience points earned from Nightmare Dungeons in Diablo 4. Inserting one of these Glyphs into your Paragon Board affects multiple Nodes that give passive buffs around it.

item.title: How To Get Wool In Palworld
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFarming resources in Palworld is an important part of gameplay in the survival title. Here’s where you can farm Wool, which is used for making Cloth. The game takes on a comic aesthetic with several different Pals to catch. This open-world survival game is multiplayer, so you can enjoy it with friends and meet other players while you explore. To progress further into the game, you will need to get better gear, collect stronger Pals, and expand your base to accommodate these creatures.

item.title: How To Hatch a Sniffler in Minecraft 1.20
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Sniffler is a new passive mob that was added in Minecraft 1.20. This friendly creature does not spawn naturally and must be hatched from an egg. While players are exploring to enchant their armor in Minecraft, they can find unique items in the overworld. One such discovery in version 1.20 is a Sniffler egg. These brand-new items can only be found by using the new brush tool.

item.title: How to Increase Combat Strength in Avatar Frontiers of Pandora
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCombat Strength represents how prepared you are for certain missions in Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, and can be increased in a few different ways. You can check the Combat Strength of your Na’vi in the “Character” section of the main menu, right next to “Quests” and “Skills.” The upper right corner of the screen will show what Level of Strength you have, right below the icon directing you to the Ubisoft Store for the game.

item.title: How To Increase Focus In Palia
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn Palia players will want to expedite their XP gain as much as possible, which can be done by increasing their Focus Bar for max potential. Before playing Palia, there are several good things to know about how the game works. Focus differs slightly between Palia and similar games such as Animal Crossing or Minecraft. Focus will determine how much XP you earn from doing various tasks, and the more you fill your Focus Bar, the better.

item.title: How to Increase Your Profit Factor in Warhammer 40k Rogue Trader
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewProfit Factor determines what you can and cannot purchase from vendors in Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, so increasing it is in your best interests. The good news is that you just need to meet an item’s Profit Factor level to be able to purchase it. Furthermore, while Profit Factor does function sort of like a currency, your Profit Factor points will not be deducted when you make a purchase.

item.title: How to Increase Your Reputation In Warhammer 40k Rogue Trader
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIf you want to get your hands on more goodies from each faction’s merchant in Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, you’ll need to raise your Reputation. At the same time, when it comes to trading, reputation isn’t the only factor to consider. You also need to be focused on increasing your Profit Factor, which is another important in-game mechanic that determines what you can and cannot purchase from the faction’s vendors.

item.title: How To Increase Your Stats In GTA Online
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewStats in GTA Online can be individually increased to create a customized character with various abilities that let you make your mark in Los Santos. Your character has seven stats that you can level up in GTA Online: Driving, Flying, Lung Capacity, Shooting, Stamina, Stealth, and Strength. Simply playing the game will improve some of these scores naturally, but not all of them. If you want to buy the fastest vehicles, take advantage of the best weapons, or outlast your enemies, you’ll need to find out the right activities to increase each stat.

item.title: How To Level Up Fast In Warcraft Rumble
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewWarcraft Rumble may have multiple progressions systems, and by utilizing the right tricks, you can quickly level each one at the same time. In Warcraft Rumble, you must first focus on leveling your overall account. Second, you need to look at leveling each individual unit you own. Finally, you can also level up the quality, or “rarity” of each unit to unlock talent slots, which essentially give them new powerful abilities.

item.title: How to Long (& Short) Rest in Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRest is an essential part of adventuring in RPGs. In Baldur’s Gate 3, players can use Long and Short rests to replenish health and resources. There is a time element to Baldur’s Gate 3, and some time will pass in-game when a player chooses to take a rest. In addition, when the player chooses a short rest, only a portion of their character and companions’ health, spell slots, and resources will return.

item.title: How To Make A Super-Spicy Sandwich In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo battle Crispin in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC, players must complete a trial that requires making a Super Spicy Sandwich. You will need to gather all the ingredients required for the Super-Spicy Sandwich. Unlike most sandwich recipes in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet, the ingredients are not easy to gather and will require you to defeat or trade with trainers in the surrounding area. You will need to follow a few steps as you cannot use the ingredients from your inventory either.

item.title: How To Make Money Fast In Cities Skyline 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBy employing just a handful of money-making strategies, not only can you make money fast in Cities: Skylines 2, but also consistently. Although Cities: Skylines 2 is primarily an intricate city planning game, making money is a significant aspect of it. That’s because everything you do in the development of your city will come at a cost, and it won’t be cheap. As a result, if you want your city to succeed, it’s in your best interest to make money fast.

item.title: How To Make Money Fast In Star Ocean Second Story R
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewGetting money fast is possible in the opening hours of Star Ocean: The Second Story R, and players should take advantage of this method often. There are a lot of very nifty things that can be found early, including things like the Aeterna Sword in Star Ocean: The Second Story R. While the sword is pretty early in the game, FOL can be earned even earlier and consistently across the board for every party member.

item.title: How To Make Money Fast With The Chop Shop In GTA Online
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Chop Shop business in GTA Online allows you to make money quickly by running a Salvage Yard and conducting good old-fashioned grand theft auto. Before you can start reeling in the cash from the Chop Shop business, you’ll need to know all the Salvage Yard Locations in GTA Online and how to unlock them. Furthermore, that covers everything you need to know about the Chop Shop and getting your Salvage Yard up and running.

item.title: How To Make The Most Money In BitLife (& Fast)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are a ton of careers for you to choose from in BitLife, but if you want to make the most money in the game, you should focus on becoming famous. Contrary to popular belief, you can get rich in BitLife without buying any Job Packs. As a result, you don’t have to spend real-world money to make the most money in the game. You don’t even need a fancy career, such as becoming a lawyer In BitLife, to achieve that level of money either.

item.title: How to Open Every Treasure Vault in Hogwarts Legacy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTreasure Vaults are scattered across the Highlands of Hogwarts Legacy, and these are a main way by which players will gain extra gear and outfits. Finding each vault scattered throughout the Hogwarts Legacy map is quite the task but we’ve made it easier by providing each vault location based on region, as well as how to solve the individual puzzles. Completionists should be able to easily identify what they missed by checking the number of vaults completed in each region and comparing it to the lists below.

item.title: How To Play Steam Games On Meta Quest 2 & 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne headset feature for the Meta Quest 2 & 3 is the ability to play different Steam games through virtual reality, but only with the right system. The Meta Quest 2 requires you to have a PC or laptop that you might already use to run Steam games from your library. This system needs Windows 10 or 11 and a Core i5 or higher CPU in its build.

item.title: How To Poison The Goblin Party In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are many ways to approach each encounter in Baldur’s Gate III, for instance, at the Goblin Camp players can poison them instead of fighting. Unless you’re completing an evil playthrough of Baldur’s Gate 3, destroying the Goblin Camp is the best choice, and there are many different ways to do this. A brute force frontal attack is just one possible approach. However, there are also ways to sneak or talk your way into the camp, using skills such as Persuasion, Deception, or Intimidation, to launch a surprise attack.

item.title: How to Raise Favor with Every Navi Clan in Avatar Frontiers of Pandora
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThree different Na’vi Clans that you meet in Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora can sell you strong items and gear if you raise Favor with their tribes. Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora has the Aranahe, Zeswa, and Kame’tire tribes found across the planet that you meet throughout the main story. The Aranahe are weavers and artisans, crafting intricate clothes that can translate into powerful gear for your character. On the other hand, the Zeswa are strong warriors skilled with weapons, while the Kame’tire are expert herbalists that understand the intricacies of Pandora’s nature.

item.title: How To Recruit All Coliseum Fighters In Like a Dragon Gaiden The Man Who Erased His Name
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are 14 fighters you can all recruit in Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name for the many battle challenges in the Coliseum Arena. There are two modes to the Coliseum, with the recruited fighters tied to the Hell Team Rumble battles that see you and your allies take on waves of enemies. Each fighter has a special Heat Skill tied to them, much like Kiryu’s Heat Mode.

item.title: How to Recruit Every Party Member in Star Ocean The Second Story R
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewStar Ocean The Second Story R allows you to recruit six extra party members. This affects combat, side stories, and the ending. Both main characters Claude Kenny and Rena Lanford are mandatory party members, though you can pick who to control - this is similar to the choice of Raymond and Laeticia. This leaves six free slots to recruit other options. After reaching this limit no one else can join.

item.title: How To Remove Creep In Steamworld Build
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRemoving Creep in SteamWorld Build is an essential process and one players must take care of quickly so they can keep building unobstructed. This game fits neatly into the same universe that all the SteamWorld franchise games fall into, but this game focuses on the management side of gameplay. Players will need to create a supply chain and grow the population while at the same time digging deep into the earth to find rocket ship pieces.

item.title: How To Remove Pollution In Cities Skylines 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPollution has major negative effects on city life in Cities: Skylines 2. To remove it, players must carefully manage zoning and building placement. This level of detail allows players to manage Pollution in many different ways. However, the best way to manage Pollution is careful zoning and placement of utilities. Zoning dirty industry and utility buildings far away from residential areas and using eco-friendly alternatives are important first steps for addressing Pollution problems.

item.title: How To Remove Tree Stumps in Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTree Stumps are an obstacle for players in Disney Dreamlight Valley. However, players can remove them with the help of Princess Anna. Once you get the Shovel by completing Disney Dreamlight Valley’s The Royal Tools quest, you will need to upgrade this tool by taking help from certain villagers. While upgrading the Shovel isn’t a straightforward process, it is recommended to get this upgrade as it can also help remove other obstacles.

item.title: How To Reset My Boundary On Meta Quest 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Meta Quest 2 VR Headset is a great way to experience VR gaming, but only if your boundary has been properly set up or reset before playing. First and foremost, players need to ensure that their Meta Quest 2 is set up and both the headset and controllers are charged, as they will need both things to reset the boundary. Next, place the headset on, and you should immediately spawn into your customizable main hub room, where you can access your dashboard.

item.title: How To Restore Statues In LOTR Return to Moria
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRestoring destroyed Statues in LOTR: Return to Moria can provide you with a safe haven, or even offer valuable crafting recipes for powerful gear. Before you even think about addressing broken Statues, you will need to harvest 2 Iron Ingots and 4 Wood Scraps from other locations you’ve discovered. Once you find these simple items, fast travel in LotR: Return to Moria to somewhere safe to build an Iron Hammer.

item.title: How To Resurrect Gale In Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo resurrect Gale in Baldur’s Gate 3, players can follow a complicated set of instructions to make a Scroll of Revivify, or opt for simpler solutions Of all the companions in Baldur’s Gate 3, Gale is perhaps the most prone to being downed or even killed outright. Since he has a small health pool, he can die fairly quickly if he takes massive damage from enemies. However, resurrecting him is worth it, as he has one of the most powerful spells in the game.

item.title: How To Romance Karlach in Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo romance Karlach in Baldur’s Gate 3, players must always be compassionate and heroic. Helping her fix her infernal engine heart is also essential. To romance a companion in Baldur’s Gate 3, you need to win their Approval by picking dialogue and story choices they like. This is harder for some companions than others, and it can be tough to balance approval once you’ve assembled a full party of ragtag misfits.

item.title: How To Romance Shadowheart In Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewShadowheart is the first companion players can recruit in Baldur’s Gate 3 and a potential romantic partner if they play their cards right. Shadowheart is an important character in the overarching story of Baldur’s Gate 3. The more she approves of the player, the easier it will be to romance her. Gaining her approval can change the path of the campaign. Shadowheart prefers it when players are kind to children and animals, allows her to worship Shar, and shows distrust against the Gith.

item.title: How To Save The Iron Throne Prisoners In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSaving the Iron Throne prisoners from their underwater grave is an optional, but incredibly difficult challenge to plan for in Baldur’s Gate 3. The Iron Throne Prison is located underwater, and acts like a smaller dungeon in Baldur’s Gate 3 that you and your party have to explore quickly. You only have a limited number of turns to save every prisoner before the place collapses. The number of rounds is determined by your game’s difficulty, but it will be hard to rescue everyone in any mode due to this restriction.

item.title: How To Scout Monsters in Dragon Quest Monsters The Dark Prince
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRecruiting monsters to your party in Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince requires you to scout them with a show of force from your team of allies. Nearly 500 different new and returning monsters in Dragon Quest Monsters: TDP can be interacted with throughout your adventure. The main character, Psaro, cannot attack monsters, meaning the only way to battle is through a team of allies gained in their travels.

item.title: How To Solo The 7-Star Blaziken Tera Raid In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe upcoming 7-Star Blaziken Tera Raid In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet can be beaten solo if players use a sound strategy and the perfect team. Before accessing this 7-Star Tera Raid in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, complete the base game. This means you must finish the story past Area Zero and complete the Academy Ace Tournament. After completing around 10 5-Star Tera Raids, Jacq will call you about exploring 6-Star Tera Raids, which also unlocks 7-Star Tera Raids.

item.title: How To Solve Herodiana s Puzzles In Hogwarts Legacy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn Hogwarts Legacy’s Hall of Herodiana quest, you have to use the Accio and Depulso spells to move blocks and cross three puzzle rooms for rewards. When you can, speak to Sophronia Franklin, a Ravenclaw student, near the Charms classroom. She will tell you about Herodiana and how this master of the Banishing charm had a private space in Hogwarts that will be marked on your map. Follow the icon on your map to the Astronomy Wing in Hogwarts Legacy and use Depulso to activate a switch that opens up The Hall location.

item.title: How To Solve The Cave of Wonders Puzzle In Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSolving the puzzles in the Cave of Wonders in Disney Dreamlight Valley will get you one step closer to finding answers about Eternity Isle. The Cave of Wonders puzzles are the last quests you will need to do to unlock Gaston in Disney Dreamlight Valley. Before this point, players will have collected Agave Dates and caught Scorpions to keep Gaston from getting too hungry. Following this quest line will eventually lead players right to the door of the Cave of Wonders, and Gaston is happy to let you go inside alone on this one.

item.title: How To Solve The Conundrum Unsolved Puzzle In Pathfinder WotR
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous’ Conundrum Unsolved puzzle is surprisingly simple to solve once you learn the trick behind inserting various slabs. Slab puzzles in Pathfinder: WotR are nothing new, with the one in Conundrum Unsolved being similar to the others you may have encountered before. Before you can begin solving the puzzle, you have to collect slabs from urns in the room with the riddle. Gather as many items called “Slab with Two White Symbols” from around the area, but keep in mind that each symbol is unique with its own icon.

item.title: How To Solve The Open Hand Temple Murders In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are several murders to solve in Baldur’s Gate 3, but the Open Hand Temple Murders will require a little more effort to solve than others. The Open Hand Temple is a location to visit in Act 3 of Baldur’s Gate 3, and your party can immediately find a commotion when you arrive. Many people have gathered to discuss the murder of Father Logan with their theories about who killed the beloved figure.

item.title: How To Solve The Pilgrims Footsteps In Diablo 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne of the new quests found in Diablo 4 Season 2 is called The Pilgrim’s Footsteps, which asks you to solve a small puzzle for a chest full of loot. Your character will have this quest come up when you pick up an Old Book item that says “Walk the road of faith to a lone desert chapel. Stand at Acarat’s feet, follow his example, and be rewarded.

item.title: How To Solve The Reject the Mother Puzzle In Diablo 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Reject the Mother puzzle in Act 3 is one of many riddles in Diablo 4 that asks you to solve the hidden meaning behind a note’s confusing clue. You can start the “Reject the Mother” quest by picking up a Torn Note guarded by enemies in the Dry Steppes area of Diablo 4. Head to a location named Tusmaa Rift to discover a series of cliffs, with the Note resting at the top of the landscape.

item.title: How To Solve The Upper City Chakram Puzzle In Prince Of Persia The Lost Crown
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAs Sargon reaches new areas in the Upper City in Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown, you may come across a difficult Chakram puzzle you must solve. The only way to reach this puzzle in the first place is to get Menolias’ Bow by defeating the boar boss that lurks in the Hyrcanian Forest area. Once you beat Jahandar in Prince of Persia: TLC, you’ll be able to pursue the kidnapped Prince Ghassan into the Upper City.

item.title: How To Solve The Winter Mystery Quest in Stardew Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCompleting the Winter Mystery Quest in Stardew Valley is quick and easy during your first year on your family’s farm and provides an important gift. The Winter Mystery Quest is very short and can be done through daily chores at the farm and in the local town. Unless you’re very engaged in the storyline, you might even miss what happens. Make sure to take the time to learn about the lore and manage your farm and time better in your first year in Stardew Valley.

item.title: How To Spawn a Blue Axolotl in Every Minecraft Version
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOrganically breeding Blue Axolotls in Minecraft is extremely difficult to do. Alternatively, these rare creatures can be spawned via console commands. Since Axolotls have such a low spawn rate, the Blue variant can be spawned in an alternative way. While this method is technically cheating, the console command can make the process much easier. This method works on both Java and Bedrock Edition of Minecraft. It is worth pointing out that enabling the Console Command will disable achievements on both the PC and Consoles.

item.title: How To Start The Epilogue In Pokémon Scarlet & Violet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere is a special procedure to unlock the Epilogue for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, but the game does not tell you that, which can be confusing. While wrapping up the whole story, the Epilogue also allows players to encounter the long-rumored Peach Mythical from Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC. It was previously known as Dokutaro in the many leaks that led up to the second expansion’s release but has since been confirmed to be called Pecharunt.

item.title: How To Start The Indigo Disk DLC in Pokémon Scarlet & Violet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Indigo Disk is the last DLC for Pokémon Scarlet & Violet, but you’ll need to play through a lot of content before you can go to Blueberry Academy. Like many DLCs, you cannot play The Indigo Mask as soon as you start a new game. To travel to Blueberry Academy, you’ll need to put in a lot of time and effort into training your team and exploring Paldea.

item.title: How To Summon (& Beat) The Red-Cloaked Horror Boss In Diablo 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Midwinter Blight event in Diablo 4 has a new boss you can summon and beat called the Red-Cloaked Horror, whose drops lead to limited time rewards. You have to travel to a Blighted Revelry event that has a chance to appear on your map of Sanctuary from time to time during this season. Unlike the Beast in Ice Boss in Diablo 4, the Red-Cloaked Horror appears in the open areas of the Fractured Peaks instead of a dungeon.

item.title: How to Summon & Defeat Yagluth in Valheim
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe final boss in the Early Access version of Valheim is Yagluth, a terrifying skeleton missing the lower half of his body. Here’s how to beat him. To summon Yagluth, players will need to obtain totems and place them on Yagluth’s summoning stone in the Plains biome. Though he moves slowly thanks to his lack of lower limbs, his attacks are earth- and fire-based and can be devastating if players are not careful.

item.title: How To Summon Echo of Varshan In Diablo 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne of the endgame bosses in Season 2 of Diablo 4, the Echo of Varshan, must be summoned by collecting or crafting body parts from the undead monster. Varshan’s boss encounter is tied to the Tree of Whispers, a place in northern Hawezar where you can complete Whisper of the Dead activities for different rewards. If you are playing within World Tier 4 in Diablo 4, you should be able to see the Malignant Burrow dungeon on your map close to the Tree.

item.title: How To Unlock (& Use) Akimbo Weapons In Modern Warfare 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe phrase “Akimbo” refers to dual wielding weapons in Modern Warfare 3, a skill you can unlock and use by leveling up guns for the right attachment. Several weapons have the Akimbo Perk as part of their leveled progression as a loadout ability you can equip before queuing for an online match. This is different from carrying two primary weapons in Modern Warfare 3, with the Perk duplicating a pre-existing firearm instead.

item.title: How To Unlock All Weapon Aspects In Hades
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewEvery weapon in Hades has four different aspects players can unlock, but the fourth aspect of each has specific requirements Zagreus must complete. It is worth pointing out that unlocking all 24 weapons can be difficult, and you may not use different strategies/tactics to unlock every aspect. You will need to meet specific requirements to unlock each aspect, and some of them are quite challenging to acquire. Once you have unlocked every weapon in Hades using Chthonic Keys and have collected at least one Titan Blood, the aspects become available to be unlocked on the next run.

item.title: How To Unlock Eternity Isle in Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewEternity Isle is the new, separate, area introduced through Disney Dreamlight Valley’s Rift In Time expansion, but players will need help to reach it. Firstly, players will need to ensure that not only has the Rift In Time expansion been purchased, but Disney Dreamlight Valley itself is up-to-date. If the Pumpkin King Returns update introducing Jack Skellington is not active, then the game is not current and will need to be updated before proceeding.

item.title: How To Unlock EVE In Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe futuristic friend EVE from Disney’s WALL-E has made its way to Disney Dreamlight Valley and is easy to unlock for players eager to play with her. The new expansion pack will lead you to find EVE after you have unlocked Eternity Isle in Disney Dreamlight Valley. Throughout the storyline, you will discover new skills, areas, and friends and watch the heartfelt reunion of the cute robotic couple, WALL-E and EVE.

item.title: How To Unlock Every Blueprint in The Last Faith
