Keeping Scratch as a companion has gameplay benefits, such as finding hidden treasure and assisting in combat. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 has lots of tough moral choices for the player to face throughout the game but in one case doing the wrong things is the best option.

item.title: One Baldur s Gate 3 Build Lets You Become Practically Invincible
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn Baldur’s Gate 3, having a high Armor Class (AC) can make the protagonist nearly invincible, as fewer attacks will land on them. Melee weapon users should focus more on improving their AC compared to spellcasters, as armor can interfere with spellcasting. One BG3 player managed to get their AC up to 31, making them practically invulverable to most attacks. Literature ReviewIn BG3, taking fewer hits is always better, especially with the permadeath of Honour Mode.

item.title: One Baldur s Gate 3 Choice Leads To A Gruesome End For A Fan-Favorite Character
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChoices in Baldur’s Gate 3 have consequences, from sacrificing innocent lives to neglecting companions. The Origin characters in the game have dark pasts and come with baggage, like Astarion’s story of manipulation and servitude by a cruel vampire. Astarion’s fate in the game is tragic, as he can become a zombie or be used in a ritual by his former vampire master, highlighting the cruel and vindictive nature of Cazador.

item.title: One Baldur s Gate 3 Decision Turns Tav Into A Powerful Cheese Wheel
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOver 1.2 million players have been transformed into a cheese wheel in Baldur’s Gate 3. The cheese wheel transformation does not have a significant impact on the game’s story or the ending, but it can be easily accomplished. The transformation into a wheel of cheese obscures access to one of the best weapons in the game. Literature ReviewAmong the many secrets hidden in the world of Baldur’s Gate 3, there is a special interaction that transforms players into a sentient wheel of cheese.

item.title: One Baldur s Gate 3 Illithid Power Is Completely Overpowered
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIllithid powers are an effective way to enhance a character’s abilities in Baldur’s Gate 3, resembling a video game skill tree. Engaging with illithid powers is a narrative choice, and avoiding them can preserve a character’s humanity but result in missed benefits. There is one exceptional illithid power that instantly kills enemies, and its effectiveness grows with more evolved illithid powers. Literature ReviewThere are a lot of good Illithid Powers in Baldur’s Gate 3, but the way that one in particular scales makes it a uniquely attractive option.

item.title: One Baldur s Gate 3 Plot Hole Prevents Minsc And Jaheira From Being Gods
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMinsc and Jaheira’s experiences in prior games aren’t accounted for in Baldur’s Gate 3. Baldur’s Gate 3 strictly caps all playable characters’ levels, meaning Minsc and Jaheira can never be as powerful as they used to be. Minsc and Jaheira’s levels may have been reset for balance and customizability, but their prior adventures are acknowledged through lore, Easter eggs, and in-game secrets. Literature ReviewMinsc and Jaheira aren’t as powerful as they should be in Baldur’s Gate 3.

item.title: One Baldur s Gate 3 Romance Option Deserves Way More Love
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLarian Studios revealed statistics for Baldur’s Gate 3 since its launch in August. One of the pieces of new information reveals a shocking lack of involvement with a romance option. The forsaken romance option is one of the best characters and the game and offers the largest character development. Literature ReviewLarian Studios revealed some statistics about Baldur’s Gate 3, and one romance option definitely deserves more love and attention from players.

item.title: One Baldurs Gate 3 Change Might Save You From Committing A Massacre
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPatch 4 of Baldur’s Gate 3 hints at the possibility of recruiting Minthara without committing a massacre, offering a more optimal path for players. The addition of a new scene between Minthara and Halsin provides an alternative recruitment option, avoiding the need for widespread deaths among interesting characters. While it’s uncertain if this new scene will be included in the game, its potential implementation would improve the narrative flow and address player frustration, filling a gap and rewarding those who choose mercy over violence.

item.title: One BG3 Update Changes Romance For The Better, But Undercuts The Commitment
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPatch 5 in Baldur’s Gate 3 makes it easier to recruit Minthara, regardless of player alignment, making it easier to romance her as well. The easier recruitment of Minthara, however, takes away the unique draw of an evil playthrough in the game and undermines the commitment required for her story. While the change is a response to player demand, it makes Minthara feel less unique as a companion. Literature ReviewAs of the fifth major patch for Baldur’s Gate 3, one of the game’s romances has been made easier to access - and also less of a commitment.

item.title: One Change Could Make Pokémon Gen 10 s Open-World Games Even Better
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGen 10 Pokémon games could benefit from a simple change. Scarlet and Violet already added the change, but it is blocked behind a paywall. Gen 10 should be released after the arrival of the new Nintendo console. Literature ReviewAlthough they may be years away, there is already a change in Gen 10 Pokémon games that could make their open-world maps a lot better for players. There is one major change in Pokémon’s Gen 10 open-world games that could make the titles even better, whenever they arrive.

item.title: One Clever Baldur s Gate 3 Decision Can Turn Enemies Into Lovers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe vastly different personalities of Baldur’s Gate 3 companions create tensions but also opportunities for romance and growth. Shadowheart and Lae’zel have the most openly hostile relationship in the game, but their allegiances and personal growth can help reconcile their differences. One approach can even see the two fall into a deep romance. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 has some particularly hostile relationships, but the right trick can quickly turn things in the opposite direction altogether.

item.title: One Clever Zelda TOTK Trick Will Wipe Out Gloom Hands In Three Hits
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGloom Hands in TOTK are tough enemies, but creative tactics and builds can make them easier to defeat. Using Autobuild with explosive barrels is an effective strategy to take down Gloom Hands quickly and without risking Link’s safety. While the strategy requires resources and preparation, the simplicity of using explosions can be highly effective against intimidating enemies in TOTK. Literature ReviewThe Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom’s Gloom Hands are threatening to face, but some clever thinking and planning can easily defeat them.

item.title: One Confirmed FF7 Rebirth Change To Sephiroth Makes A Lot Of Sense
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSephiroth is weaker in FF7 Rebirth compared to the original game, which adds a new dynamic to his character. Sephiroth will be playable in FF7 Rebirth, so his decrease in power makes him more balanced in gameplay. Limiting Sephiroth’s power as a playable character prevents the story and gameplay from being disrupted. Literature ReviewSephiroth might not be the same in FF7 Rebirth, but that could be good. Here’s everything to know about the planned changes, and why they make sense.

item.title: One Controversial GTA 6 Rumor May Not End Well For Juveniles
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGTA 6 will feature a present-day Vice City and a Bonnie and Clyde-esque duo called Lucia and Jason. Lucia may have a young child in GTA 6 - a first for the franchise - who may only appear in cutscenes. The inclusion of children in GTA 6 could be problematic due to the game’s violent nature, but possible restrictions might be implemented. Literature ReviewA recent Grand Theft Auto 6 story rumor suggests that children could appear for the first time in Rockstar’s hugely successful crime franchise.

item.title: One Core Aspect Of Cyberpunk 2077 Could Spark An Existential Crisis If You Think About It Too Long
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe concept of digital immortality through engrams is a core element of Cyberpunk 2077’s story. Engrams are created using the program Soulkiller, which can store the consciousness and memories of dying individuals. The engrams in Cyberpunk 2077 are suggested to be interpretations of data, not accurate representations of the actual person, although with developments in technology this could change. Literature ReviewCyberpunk 2077’s story explores the idea of digital immortality through engrams, but how much of an engram is the original person, or is it just data?

item.title: One Cyberpunk 2077 Change Makes The Game Harder, But So Much Better
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCyberpunk 2077’s 2.1 update improves the portrayal of Adam Smasher, making him a more formidable opponent in the boss fight. The previous boss fight with Adam Smasher was too easy and could be beaten with minimal effort using certain builds and weapons. The 2.1 update has completely overhauled the Adam Smasher boss battle, incorporating elements from the anime Cyberpunk Edgerunners and making it more challenging and satisfying. Literature ReviewCyberpunk 2077’s 2.

item.title: One Easily Missed Baldur s Gate 3 Mechanic Will Have Companions Camping In Style
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPlayers can customize their companions’ camp outfits in Baldur’s Gate 3. The game doesn’t explicitly mention that players can change these outfits, so it’s an easily missed mechanic. Having characters fight in camp outfits may not make logical sense, but it’s an option for those who want a different visual aesthetic. Literature ReviewThere are many mechanics in Baldur’s Gate 3 that are not evidently explained. Here is one that may make your camping sessions more pleasant.

item.title: One Foolhardy Baldur s Gate 3 Decision Will Have Ogre Debt Collectors Knocking At Your Door
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMaking deals with devils or other creatures in Baldur’s Gate 3 can have unexpected consequences, like debt collectors demanding payment. Some NPCs require payment, bribes, or threats to help the party, and scamming them can lead to consequences. Certain actions taken in Act 1 may lead to an unexpected encounter with Lump and his ogre comrades in Act 2. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 includes a variety of consequences for immoral actions, and one choice can lead to ogre debt collectors coming after your party.

item.title: One Fundamental Change To Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Would Breathe New Life Into The Franchise
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPokémon Scarlet and Violet offer an open-world adventure with roaming wild Pokémon, improving gameplay. The dialogue options in Scarlet and Violet have little impact on the main story, limiting player choices. Allowing in-game choices to lead to divergent experiences would bring new life to the Pokémon franchise. Literature ReviewChanging one aspect of Pokémon Scarlet and Violet could lead to the entire Pokémon series becoming far more engaging for individual players.

item.title: One Glaring Cyberpunk 2077 Omission Could Flesh Out The World
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYExpanding wealthy areas like North Oak can provide a different side to the gritty world of Night City. The inclusion of tourist destinations in the Phantom Liberty expansion already gives players a taste of the high life. Exploring wealthy areas can delve into Night City’s classist structure and provide V with new high-paying gigs. Literature ReviewCyberpunk 2077 allows players to dive into the rich, seedy world of Night City, but one, less crime-ridden district has potential for an expansion.

item.title: One Grand Theft Auto 6 Detail Explains The Whole Series
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe trailer for GTA 6 reveals a hidden detail on the money, with “The United States of Paranoia” printed on the bills. This highlights the franchise’s cynicism toward American culture. GTA 6 continues the tradition of fictionalizing real locations, with Vice City and Leonida standing in for Miami and other parts of Florida, respectively. Literature ReviewGrand Theft Auto is a long-running series with a lot of complications, but one detail in the GTA 6 trailer is the perfect encapsulation of it all.

item.title: One Hidden Easter Egg Reveals More About Red Dead Redemption s Most Notorious Outlaw
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Blackwater Ledger newspaper in Red Dead Redemption 2 reveals new information about the Van der Linde’s gang’s collapse and their legacy. The newspaper article contains some inaccuracies but provides interesting facts, rumors, and opinions about the gang. The article also reveals what other members of the gang, such as Javier, Charles, and Bill, were up to between RDR1 and RDR2. Literature ReviewAn easily-missed Easter egg reveals more about RDR2’s biggest villain, and describes what many major characters were up to between the two games.

item.title: One Hidden Location In Cyberpunk 2077 Turns It Into A Horror Game
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA creepy Easter egg in Cyberpunk 2077 features a cult called the Children of the Ark. The cult believed in an ultra-powerful AI waiting to enslave or kill humanity, as well as an interstellar afterlife. The Blackwall is a nigh-impenetrable firewall in Cyberpunk lore, fencing in rogue AI. Songbird can bypass it, but doing so damages her health. Literature ReviewNight City hides a terrifying secret in Cyberpunk 2077. Here’s what it is, where to find it, and how it ties into the wider lore of Phantom Liberty.

item.title: One Hidden Marvel s Spider-Man 2 Detail Reveals Rhino s Sad Fate
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKraven’s Great Hunt results in the deaths of many iconic Spider-Man villains, with only Scorpion’s death shown on-screen. A glitch reveals a potential dark fate for Rhino, although it’s unclear if this was a cut storyline or a development oversight. Rhino’s fate remains non-canon, leaving room for his possible return in Marvel’s Spider-Man 3. Literature ReviewOne of Spider-Man’s classic villains, Rhino, was mentioned on Kraven’s list of potential prey, but his fate was never revealed in the story.

item.title: One Highly-Overlooked Baldur s Gate 3 Action Will Add Flavor To Any Campaign
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPerforming music in Baldur’s Gate 3 is an underrated action that adds character to the game. There are six playable songs and six instruments in the game, and different combinations can be experimented with. Music can be used as a distraction to make stealth easier, occupying NPCs while the party performs illegal activities. Literature ReviewOne action in Baldur’s Gate 3 can make a huge difference, but it may be difficult to come by.

item.title: One Highly-Overlooked BG3 Trick Will Make Cutscenes Way Less Awkward
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 cutscenes can be awkward when characters are covered in blood, after just finishing a battle. Patch 4 of the game introduced the feature of using soaps and sponges to clean blood and dirt. While cleanliness doesn’t have in-game consequences, it’s nice to have the option for better presentation during cutscenes. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 characters don’t always look their best in cutscenes, but it’s actually exceptionally easy to address a common cause of complaint.

item.title: One Huge Starfield Addition Would Make Base Building Actually Worth It
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDespite being key to the game, Starfield’s base-building function could be improved. The addition of certain features could improve the usage of outposts on planets. This could also address the feeling of emptiness on the planets of Starfield. Literature ReviewOne of the best mechanics in Starfield could get a lot better with the implementation of a gameplay system from a well-known franchise. Despite its already large number of mechanics, Starfield’s base-building function could be made better by the implementation of a single feature.

item.title: One Key Thing Makes Starfield So Much Better On PC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOne feature on PC greatly enhances the Starfield experience, offering solutions to shortcomings and adding content not available on consoles. Support for this feature is planned for Xbox, but it has not yet been implemented, leaving Xbox players to rely on community fixes and missing out on the full potential of mods. The PC version of Starfield will always have a greater catalog of custom content, making it the superior platform to enjoy the game.

item.title: One Like A Dragon Gaiden Side Mission Has A Cool Connection To Judgment
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLike A Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name finally has a proper Judgment crossover, which is good news for fans of both series. Kiryu and Kaito team up in the Akame Network side mission called “End The Destruction,” providing an exciting crossover moment. Kiryu and Kaito’s shared background and ethical mindset make their team-up more fitting and natural than a potential encounter with Yagami. Literature ReviewJudgment shares a setting with the Yakuza games, but it avoided cameos.

item.title: One Low-Level Baldurs Gate 3 Spell Makes The Final Battle Easy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe low-level spell sanctuary can easily bypass a challenging battle in Baldur’s Gate 3, allowing players to reach the final boss without wasting resources. The spell sanctuary prevents enemies from attacking the party, making the battle with the Elder Brain’s guardians extremely simple. While some players may prefer the challenge of the battle, using sanctuary ensures that players face the Elder Brain with maximum resources available. Literature ReviewThere are three major battles before the credits roll in Baldur’s Gate 3, but the hardest one can be almost entirely avoided with level-one magic.

item.title: One Marvel s Spider-Man 2 Tie-In Product Can Really Improve The Graphics
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s Spider-Man 2 was part of a unique cross-promotion with Warby Parker, a prescription eyeglasses retailer. There are six different Warby Parker glasses, based on four separate characters from Spider-Man 2. Eyeglasses are an odd promotional item for a Spider-Man game, but they’re far more practical and interesting than many other gaming collectibles. Literature ReviewGaming fans are used to seeing a variety of merchandise tied to popular titles, but one Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 licensed product differs from the rest.

item.title: One Massive Cyberpunk Liberty City Plot Hole Ruins The Entire Saburo Storyline
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCyberpunk 2077’s fantastic story features exciting twists and turns, with a seismic event during ‘The Heist’ that shakes Night City’s political and social fabric. There is one pivotal scene that could have gone a lot differently, considering the high-tech gadgetry in Cyberpunk. While this may be seen as a plot hole, it doesn’t significantly impact the story, and the end result of the event can be viewed positively. Literature ReviewThe Arasaka Corporation’s hostile takeover is a pivotal moment in Cyberpunk 2077 but one obvious plothole could’ve changed the entire story.

item.title: One Missing Baldur s Gate 3 Race Deserves More Love In BG3 DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 has a strong representation of fantasy races from Dungeons & Dragons, but one missing race that could add depth and flavor to the game is orcs. The absence of one race in the game presents an opportunity for future DLC to introduce this fantasy race and add more variety to the gameplay experience. While goblins are the main antagonists in Baldur’s Gate 3, the inclusion of this race could still provide an interesting and unique element to the game, as they have different roles and characteristics.

item.title: One Missing Feature In Cyberpunk 2077 Could Go A Long Way In Improving Immersion
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMany of Night City’s residents have some kind of visible Cyberware enhancements, but V’s physical appearance can’t be changed to reflect this through their Cyberware in Cyberpunk 2077. Players have expressed a desire for visible Cyberware on their character, similar to the spin-off anime protagonist who had visible enhancements. Cosmetic Cyberware implants have been made available through mods, but unfortunately, console players can’t access them. Literature ReviewPlayers can immerse themselves in Cyberpunk 2077’s Night City better than ever before, but one cosmetic feature could enhance this.

item.title: One Missing Starfield Mechanic Would Make Space So Much Cooler
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSpacewalking could be a fun and gimmicky mechanic in Starfield, adding extra fun and realism to the game. It would open up possibilities for quests and combat. Zero gravity combat outside the walls of a ship in space could be an epic experience. It would add a new level of challenge and excitement to the game. While spacewalking is not confirmed in Starfield, players can use console commands and mods to experience it.

item.title: One Mysterious Part Of Red Dead Redemption 2 Is Still Scarier Than Most Horror Games
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRDR2 has creepy supernatural elements like UFOs, cannibals, and vampires, but they are kept at a distance and open to interpretation. There is a mysterious Manmade Mutant in the game, made up of various animals’ parts, and evidence to suggest its creator intended to resurrect it. The Mutant was probably meant to be a fully animated and interactive NPC, but this quest was likely cut from the game. Literature ReviewRDR2 usually keeps its supernatural elements at arm’s length, but one mystery is truly terrifying.

item.title: One New Cyberpunk 2077 Romance Feature Could ve Been So Much Better
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCyberpunk 2077’s 2.1 update added highly requested features, including the metro system and improved boss battles. The addition of romantic hangouts allows players to further interact with their love interests outside of the main missions. These romantic hangouts could have been improved with a wider range of dialogue options, potentially discussing recent events from the game’s main story. Literature ReviewCyberpunk 2077’s 2.1 update included romantic hangouts where V can further interact with their romantic partners at their apartment.

item.title: One New Feature Seen In GTA 6 Leaks Is Absurdly Ironic
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere’s a long list of features that have appeared in Grand Theft Auto 6 leaks, but one in particular stands out thanks to the surrounding context. It’s no surprise that the lack of updates about the franchise’s future has driven aggressive interest in any GTA 6 information that can be acquired, and everything that’s been learned through leaks has been passed around just about every corner of the internet.

item.title: One New Legendary Pokémon In Indigo Disk DLC Was Hiding All Along
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA new Legendary Pokémon may have been hiding in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet since its launch. The Pokémon will be introduced with the Indigo Disk DLC. Indigo Disk concludes the story started by the Teal Mask expansion. Literature ReviewIt seems like one of the new Legendary Pokémon in the Indigo Disk has been hiding in the base games, Scarlet and Violet, for over a year. A new Legendary Pokémon from the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet has been hiding in the base game since its launch back in November 2022.

item.title: One New Pokémon Indigo Disk Location Fixes The Series Biggest Problem
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet will take players to Blueberry Academy. Previews of the expansion detailed some aspects of the upcoming content. The DLC may have some ground-breaking changes in the franchise. Literature ReviewIt seems like there will be a major change in The Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, which may even push the franchise forward. It seems like a new location in the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet will fix the biggest problem in the series.

item.title: One New Spider-Man 2 Item Finally Lets Miles & Peter Be Real Spiders
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s Spider-Man 2 introduces new mechanics like web wings and symbiote abilities, while streamlining the gadget system. The game includes a new tool called “Web Line” that allows players to create stronger webs for traversal and stealth. Web lines grant more freedom of movement, allowing players to create their own paths high above enemies and adopt stealthier approaches. Literature ReviewSpider-Man 2 includes several new mechanics such as web wings or symbiote abilities, and one new web-based item is great for stealth approaches.

item.title: One Of BG3 s Weirdest Quests Actually Provides An Amazing Buff
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAct 1 is the best time to secure a powerful buff in Baldur’s Gate 3, as it can make later challenges easier. The quest to achieve the buff is one of the strangest in the entire CRPG. While maintaining the buff can be challenging, it offers a substantial advantage in combat and has no real downsides or negative story consequences. Literature ReviewStrength can come from some surprising places in Baldur’s Gate 3, and one particularly unusual avenue yields especially exciting dividends.

item.title: One Of Steam s Most-Wishlisted PC Games Finally Launches Next Week
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Day Before, one of Steam’s most wishlisted games, is finally being released after facing numerous delays and challenges during its development. The game promises a groundbreaking, post-apocalyptic MMO experience. The Day Before has faced unexpected delays, copyright conflicts, and speculation about its authenticity, but it has now announced a release date next week. Literature ReviewOne of Steam’s top wishlist games has seen multiple delays over the course of its development, but it’s finally due to release next week.

item.title: One Of The Best Games Of 2021 Is Free On Epic Games Store On January 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy is the final free game offered by the Epic Games Store during the daily holiday giveaways. The game features the beloved team of interstellar superheroes, but with separate character iterations from the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The story takes a twist when their mission to capture a space beast goes awry and threatens the galaxy. Despite a poor performance financially, Guardians of the Galaxy stands out with its focus a branching narrative that allows players to shape the relationships of the Guardians.

item.title: One Of The Biggest Ark Survival Ascended Changes Is Actually A Good Thing
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChanges to Cryopods in ARK: Survival Ascended have been made for balance, preventing them from being overpowered like in Survival Evolved. These changes require survivors to come up with new strategies when fighting beasts or other tribes, as old tactics involving Cryopods and movement speed are no longer effective. While the changes to Cryopods and movement speed may be unpopular with some players, they are necessary for balancing the game and keeping it interesting in the long run.

item.title: One Of Valve s Most Iconic Games Is Getting A Prequel DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYValve is notorious for never making a third game in any of its beloved series, but that hasn’t stopped the games’ communities from picking up the slack. Portal 2 is set to receive Portal: Revolution, a prequel mod with a new story, puzzles, and mechanics. The mod promises a runtime of 5–8 hours, almost matching the average time it takes to beat Portal 2. Literature ReviewThe number 3 might never appear in the title of any Valve game, but that doesn’t mean that the adventure has concluded for every story.

item.title: One Of Zeldas Coolest Characters Is Long Overdue For A Major Role
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA mysterious and intriguing character could be the perfect final boss in a Zelda game with darker tones and an eerie style. The ability to copy Link’s skills and improved AI technology would make for a challenging and dynamic boss fight. Centering the game’s story around Link and making Dark Link the main antagonist would allow Zelda to play a more direct and significant role in supporting the hero.

item.title: One Often Overlooked BG3 Item Can Power Up A Fan-Favorite Character
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSoul Coins in Baldur’s Gate 3 can provide Karlach an extra 1d4 fire damage in combat. Using a Soul Coin consumes a bonus action, but the effects last until the next long rest, making them a valuable resource. While using Soul Coins may raise moral concerns, there are no apparent repercussions in the game, and they’re not necessarily valuable enough to be must-sell items. Literature ReviewIt’s easy to miss or forget about some interesting advantages in Baldur’s Gate 3, and even minor buffs can make a big difference in the long run.

item.title: One Path Leads To The Loneliest Tav Story Possible In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCompanions in Baldur’s Gate 3 can be killed or driven away through player choices in each act, providing multiple routes for losing their support. Act 1 alone has many choices that can result in the death or abandonment of several companions, limiting the party’s options for support. Act 2 and Act 3 also provide opportunities to permanently remove companions through decisions made during quests and encounters, resulting in a potential lonely journey for the player character.

item.title: One Pokémon GO Update Would Make Catching New Pokémon So Much Better
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCatching new Pokémon in Pokémon GO can be exciting but recent additions appear to be more difficult to catch, which can be disappointing and take the fun out of the game. The mechanics of catch rates in Pokémon GO are complicated, with factors like Pokémon size, throwing technique, and additional modifiers affecting the capture rate. While some Pokémon should be challenging to catch, others that are low in combat power (CP) should not require excessive resources and multiple tries.

item.title: One Pokémon Indigo Disk Trick Can Get You Infinite Master Balls
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYUtilizing the Item Printer upgrade in the Indigo Disk DLC allows players to obtain an unlimited supply of Master Balls, increasing their chances of capturing powerful Legendary Pokémon. Regular play of Pokémon Scarlet and Violet and its DLC can provide players with three Master Balls, but investing in the Item Printer is necessary to capture all the game’s Legendary Pokémon more easily. The Poké Ball Lotto feature in the Item Printer has a chance of producing rare Poké Balls, including the highly sought-after Master Ball.

item.title: One Pokémon Scarlet & Violet DLC Character Might Actually Be A Criminal
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOne of the characters in the Pokémon Scarlet and Violet DLC may have committed a crime by taking sacred water from Kitakami’s Crystal Pool without permission. The protagonist of the game does not react to the questionable morality of the Terarium Core invention, which may have been built using stolen water from the Crystal Pool. Briar, the character who potentially stole the water, faces no consequences for her actions, and it remains unclear if she will need to collect more water in the future.

item.title: One Rare LOTR Return to Moria Resource Just Got Easier To Find
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPatch 1.0.2 in The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria increases the drop rate of a critical resource, addressing the frustration of acquiring it. The scarcity of this crucial material hindered progression in the game, but now they can also be obtained by defeating trolls and Nameless Beasts, providing motivation for combat. The patch not only improves the availability of key resources but also includes other changes like reducing fast travel penalties and fixing bugs, showing the developers’ commitment to refining the game.

item.title: One Reason Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Needs More DLC After Indigo Disk
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThere is a need for an additional DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet that could make its story even better. The Indigo Disk DLC concludes the story started in The Teal Mask, takes players on adventures away from Paldea, and explores the Terastal Phenomenon. The DLC introduces tougher Pokémon battles for advanced players and features new and returning Pokémon. Literature ReviewEven with the release of The Teal Mask and The Indigo Disk expansions, Pokémon Scarlet and Violet players deserve at least one more DLC.

item.title: One Small GTA 6 Trailer Clue Could Point To A Game-Changing Feature
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrand Theft Auto 6’s trailer indicates the integration of social media platforms similar to TikTok could be a major feature within the game’s storyline and mechanics. The use of social media apps in GTA 6 could potentially unlock new missions and opportunities for players, shifting the “Strangers and Freaks” missions to social media interactions. Social media could play a larger role in GTA 6 by satirizing true crime media and allowing players to shape their characters’ reputation through online videos, potentially influencing the behavior of NPCs in the game.

item.title: One Small Zelda TOTK Detail About Penn Has Huge Lore Implications For Rito
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom introduces fascinating new lore about the Rito. Penn, a character in Tears of the Kingdom, possesses the ability to communicate with birds, suggesting that all Rito may have this extraordinary skill. This has serious implications for the intelligence of all wildlife in Hyrule, corroborated by Wolf Link having similar abilities in Twilight Princess. Literature ReviewPenn displays an interesting ability in The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, which carries dramatic implications for the rest of the Rito.

item.title: One Starfield Limitation Prevents Players From Balling Out Like Billionaires
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA frustrating mechanic in Starfield limits wealth accumulation and progression in the game. Resting for a couple of days can refresh vendor credits, but it’s not an ideal solution. A mod called Richer Merchants can fix the issue by giving vendors more credits and goods, streamlining the accumulation of wealth. Literature ReviewGaining money in Starfield isn’t all that hard, but one mechanic makes earning credits tedious & annoying and could be altered pretty easily.

item.title: One Steam Feature May Make MW3 Harder To Refund
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYModern Warfare 3 has had a rough release due to a lackluster campaign, bugs, and issues, especially with the PC version, resulting in refund requests. The use of the Call of Duty HQ launcher poses a problem for Steam’s refund system, as it includes playtime from MW2 and Warzone, making it harder to qualify for a refund. While it’s possible to get a refund for MW3 by contacting Steam Support directly, a better solution would be for Call of Duty to change how it launches its games.

item.title: One Super Mario Bros. Wonder Character Couldve Ruined The Game
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFlorian’s design in Super Mario Bros. Wonder reflects his role as the prince of the Flower Kingdom, and some fans were concerned about a potential connection to the obscure Mario anime film, The Great Mission To Rescue Princess Peach. The 1986 anime film introduced the character Kibidango, who is revealed to be the true form of Prince Haru of the Flower Kingdom. Nintendo has kept its film adaptations separate from its games, and it is unlikely that Florian’s design in Super Mario Bros.

item.title: One Thing Prevents A Truly Evil Playthrough In Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe evil path in Baldur’s Gate 3 is limited due to the trajectory of the story, making it impossible to fully commit to the dark path. Joining forces with Ketheric Thorm, the leader of the Absolute’s army, is not possible, as the encounter ultimately goes haywire and leads to a boss fight. While there are other options to serve the goals of the enemy, no major outcome in the game revolves around serving the Absolute.

item.title: One Tiny Early-Game Starfield Detail Is Totally Immersion-Breaking
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDespite its successful launch, players are beginning to notice small inconsistencies and issues in Starfield that negatively impact the game’s immersion. The New Atlantis Transit system in Starfield’s largest city is especially peculiar, failing to be convincing under scrutiny. These issues with Starfield may simply be carrying over from earlier Bethesda games, suggesting the studio’s formula is growing dated. Literature ReviewNow that Starfield has gotten some distance from its launch date, players are finding tiny peculiarities with the game that can sour the experience.

item.title: One Uncontrollable Baldur s Gate 3 Dark Urge Kill Locks Off Very Rare Loot
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPlaying as a Dark Urge character in Baldur’s Gate 3 can limit branching possibilities in the game, including missing out on fantastic gear. One such item that can become unobtainable is the Potent Robe, which is a valuable item for casters. Certain Dark Urge actions are unavoidable, but very specific actions can be taken to ensure the Potent Robe isn’t barred from being acquired. Literature ReviewThe Dark Urge can easily derail a Baldur’s Gate 3 campaign with even the best of intentions, and one moment makes this more obvious than any other.

item.title: One Underrated BG3 Character Can Totally Transform Tav & Other Origin Characters
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCustomizing a Baldur’s Gate 3 character at the start of the game is only the first step, as there are later opportunities to edit characters and overhaul the whole party. One character in Baldur’s Gate 3 can provide major assistance to players, like changing the class of a character for a nominal fee of 100 gold. Respeccing party members in Baldur’s Gate 3 can completely change the dynamics of the game, allowing players to build a party around personalities and customize it to work as an effective unit.

item.title: One Unfortunate Ark Survival Ascended Bug Might Kill Your Favorite Creatures
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA bug in Ark: Survival Ascended kills tamed creatures randomly, posing as a major frustration for players. This is made even worse when the tamed dinosaurs are a high level and required time to tame or breed. To avoid the bug, players can either refrain from a specific mechanic or freeze water tames in Cryopods. Literature ReviewOne bug persists in Ark: Survival Ascended, causing massive issues for people looking to transport certain dinos quickly.

item.title: One Weird Choice In Avatar Frontiers Of Pandora Actually Makes Perfect Sense
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOne choice in Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora may seem strange, but it enhances immersion and lets players experience the beautiful environment through the protagonist’s eyes. This design decision allows for a clearer and more rewarding experience of the game’s reactive environment. Drawing inspiration from the Far Cry series, this decision was perhaps a practical choice that avoided significant design overhauls. Literature ReviewAvatar: Frontiers of Pandora shows Pandora from an unusual perspective, but there’s a good explanation for the approach that the game takes.

item.title: One Zelda TOTK Armor Set Is Still The Games Biggest Mystery
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Ancient Hero’s Aspect armor in The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom holds unanswered mysteries that could change the understanding of the game and the Zelda franchise. The armor’s design suggests a connection to the extinct Zonai race, but certain features like a tail and green skin resemble the Gerudo, particularly Ganondorf and Twinrova. It is speculated that the Ancient Hero may be related to Koume and Kotake, potentially as a failed attempt at resurrecting Ganondorf, or as an instrument of revenge against Hyrule by Twinrova using Zonai DNA.

item.title: Original Vision For Avatar Frontiers of Pandora Was Very Different [EXCLUSIVE]
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAvatar: Frontiers of Pandora was originally conceived with a different style of gameplay in mind. In an interview with Screen Rant, Avatar producer Jon Landau discussed how the game was almost very different. The use of environmental storytelling and attention to detail in the game’s world make exploration and discovery rewarding experiences. Literature ReviewExclusive: Avatar producer Jon Landau revealed to Screen Rant that the original concept for Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora had an unusual focus.

item.title: Other BG3 Companions Should Take Cues From The Ultimate Baldur s Gate 3 NPC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 offers player freedom, but important characters and moments can be easily missed or skipped over. The githyanki prince Orpheus is a crucial character in the game’s plot and can be easily missed if certain conditions aren’t met. Freeing Orpheus has significant consequences for the final battle and the githyanki storyline, as well as impacting Lae’zel’s personal quest. Literature ReviewWith the huge scale of Baldur’s Gate 3, one of the game’s best and most important NPCs can be unfortunately easy to overlook.

item.title: Overwatch 2 New Hero Everything We Know About Mauga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMauga, a new hero in Overwatch 2, is a Samoan tank with a compelling backstory and powerful abilities, including incendiary and volatile chain guns. Mauga has a close relationship with the hero Baptiste, although developers have stated they are just good friends. Mauga’s release in Overwatch 2 is scheduled for Season 8, and players can unlock him through the purchase of a Premium Battle Pass or by reaching Tier 45 in the standard Battle Pass.

item.title: Overwatch 2 Season 8 - Release Date, New Hero, & Battle Pass Info
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOverwatch 2 Season 8 is headlined by a new tank hero, Mauga, who has been teased for a long time before his debut. The Battle Pass for Season 8 will also be revamped, with a new feature that lets players get Mythic skins from previous seasons. Blizzard has plans for the future of Overwatch 2, including new DPS and support heroes, a competitive rework, and additions to the Hero Mastery system.

item.title: Palia How To Find The Lighthouse Keepers Secret Spot (Fishing for Answers)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne of the quests you can find in Palia is “Fishing for Answers,” which asks you to find the secret spot of The Lighthouse Keeper for rare rewards. The “Fishing for Answers” quest only begins when you reach the Lighthouse, which is located in Bahari Bay on a series of cliffs towards the eastern part of the area. Using the Pulsewater Plains Stable Point as a fast travel spot will let you travel to the Lighthouse quickly.

item.title: Palworld Is Missing One Essential Function, But It May Be On Purpose
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPalworld’s robust features and gameplay loop make it highly engaging, attracting a large player base. However, the game has faced criticism for potentially stealing design elements and assets from other titles. One major drawback is the lack of an exit button on Xbox Game Pass, making it inconvenient for players to close the game. Literature ReviewThere’s one oversight in Palworld that’s especially glaring, but there are a couple of interesting explanations as to why that could be the case.

item.title: Pawn Stars Austin Lee Chumlee Russell s Legal Issues Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPawn Stars star Austin Lee Russell, typically known as Chumlee, has had various legal troubles over the years. Learn more about his alleged issues. Pawn Stars cast member Austin Lee Russell, typically known as “Chumlee” on the series, has had various legal issues over the years, some of which have resulted in severe consequences. Over the show’s 13-year run, Austin was a familiar face, as he ran the daily operations of the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop in Las Vegas, Nevada.

item.title: Perfect Baldur s Gate 3 Cosplay Brings Mol s Sass To The Real World
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMol, a young tiefling pickpocket, may not be as important as other characters in Baldur’s Gate 3, but she still plays a role in the overall narrative. A Reddit user’s Mol cosplay perfectly captures the character’s sass and attitude, earning praise from the cosplay community. Mol’s minor but memorable role includes stealing from adults and even vouching for the party in Act 2 if the right choices are made.

item.title: Persona 5 Royal All Exams & Class Quiz Answers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe easiest way to maximize the Knowledge Social Link in Persona 5 Royal comes from acing the quizzes and exams that show up during moments in class. Maximizing stats in Persona 5 Royal can directly impact the outcome of the main story and give leverage against enemies in Palaces. Increasing the Knowledge stat will grant Joker with a charm that helps in better progress with Social Links. So getting every answer right in Class Exams is recommended as it will help unlock new questions and content in Persona 5 Royal.

item.title: Persona 5 Royal How To Find & Defeat The Reaper (The Easy Way)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFighting The Reaper in a Persona game has always been a great challenge for players and Royal is no exception. Here’s the lowdown on P5R’s Reaper. In the original Persona 5, the best time to run into the Reaper was during the Flu Season in Japan. With the rules of the Metaverse, if people are feeling down or sick in the real world, the enemies in the Metaverse are as well, and The Reaper would fall within three turns.

item.title: Persona 5 Tactica How to Activate Unique Skills (& How They Work)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe different playable characters in Persona 5 Tactica all have personalized features, including Unique (Voltage) Skills, but they must be activated. To raise the Voltage Meter, your character must either deal damage or take damage. Note that this meter is shared between the parties, so using it will use it up for everyone, not each character. Additionally, each party member’s Unique Skill can be improved, increasing its effect.

item.title: Persona 5 Tactica How To Beat Marie (Boss Guide)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewMarie is the first boss that Joker and the party will encounter in Persona 5 Tactica, but don’t let that fool you, her fight is anything but easy. Considering that Marie is a heavy damage dealer, the main priority for the party won’t be attacking her but avoiding her. Taking cover will be essential, as several of Marie’s attacks can be lethal if you are not watching your health.

item.title: Persona 5 Tactica How To Beat Salmael (Final Boss Guide)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSalmael is the final boss of Persona 5 Tactica. You will need to move often, shooting and ducking into cover as the field shifts and rotates. Even with proper levels and gear, obtaining the best skills in Persona 5 Tactica is still a good idea. Joker’s God-Like Speed passive can be incredibly useful in this specific encounter. You will also want any skill that improves damage with guns.

item.title: Persona 5 Tactica How to Beat Yoshiki (Boss Guide)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are several bosses in Persona 5 Tactica, the second of which is Yoshiki. Uniquely, this boss hangs back and makes the party come to him. Whereas Marie took on the party headfirst, Yoshiki will hang back initially in each phase and let other enemies engage the party first. Conserving SP is going to be imperative early on, as players will have to utilize the same three party members for the duration of all three phases of this fight.

item.title: Persona 5 Tactica How To Unlock Goro Akechi (Crow) & Kasumi Yoshizawa (Violet)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAkechi and Kasumi are some fan favorites that appear to be missing from Persona 5 Tactica, but there is actually a way to unlock Crow & Violet. Though many characters in Persona 5 Tactica must be unlocked through missions, Akechi and Kasumi are the only exceptions. Rather than being unlocked through progress, you will have to finish the game, as well as one other task, to have the option to add Akechi (Crow) and Kasumi (Violet) to your New Game+ party.

item.title: Persona 5 Tactica How to Unlock New Game+ (& Everything That Carries Over)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewPersona 5 Tactica does have a New Game+ available for its players, but it goes by another name and players will be surprised to see what carries over. Following the credits, the New Game+ option will appear and will load up a fresh start with certain stats carrying over. You should know that the content will remain the same as the original playthrough of Persona 5 Tactica. It’s recommended you increase the difficulty level, especially since you will begin with better skills and stats, as this is the best way to create a slightly new experience that won’t feel repetitive.

item.title: Phasmophobia Complete List of Spirit Box Questions That Will Get An Answer
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are over a hundred phrases ghosts in Phasmophobia understand, so hunker down with some friends and get ready to ask the real questions. With around 140 total questions to ask a ghost, you first have to place the Spirit Box in a room where the spirit can be found. When you identify a haunted room in Phasmophobia, you have a variety of ways of drawing an apparition’s attention using other devices in the game.

item.title: Playtest One Of The Most Promising Zombie Games In Years For Free This Week
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNakwon: Last Paradise, a unique zombie game focused on extraction and stealth, will be free to play this week. Players are encouraged to grab loot and escape without being caught by either hostile parties or mindless zombies. As players progress, they can spend cash on rent and improve their base, while also managing food supplies and equipment conditions. The game will be free to play from November 29 to December 3, accessible via Steam.

item.title: Pokémon Day 2024 Predictions What Pokémon Games May Get Revealed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe next Pokémon games will likely be revealed on Pokémon Day 2024. There are connections between Pokémon Scarlet and Violet and the potential upcoming games. There may also be some surprises announced during Pokémon Day this year. Literature ReviewThere are many new titles that can be announced during Pokémon Day 2024. Here are the most likely ones to be revealed during the event. The next Pokémon games to be revealed will likely be presented during the special annual broadcast for Pokémon Day 2024.

item.title: Pokémon Every Evolution Stone Evolution
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are some Pokémon that require the use of Evolution Stones in order to evolve, some of which have changed over the course of each generation. Not to be confused with stone evolutions in Pokémon GO, the main series only demands that you give a Pokémon the right Stone to transform. There are only a couple of exceptions or limitations to this rule, with the specific gender of some creatures being a prerequisite for evolution.

item.title: Pokémon Gen 10 Games Are Probably Releasing On Switch 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe next generation of Pokémon games will likely be released on the rumored Switch 2 console, taking advantage of its upgraded hardware for an improved gaming experience. The timing of the Switch 2’s expected release aligns with the lack of news on future core Pokémon games, suggesting that the next core games and Gen 5 remakes may be released on the Switch 2. The Switch 2’s enhanced capabilities can address performance issues seen in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, providing a better play experience and stability for future Pokémon titles.

item.title: Pokémon Gen 10 Games Could Fix A Major Problem With Starters
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe next Generation of Pokémon games, Gen 10, has the opportunity to add missing starter designs, such as a Grass-type crocodile and a Fire-type turtle. The design of starter Pokémon follows a pattern, with each generation featuring Grass-, Fire-, and Water-type starters. However, there are still some missing starter designs. The release of Pokémon Gen 10 games is expected in late 2025, and fans can look forward to the announcement of these new starters much earlier.

item.title: Pokémon Gen 10 Games Should Steal This From Indigo Disk DLC (& It s Not The Synchro Machine)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe second DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, The Indigo Disk, introduces new gameplay elements and a brand-new region, expanding the potential for future games. The DLC includes subtle references to advanced strategies from the competitive Pokémon scene, providing a challenge for experienced players and potentially teaching new players about high-level tactics. The inclusion of these advanced strategies in The Indigo Disk shows that the developers are aware of the competitive Pokémon scene and may continue to incorporate similar tactics in future games.

item.title: Pokémon GO Eggs-Pedition Access Guide For December 2023 (Timed Research & Bonuses)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Eggs-Pedition Access timed research event for Pokémon GO gifts players ways to explore new Pokémon through its hatching and gifting perks. To unlock Pokémon GO’s Eggs-Pedition access, go to the shop and purchase it for around $5.00 USD. There is also an option to gift an event ticket to a family member or friend. Shortly after, the month-long egg-hatching service will begin. A timed research will appear on the news and research screens, mainly focused on hatching eggs and giving gifts.

item.title: Pokémon GO How To Exchange A Gift With Mateo
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn order to find Mateo and exchange a gift with him in Pokémon GO, you will first need to accomplish a special deed. Here’s how to do it. When he is first introduced, Mateo is shown off as an adventurer who loves exploring and collecting treasures and therein lies the secret to exchanging gifts with him. He can be found at certain PokéStops, in a similar way that Team GO Rocket Grunts and Leaders, like Giovanni in Pokémon GO, regularly position themselves.

item.title: Pokémon GO Shiny Odds (& Why Raids Are Best) Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewShiny odds in Pokémon GO work very differently compared to the rates in the mainline series. There are a few factors that make them so different. The mainline series of video games features numerous aspects that can be manipulated by players to improve the odds of finding a Shiny Pokémon. These have been fine-tuned over the history of the franchise based on player feedback as it makes sense for each game.

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC 10 Event Pokémon We Desperately Need
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Indigo Disk DLC for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet will introduce new and returning Pokemon, expanding the number of monsters available for Trainers to catch. Rumors suggest that Paradox Entei and Paradox Terrakion may be added through limited-time Tera Raid events in the Gen 9 games. Other potential exciting additions could include Mythicals, Legendaries, and Shiny versions not currently available in the Gen 9 titles. Literature ReviewThere are several exciting Pokémon that can be given via distribution events or Tera Raid battles after the release of the Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC.

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC Apparently Introduces A New Type
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe upcoming Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet may introduce a new playable Type. The leaked Type allegedly has a name. The nature of this new Type is currently uncertain, though there are some speculations. Literature ReviewIt seems like the 19th Pokémon Type, which was previously teased for Scarlet and Violet in the Indigo Disk DLC,

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC Everything Leaks Say About Dokutaro (Peach Mythical)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet may introduce Dokutaro. Dokutaro is rumored to be a peach-shaped Mythical Pokémon. Dokutaro may have connections to The Teal Mask DLC as well. Literature ReviewThere have been multiple leaks and rumors about a new Mythical Pokémon in the Indigo Disk DLC called

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC Full Pokédex Every Pokémon Number & Type
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Blueberry Pokédex in the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet has over 200 creatures to register. The new expansion in The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero DLC pack takes place in Blueberry Academy in the Unova region. The focus of Blueberry Academy is competitive battling, with Double Battles proposed by student trainers. Literature ReviewOver 200 Pokémon compose the Blueberry Pokédex in the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet.

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC Isn t The End Of Scarlet & Violet s Story After All
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPokémon Scarlet and Violet will receive an update on January 11, 2024, including a brand-new epilogue. To access the epilogue, players must have completed the base game and both DLCs of Scarlet and Violet. The epilogue promises a new adventure, potentially introducing new map areas and trainer battles, but this will likely be the final content for Gen 9. Literature ReviewPokémon Scarlet and Violet’s story isn’t over yet; there’s a new adventure coming to the Kitakami region.

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC Leaks Hint At A Groundbreaking New Type Combination
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet may introduce a groundbreaking new type combination never seen before in the series. Leaks suggest the new type combination could be related to Dipplin’s secret evolution. If the rumored evolution is true, it should make its debut in the upcoming expansion. Literature ReviewAccording to new leaks about the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, a unique and unused type combination will finally make its debut.

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC Leaks Kieran s Possession Theory Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe theory that Kieran is possessed in the Indigo Disk DLC is backed by leaks and evidence. Rumors point to Dokutaro being the Mythical Pokémon responsible for controlling Kieran. Kieran may undergo a character arc, going from ally to villain and back to ally. Literature ReviewThere is a popular theory about the story of Kieran’s possession in the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet. Here are all the details.

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk Every Member Of The Elite Four, Ranked By Difficulty
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Indigo Disk DLC introduces a new Elite Four with a significant increase in difficulty compared to the base game. Crispin is the easiest of the Elite Four, primarily weak to Water- and Ground-type Pokémon. The Champion, Kieran, has a well-balanced team that requires complex strategizing. Literature ReviewNone of the Elite Four fights in The Indigo Disk are particularly easy, but they’re also not all equal in the overall level of challenge.

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk Has The Strongest Trainer Ever, Even Beating Cynthia
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKieran, a character in the Indigo Disk DLC of Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, is officially the strongest trainer in the series, surpassing Cynthia’s average team level. Kieran’s average team level is slightly higher than Cynthia’s in Brilliant Diamond and Shining Pearl. Despite Kieran’s higher average level, Cynthia still holds the title of Pokémon League Champion, one thing Kieran hasn’t achieved (yet). Literature ReviewPokémon Scarlet and Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC reveals the series’ strongest trainer ever.

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk Leaks Are Good News For Shiny Hunters
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPokémon Scarlet and Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC may remove some Shiny locks. Three or four Legendaries are expected to make their Shiny debuts in the DLC, based on leaks. While some Legendaries may lose their Shiny locks, others will likely remain Shiny locked for the time being. Literature ReviewA new set of leaks regarding Pokémon Scarlet and Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC may be good news for players who consider themselves Shiny hunters.

item.title: Pokémon Indigo Disk s Map Size Compared To Teal Mask DLC & Paldea Region
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet introduces a new map set in the Unova region, but is limited to the Blueberry Academy. The Terarium, the primary playable area in The Indigo Disk DLC, is larger than Kitakami from The Teal Mask, but still much smaller than the overall size of Paldea in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet. The Indigo Disk DLC makes good use of its space by featuring distinct biomes, such as polar, coastal, savanna, and canyon, in a comparatively small area.

item.title: Pokémon Leaks Every Legendary Pokémon Coming To Indigo Disk DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet will feature returning Legendary Pokémon from past Generations. The DLC will introduce new forms for Koraidon and Miraidon, as well as new Legendaries. A total of 25 Legendary Pokémon included in the Indigo Disk DLC were datamined. Literature ReviewAccording to an alleged new leak, the list of returning Legendary Pokémon in the Indigo Disk DLC for Scarlet and Violet has been datamined.

item.title: Pokémon s Gen 10 Games Are Already Doomed (& History Proves It)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPokémon Gen 10 is expected to face criticism upon its release, as previous generations have faced similar challenges and negative feedback. Emotional investment plays a big role in the Pokémon community, and newer games may not capture the same charm as childhood favorites, making it easier for flaws to overshadow positive aspects. Game Freak, the developer of Pokémon, has received criticism for delivering games that feel compromised and lack polish.

item.title: Pokémon s Indigo Disk DLC Release Date Is Perfect For One Reason
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Indigo Disk, the second part of Pokémon Scarlet and Violet’s The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero expansion, is set to release on December 14. This release date means The Indigo Disk will be available just in time for the major holiday season, when many fans will have time to play it. Pokémon games releasing before the holidays has become something of a tradition for the franchise, and The Indigo Disk will likely follow its predecessors in being a great holiday gift.

item.title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet 7-Star Iron Bundle Tera Raid Guide
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIron Bundle will receive the next Mightiest Mark with its upcoming 7 Star Ice-Tera Type Raid for Pokémon Scarlet & Violet in December 2023. To connect to the 7-Star Iron Bundle Tera Raid, you must have internet access. There will then be a black sparkling Ice-Tera Symbol, which you must reach to begin the raid. If the raid starts with just your Pokémon, it will fill the team with NPCs, which is handy if you want to solo the raid.

item.title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Claim Your Latest In-Game Freebie Before It s Gone
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewNintendo is offering a free in-game reward for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet players to celebrate the release of the game’s epilogue chapter. Even though the story is concluded, the classic company revealed more details about the Epilogue’s mascot. The Mythical Pecharunt from Pokémon Scarlet and Violet’s Epilogue has had its backstory shared, revealing more information about why it headed to the land of Kitakami in the first place and how it is connected to the rest of the campaign in The Teal Mask DLC.

item.title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Epilogue Has A Secret Cutscene You Probably Missed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Epilogue for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet includes a secret cutscene. The cutscene can be missed if players do not use the proper Pokémon in battle. The Epilogue’s hidden cutscene references the lore of Kitakami. Literature ReviewPlayers can miss out on a secret cutscene in the Epilogue for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet if they do not use a certain special Pokémon in battle. There is a short yet somewhat secret cutscene in the Epilogue for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet.

item.title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet How To Get Darkrai, Dialga, & Palkia
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn celebration of the upcoming release of The Indigo Disk DLC, you can now catch Darkrai, Dialga, and Palkia in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet. Instead of going on a field trip, however, you will be sent on an exchange program with Naranja and Uva Academies’ sister school, Blueberry Academy in the Unova region. This connection has already fueled a lot of speculation, including rumors about the Gen 5 Pokémon game remakes.

item.title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet How To Get Shiny Lucario & Master Ball For Free
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewClaim a free Shiny Lucario and Master Ball in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet to celebrate the launch of The Indigo Disk. Here are the Mystery Gift codes. Located in the region of Unova, Blueberry Academy is a sister school to Naranja and Uva Academies in Paldea. There, you will double down on an intense battling program, as the school specializes in Double Battles. It is expected that there will be a new type in the Pokémon Indigo Disk DLC, as well as the reveal of new Shinies that were previously Shiny locked.

item.title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC Final Boss & Ending Explained (In Detail)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe ending of the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet is shocking and pleasant. The story concludes the tale initiated with The Teal Mask expansion. The Indigo Disk also reveals some information about the base game’s campaign. Literature ReviewBoth the final boss encounter and ending of the Indigo Mask DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet are shocking. Here’s everything that happens in detail. The ending of the Indigo Disk DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet is a shocking and pleasant one to witness as a player.

item.title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC How To Beat The Drayton Elite Trial
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn the Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC you need to beat Trials for each of the elite four, including Drayton through winning battles. The activities required to complete these trials differ greatly from making a sandwich, passing a quiz, completing a flying time trial, and battling using certain Pokémon. Elite Four member Drayton has appeared in several Pokémon titles and is the hardest of the four to defeat in battle.

item.title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk How To Get Briar s Book Secret Cutscene
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBriar’s Book is an item that players will receive after completing the Pokémon Scarlet & Violet Indigo Disk DLC, but it has more use than it seems. After Tarapagos is captured and the group heads out of Pokémon Scarlet & Violet’s Area Zero, credits will begin to roll. Once the credits finish rolling, you will be notified that Briar is looking for you in one of the Blueberry Academy classrooms, where, after a short conversation, she will hand over her book about Area Zero that will be added to your inventory.

item.title: Pokémon TCG Black Friday Boxes - Release Info, Price, & What s Included
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlack Friday deals for the Pokémon Trading Card Game products are already being advertised and made available. Walmart is offering an exclusive Pikachu VMAX Premium Collection box set, which includes extras over the standard Special Collection box. Many Black Friday Pokémon TCG deals are already listed, but it’s also worth checking local game stores for discounts. Literature Review​​​​​​​Black Friday means great deals on shopping to stock up on holiday gifts or personal collections.

item.title: Pokémon TCG Everything In The Temporal Forces Elite Trainer Box
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPreorder the Temporal Forces Elite Trainer Boxes now, featuring Walking Wake and Iron Leaves. Boxes include booster packs, promo cards, card sleeves, energy cards, dice, markers, and more. Exclusive extras available when ordering from The Pokémon Center, but other retailers may have cheaper prices. Literature ReviewPokémon Trainers can look forward to the new Elite Trainer Boxes for the upcoming Pokémon TCG: Temporal Forces set with lots of fun goodies inside.

item.title: Pokémon TCG Paldean Fates - Release Date, New Cards, & Special Sets Info
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe next Pokémon TCG expansion, Paldean Fates, will include over 100 Shiny Pokémon cards from Japan’s Shiny Treasures ex set. Paldean Fates will be the first set of 2024, and will come with regular booster packs, a booster box, and an Elite Trainer Box on launch day. In addition to the regular sets, Paldean Fates will have special sets like the Paldean Fates Premium Collection and Mini Tin collections that will release later on February 9, 2024.

item.title: Pokémon TCG Shiny Mew Leak May Be The Most Adorable Mew Of All Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA leaked Shiny Mew card from the upcoming Shiny Treasure ex for Pokémon TCG set has surfaced. The card features a cute and delicate illustration of the Mythical Pokémon. The new subset is expected to be released in the West on January 26, 2024. Literature ReviewA Special Illustration Rare card from the Shiny Treasure ex subset for Pokémon TCG has allegedly leaked, featuring a gorgeous Shiny Mew. A new Shiny Mew card from Pokémon TCG’s Shiny Treasure ex has allegedly leaked, and it may be the most adorable illustration of the Mythical Pokémon so far.

item.title: Pokémon TCG Temporal Forces - Release Date, New Cards, & Special Sets
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe next Pokémon TCG expansion, Temporal Forces, will be released in March and is expected to feature Paradox Pokémon and powerful cards. Temporal Forces will likely include cards from the Japanese Wild Force, and Cyber Judge sets, providing an indication of what to expect. ACE SPEC cards, which haven’t been seen since the Black & White series, will make a return with Temporal Forces, adding new dynamics to the game.

item.title: Pokémon The Difference Between Counterfeit & Masterpiece Form Poltchageist In Teal Mask
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe new DLC for Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, Teal Mask, introduces 200 new and returning Pokémon to the Kitakami Pokédex, including the Ghost/Grass-type Pokémon, Poltchageist. Poltchageist has two forms, Counterfeit Form and Masterpiece Form. To evolve Poltchageist into Sinistcha, trainers need to use the Unremarkable Teacup on the Counterfeit Form or the Masterpiece Teacup on the Masterpiece Form. The spawn rate for the authentic Masterpiece Form is lower, but the forms seem to have no combat difference.

item.title: Pokémons Gen 10 Games Need To Reveal One Characters Mysterious Fate
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe next Pokémon games have the potential to provide closure to unresolved storylines and reveal the fate of a popular character. Speculation is growing about the future Pokémon games, including remakes of Pokémon Black and White and the debut of a new region in Gen 10. Ingo, a character from Pokémon Legends: Arceus, has a mysterious fate but could get a resolution in a future game. Literature ReviewPokémon’s Generation 10 games offer the perfect opportunity to reveal what happened to one popular character whose fate has been left a mystery.

item.title: Pokémons Indigo Disk DLC Creates A Paradox For Scarlet & Violets Legendaries
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe DLC in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet introduces Paradox Pokémon and highlights the use of time travel and paradoxes in the game’s plot. The origin of Paradox Pokémon is uncertain, adding a new dimension to the franchise’s existing themes of time travel and parallel worlds. Interactions with characters like Sada and Turo create bootstrap paradoxes and multiple timelines, showcasing the complex nature of the game’s narrative. Literature ReviewA certain encounter in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet’s Indigo Disk DLC has created a paradox centered on the games’ mascot Legendary Pokémon.

item.title: Poppy Playtime Chapter 3 Release Window, Story, Setting, & Characters
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe ending of Poppy Playtime Chapter 2 sets up a thrilling and intense continuation for the next episode, with a cliffhanger that leaves players in suspense. Poppy Playtime Chapter 3 takes place in the Playcare area of the Playtime Co. factory, revealing horrifying secrets and experiments conducted on children in the orphanage. The introduction of the new monster, CatNap, adds to the chilling atmosphere and suggests the presence of a mysterious antagonist, the Prototype.

item.title: PowerWash Simulator How To Play With Friends (Multiplayer Guide)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewNow players can join together in multiplayer to tackle jobs and wash away grime in PowerWash Simulator’s cross-platform play mode. Every job in PowerWash Simulator can be tackled in single-player, but even seemingly simple jobs, such as cleaning a playground, can involve tracking down tough-to-reach spots where dirt and muck build up. Later, the game features extremely odd gigs, such as cleaning a secret hatch on the surface of Mars, and some of these jobs can be truly gigantic in scale.

item.title: Prince Of Persia The Lost Crown - How To Increase Max Health (Soma Petal Locations)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSargon can only increase their max health in Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown by finding special artifacts called Soma Petals in different locations.
