item.title: The Best Main Party Member To Use in Baldurs Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCertain party members are more versatile in Baldur’s Gate 3. This makes it easier to place them in more part compositions, regardless of builds. Who are the most valuable party members changes slightly on the main character. Many players, will opt to make a custom Tav or Dark Urge avatar. While some may decide to begin with one of the six origin characters. This main hero cannot be removed from the team, and you don’t want too many redundancies with roles or abilities.

item.title: The Best Party Combinations In Star Ocean The Second Story R
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewParties in Star Ocean The Second Story R have strengths and weaknesses. Some fight up close, use many spells, or keep the enemy far away at range. Many of these team setups are partially about the individual Special Arts or Spells they learn. Many are gained by leveling up. But, others are obtained via side quests or through the complex crafting system. If you are utilizing the latter, then you might also need plenty of extra FOL currency for raw materials.

item.title: The Best Role Combinations in Last Train Home
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Last Train Home lets soldiers learn up to six roles at once. This allows them to support the team both in battle and aboard the armored train. You are given Role Points at certain Rank increases. You also need to have some minimum Attributes - Fitness, Dexterity, Intelligence, Willpower, or Charisma - to unlock a brand-new Role. Even if the UI and tutorial tips are flashing messages that Role Points are unspent, you should save them until you reach those Attributes instead of using them on the first available option.

item.title: The Best Upgrades to Get First in God of War Ragnarok Valhalla
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIn the new God of War Ragnorak: Valhalla DLC, players will want to get as many upgrades as possible to buff Kratos up as much as possible. There are a lot of rewards in the GoW Ragnarok: Valhalla DLC and longtime fans will likely be happy to see many of them. However, like many roguelites, it can take a lot of work to get from beginning to end on this one.

item.title: The Best Ways to Farm XP in Modern Warfare 3 Zombies
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFarming XP in Modern Warfare 3 Zombies is different from past titles, with the massive map providing new ways to best defeat waves of undead hordes. One of the easiest ways to earn experience fast comes from expending a Double XP Token, a reward for playing matches in Modern Warfare 3’s multiplayer. The boost this Token provides only lasts for a limited time, so use it wisely. It’s always better to farm XP with a squad than alone since your rewards are usually increased if you play with more people.

item.title: The Biggest Ark Survival Ascended News Has Nothing To Do With A DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDLC expansions are not the only focus of future content in Ark: Survival Ascended. A major update to the game’s development kit is being planned to allow players to create entirely new games using the system. The graphical quality of Ark: Survival Ascended’s assets, which push the detail possible in Unreal Engine 5, makes it easier to create appealing environments when using the dev kit. Ark: Survival Ascended is making community-made content more accessible for console users by partnering with major mod platform CurseForge, allowing console players to access published content.

item.title: The Day Before Release Date, Global Launch Times & Gameplay Details
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Day Before is an open-world, survival horror, MMO shooter from developer Fntastic. Prior to a full release expected sometime in 2024, The Day Before will enter early access on Steam in December 2023. The console version has been delayed. The game will have a simultaneous worldwide launch, allowing all players to enter the servers at the same time. Literature ReviewThe Day Before releases soon, with an early access period and consistent global launch plan that lay out exactly when PC users will be able to play.

item.title: The Finals Battle Pass Highlights One Major Problem With Live-Service Gaming
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Finals’ Battle Pass is time-consuming and requires players to invest exorbitant amounts of time to complete it. Battle passes in online games can make the experience feel like an obligation rather than a joy, limiting players’ exploration of other games and hindering the growth of alternative options. Other games like Fortnite, Apex Legends, and Halo Infinite have implemented more player-friendly battle pass systems, offering quality-of-life benefits and better rewards, setting a standard for what battle passes should be.

item.title: The Finals The Best Build For Beginners (Light, Medium, or Heavy)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewIf you’re unsure about which Contestants to play in The Finals or how to play them, then rely on the best builds for each class to get you started. The best abilities and gadgets to get first in The Finals are heavily influenced by the class you play. What’s more, the different Contestant types are all designed so they can be played with more than one style - one of the things The Finals does better than other FPS games.

item.title: The Funniest Content In Baldur s Gate 3 Is Hidden In An Act 3 Side Area
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Circus of the Last Days in Baldur’s Gate 3 is a humorous and engaging side area that offers a nice change of pace from the somber main story. Act 3 of Baldur’s Gate 3 is densely populated with quests and secrets, so taking your time and exploring can lead to significant rewards. The Circus of the Last Days is not only entertaining, but also a great shopping destination with funny and useful items for sale, as well as unique activities and a side story that shouldn’t be missed.

item.title: The Game Awards 2023 All Winners & Awards
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe winners of The Game Awards 2023 have been announced, with 31 awards given out in different categories, including Game of the Year and Content Creator of the Year. Titles like Baldur’s Gate 3 and Alan Wake 2 stood out as nominees in multiple categories, generating a lot of debate and speculation among critics and players. The winners were determined by a blend of the jury’s decisions and public voting, with the jury’s picks having a heavier impact of 90% and the public’s choices making up the remaining 10%.

item.title: The Game Awards 2023 Biggest Announcements, Trailers, & New Game Reveals
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Game Awards 2023 showcased a range of announcements and trailers for upcoming video games, including remakes and new releases. The iconic “World Premiere” title card was not used this year, but it didn’t impact the number of exciting reveals during the show. Many developers presented their new projects and updates on their existing ones. Literature ReviewAt The Game Awards 2023, new trailers and first-time reveals made up a huge part of the show.

item.title: The Game Awards 2023 Every Category & Nomination
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Game Awards 2023 will feature awards given in 31 total categories. Game of the Year 2023 is an especially close race, with six nominees selected out of the many brilliant games released since the previous TGA. The Game Awards 2023 will air on December 7, 2023, and will be livestreamed on various platforms like YouTube and Twitch, bringing game reveals and trailers in addition to the awards ceremony.

item.title: The Game Awards 2023 Predictions For GOTY Winner & Every Category
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Game Awards 2023 will air on December 7, celebrating the best in the video game industry and showcasing exclusive trailers and announcements. There are several strong contenders for GOTY in 2023, including Baldur’s Gate 3, The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, and Alan Wake 2 Final Fantasy XVI is expected to win Best Narrative, offering outstanding storytelling and narrative development in a game. Literature ReviewEach year, the winners of the various categories at The Game Awards go down in history.

item.title: The Golden Bachelor April Kirkwood s Age, Job, Instagram & More
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYApril Kirkwood, a contestant on The Golden Bachelor, made an entertaining impact on fans with her antics on the show. Despite her playfulness, April couldn’t make a connection with Gerry, the show’s lead, and was eventually eliminated. April is a 66-year-old therapist, TEDx speaker, published author, and veteran counselor with an active presence on Instagram. Literature ReviewAlthough April Kirkwood’s fun personality shone on The Golden Bachelor, her time on the show was short.

item.title: The Golden Bachelor s Gerry Turner & Theresa Nist Spotted For First Time Since Golden Wedding
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGerry and Theresa, who recently got married on live TV, made their first public appearance as a couple. They were spotted on a casual date in Theresa’s hometown of Shrewsbury, New Jersey. The couple showcased their love for each other as they walked arm in arm outside a grocery store. They were dressed comfortably for the chilly weather. Theresa and Gerry prefer a low-key and comfortable style in their post-wedding outfits, unlike what they wore during the TV show or their wedding ceremony.

item.title: The Lamplighters League Interview Composer Jon Everist On Jazz Solos & Apocalyptic Threats
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Lamplighters League is a turn-based tactics video game praised for its characters, gameplay, and unique aesthetic. Composer Jon Everist created a jazz-inspired main theme for the game, with randomized saxophone solos performed by a friend. Everist had to consider the game’s interactive nature when composing the score, assigning different solo instruments to each character and creating ambient tracks that respond to player actions. Literature ReviewComposer Jon Everist discusses his continued collaboration with game studio Harebrained Schemes and his unique score for The Lamplighters League.

item.title: The Last Faith How To Unlock Leenas Bow
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewLeena’s Bow is a special firearm you can unlock with the right blueprints in The Last Faith, giving you a ranged weapon that deals potent fire damage. Before you can gain the Rare Prototype Blueprint that yields Leena’s Bow, you must have the power to destroy Locked Doors. This ability is acquired as you progress through the game, as one might expect from the skills shown in The Last Faith’s gameplay trailer.

item.title: The Last Faith How To Unlock The Federal Admirals Cannon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA rare Firearm in The Last Faith called The Federal Admiral’s Cannon can be unlocked when you discover a hidden chest deep within a dangerous area. Thankfully, no prerequisite powers or abilities are needed to find The Federal Admiral’s Cannon as you travel to different regions in The Last Faith. You won’t find this weapon as a collected item lying on the ground, like Quicksilver in Blasphemous, but rather as a treasure locked inside a chest.

item.title: The Last Faith How to Unlock The Rift of Blood (Melee Weapon)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe strongest melee weapon found in The Last Faith is The Rift of Blood, a sword that you can unlock by completing four different combat challenges. There are four Bloody Chalices scattered around Osseus Fortress that you can interact with to spill blood from the goblets decorated on the altar in the center of the area. In contrast to how you unlock Leena’s Bow in The Last Faith, you have to travel to multiple locations before opening the path toward the Rift of Blood.

item.title: The Last of Us 2 How to Beat the Rat King (The Easy Way)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Last of Us 2 has many new horrifying displays of the fungal infection, including the Rat King boss that cannot be beaten easily during the story. The Rat King is perhaps one of TLOU2’s most challenging and terrible boss fights, but there are good ways to approach this fight before it happens. Stock up on supplies like ammunition, healing items, or throwable objects to give yourself a fighting chance in TLOU Part 2.

item.title: The Last Of Us 2 Remastered Every No Return Playable Character, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe No Return game mode in The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered allows players to control previously inaccessible characters, each with their own playstyle and starting equipment. Unlocking characters in No Return requires completing a certain number of encounters with other characters, and while none are outright bad, some characters provide better advantages than others. Characters like Joel have great starting equipment, but Traits that provide serious detriments. The best characters have Traits that are universally useful in No Return.

item.title: The Last Of Us 2 Remastered Has One New Feature More Games Should Use
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Last of Us Part 2 Remastered is more than a standard remaster, improving the game’s graphics but also providing a host of new content. The most fascinating new content is the Lost Levels, which are unfinished game segments that were cut mid-development, repurposed with developer commentary. The Lost Levels are the perfect addition for a rerelease, and would be great bonus content for other remasters as well. Literature ReviewThe Last of Us Part 2 Remastered has a variety of new content compared to the original release, but one new addition in particular is fascinating.

item.title: The Last Of Us Part 2 Ending Explained (In Detail)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Last of Us Part 2 is a brutally violent game that explores the consequences of revenge and cyclical violence. Ellie is unable to find closure regarding Joel’s death, and mistakenly believes revenge is the only means to accomplish it. Ellie’s actions at the end of TLOU 2 are difficult to understand, but they stem from the series’ ideas on found families and the capacity for forgiving the unforgivable.

item.title: The Legend of Zelda Games In 2024 Should Have You Worried
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Zelda series has met with a lot of success recently, but there’s little news about what’s next. 2024 could be the first year in recent memory without a Zelda release, breaking a trend of almost yearly releases that has characterized the franchise in recent years. Rumors suggest that Wind Waker and Twilight Princess remasters could be released for the Switch in 2024. The focus on a live-action movie adaptation may also be delaying the next Zelda game’s development.

item.title: The Legend Of Zelda s Most Mysterious Enemies Are Actually Real-Life Aliens
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe aliens encountered in Majora’s Mask, known as Them, are based on a real-life encounter with the Flatwoods Monster in West Virginia. The design decision to include aliens in Majora’s Mask was inspired by a UFO boom in Japan at the time of development. The Them encounter at Romani Ranch is one of the most memorable moments in Majora’s Mask, and the monsters are among the most mysterious enemies in The Legend of Zelda.

item.title: The Mario Remake You ve Been Waiting For Is Probably Coming Sooner Than You Thought
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe remake of Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door has been rated by the ESRB. Although there hasn’t been a definitive release date announced yet, Nintendo games typically get rated by the ESRB only months before they launch. As a remake of a classic Mario RPG, Paper Mario: TTYD may be one of the Switch’s last major releases before Nintendo’s new console is released. Literature ReviewAlthough the exact release date of the Paper Mario: TTYD remake has yet to be announced, one piece of evidence suggests it’s releasing early in 2024.

item.title: The Next Zelda Game Can Bring Back An Overlooked Link Detail
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Legend of Zelda’s next game is highly anticipated, but details about its gameplay and appearance are still unknown, as the game hasn’t even been confirmed to be in development. Link, the iconic hero of the series, has had very little character change throughout its history, except for a change in outfit and, oddly, his dominant hand. Link’s original left-handedness in the early 3D era of the series was a unique detail, and it would be a nice homage if it were to make a comeback in the next installment.

item.title: The Next Zelda Game Is Likely Abandoning Tears Of The Kingdoms Link
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTears of the Kingdom may be the last game with this version of Link, signaling a possible retirement for the character. A new Hyrule in future Zelda games means new characters and a fresh story, saying farewell to the current version of Link. The absence of planned DLC for Tears of the Kingdom suggests that the developers consider the game complete and ready to move on to a new chapter.

item.title: The Next Zelda Game Needs To Bring Back The Series Best Tradition
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe next Legend of Zelda game should bring back the traditional mechanic of playing a musical instrument, which has been absent in recent titles. Music is a key aspect of the Zelda franchise, with Link often having powerful instruments that allow him to perform magical songs. Implementing motion controls for playing an instrument in the next Zelda game on the Switch could offer new and exciting possibilities for gameplay.

item.title: The One (Mean) Way To Remove Villagers In LEGO Fortnite
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRemoving a Villager in LEGO Fortnite is fairly easy, but players should first consider other options to unlock more settlement space for new friends. Before you send any of your Villagers away, you may want to upgrade your LEGO Fortnite Village instead. You unlock slots for more Villagers as you upgrade, and a fully upgraded Village can house five Villagers. As such, it may be worth checking whether any of your settlements have room before deciding to remove someone.

item.title: The Perfect Marvels Spider-Man 2 DLC Is A Completely Different Game
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA DLC for Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 could shake things up by altering everything about the core gameplay. The DLC could transform the expansion into a third-person stealth shooter, similar to The Last of Us. This expansion could set the stage for future DLCs involving other characters like Daredevil. Literature ReviewThere are many possibilities when it comes to a DLC for Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, but the best one would completely change the game and story.

item.title: The Real History Of Yasuke, Assassins Creed Reds Rumored New Samurai Protagonist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLeaks claim that Assassin’s Creed Codename Red will feature a protagonist based on the real historical figure of Yasuke. Yasuke’s backstory in the game may take some creative license, potentially making it inaccurate. His role in Japan’s Sengoku period is well-documented. Yasuke fought alongside Oda Nobunaga and rose to the rank of samurai, but his true story ends with Nobunaga’s death and his own disappearance from history. Literature ReviewRumor has it the protagonist of Assassin’s Creed Red will be based on the historical figure of Yasuke, a Black samurai in Oda Nobunaga’s army.

item.title: The Real Reason Dontay Wilder Left The Traitors US (SPOILERS)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDeontay Wilder left The Traitors US after Maksim’s banishment - the first player to leave for non-murder or banishment reasons. The all-star cast of reality TV legends adds drama to the show as they try to determine who the Traitors are. Deontay struggled with betraying his friends, causing him emotional distress and likely leading to his departure. Literature ReviewThe Traitors US season 2 welcomed an all-star cast, but Deontay Wilder chose to leave the series after just 3 episodes.

item.title: The Remaining Traitors UK Cast Members Ranked From Worst To Best (Who Will Be Banished Next)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRoss is the worst player on The Traitors UK Season 2, consistently making incorrect and loud accusations. Evie and Mollie are also weak players, with Evie lacking insight and Mollie being too quiet and unsuspecting. Jaz is the best player, correctly identifying Paul as a traitor and having the potential to take down Harry and win the game. Literature ReviewThe Traitors UK is past the halfway point, and some players have better strategies than others.

item.title: The Sims 4 10 Highest Paying Careers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe highest-paying career in The Sims 4 can earn §16,880 per week. Additional career options introduced through expansions can be even more lucrative than the base game careers. When comparing career incomes, consider the Sim’s working hours per day and days per week as it significantly impacts their earnings. Literature ReviewIn order to make the most Simoleons and to live as lavishly as possible, players should take advantage of the best-paying careers in The Sims 4.

item.title: The Sims 4 12 Best Websites To Find Custom Content
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCustom content, or CC, offers a free alternative to expensive DLCs for The Sims 4 , allowing players to enhance their game without breaking the bank. Tumblr is a great source for quality CC, with a vibrant community of The Sims players and special events like Simblreen. Other options include Llama CC Finds, Maxis Match World CC on Tumblr, and more. Literature ReviewThese platforms, including Tumblr and YouTube, are the best places to find the latest and greatest custom content for The Sims 4.

item.title: The Sims 4 How To Move Objects Up
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Sims 4 is best known for its customization options, and building is an important part of that. Here’s how to move objects up in The Sims 4. You can move objects vertically along the wall or lift regular objects off the ground. However, the game doesn’t let you do that with everything. If you want to move certain objects up, you will need to use cheats to do it.

item.title: The Sims 4 Is About To Get A Highly-Requested DLC, According To Accidental Leak
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEA accidentally leaked The Sims 4’s new DLC, confirming a medieval-themed castle estate kit that fans have been requesting since it won a community vote, beating a sci-fi theme. The Castle Estate Kit includes stone walls, leaded glass, parapets, arrow slits, and gargoyles for players to create a dramatic backdrop. The release date of October 15, 2099 listed in the leak is likely a placeholder, suggesting the DLC could be released sooner.

item.title: The Talos Principle 2 How to Unlock The Chicken Achievement
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne of the rarest achievements you can unlock in The Talos Principle 2 called “Chicken” comes from refusing to participate in the game’s story. Before getting the “Chicken” trophy/achievement, you must beat the Training tutorial that teaches you basic systems and mechanics. This segment introduces you to some of the characters in The Talos Principle 2 and the general setting you’ll be interacting with. Continue past the Training until you are offered a chance to go along on an Expedition that goes into the game’s main city.

item.title: The Traitors UK Fans Arent Ready For Most Shocking Episode Yet, According To Paul Gorton
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPaul Gorton’s cryptic tweet about upcoming events in The Traitors UK has caused chaos among fans who are confused and eagerly awaiting what will happen next. Paul’s recent move to get one of his fellow Traitors banished has caused him to be viewed differently by other players in the game. Despite some fans being upset with Paul’s actions, he may have strategically positioned himself to have a strong chance of winning the competition.

item.title: The Traitors US 10 Signs Dan Will Be The First Traitor Banished
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDan Gheesling is a legendary reality TV player known for his strategic gameplay on Big Brother 10 and 14. His fellow cast members on The Traitors US season 2 are aware of his previous strategies, which may work against him. Dan’s lack of a poker face and his difficulty forming new relationships may make him an easy target for elimination on The Traitors US. Literature ReviewThe Traitors US season 2’s Dan Gheesling was meant to be a Traitor but is his time in the game coming to an end early?

item.title: The Traitors US Deontay Wilder Wilder, John Bercow, & Kevin Kreider Interview
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCast members with diverse backgrounds joined The Traitors US season 2, including reality stars and entertainment personalities like Deontay Wilder, Kevin Kreider, and John Bercow. Deontay’s boxing background and John’s communication skills added fresh perspectives to the show, despite their lack of reality TV competition experience. Deontay, John, and Kevin were suspected at times, but they brought entertaining moments to the season and made the show more exciting. Literature ReviewThe Traitors US welcomed Deontay Wilder, John Bercow, and Kevin Kreider into the reality TV competition world, and they talked to us about the series.

item.title: The Traitors US Johnny Bananas Criticizes Dan Gheeslings ‘Terrible Move
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Traitors US season 2’s first “murder” victim, Johnny “Bananas” Devenanzio, criticizes Dan Gheesling’s decision to eliminate him, calling it a “terrible move” and suggesting that Dan should have kept him as a flashy distraction. Johnny planned to work together with fellow Challenge legend Chris “CT” Tamburello on the show. Johnny’s early elimination was surprising, as he is known for being a fierce competitor and his absence will be disappointing to fans.

item.title: The Traitors US Maksim Chmerkovskiy, Tamra Judge, & Sherée Whitfield Interview
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTamra, Sherée, and Maks found participating in The Traitors US season 2 to be a completely different experience from their previous reality TV shows. Despite their different backgrounds, all three cast members used their skills gained from previous reality TV experiences to their advantage in the game. The bond formed among the cast members on The Traitors US seems to go beyond the typical relationships formed on reality TV, building lasting connections.

item.title: The Traitors US Peter Weber Reveals If He Could Have Survived As A Traitor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPeter wanted to be a traitor in The Traitors US season 2 for the power it offers, despite the stress that comes with it. Peter used his pilot training skills to be observant and make smart decisions in the game. Although Peter is currently playing as a faithful, he has the potential to join the traitors’ team in future episodes. Literature ReviewThe Traitors US season 2 brought The Bachelor’s Peter Weber into a high-stakes strategy game, testing his abilities.

item.title: The Traitors US Season 2 Power Rankings After Episode 3 Most Likely To Be Murdered (SPOILERS)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Traitors US season 2 traitors–Parvati Shallow, Dan Gheesling, and Phaedra Parks–must murder a faithful in plain sight. Parvati and Dan considered murdering John Bercow, Shereé Whitfield, or MJ Javid. The Traitors US season 2 episode 3 ended with a cliffhanger, not yet revealing the murder. Literature ReviewThe Traitors US season 2’s third murder is like nothing seen before on the mystery show. Which of the faithfuls is most likely to survive it?

item.title: The Traitors US Season 2 s Extended Trailer Reveals Two Shocking Surprise Cast Members
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Traitors US season 2 surprises viewers with two legendary reality TV stars joining the cast. Below Deck star Kate Chastain returns to the game, causing shock among the rest of the cast. Big Brother’s Dr. Will Kirby is listed as a special guest, but adds a mysterious twist, leaving fans eager to see how he will impact the competition. Literature ReviewThe Traitors US season 2’s extended trailer reveals that there will be two exciting additions to the all-star cast of reality TV legends coming soon.

item.title: The Traitors US Season 2 Traitors Are Turning On Each Other (Thats A Mistake) - Spoilers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Traitors US season 2 traitors should not turn on each other as it would be a huge mistake for their game. The traitors have a good mix of powerful allies from different shows supporting them. Arguments among the traitors risk exposing their identities, potentially putting them in danger of banishment. Literature ReviewThe Traitors US season 2 traitors have already secretly committed three murders. But what will happen if they begin to turn on each other?

item.title: The Traitors US Season 2s Dan Gheesling Isnt A Very Strong Traitor, According To Larsa
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Traitors Us Faithful Larsa Pippen suspected that Dan Gheesling was a Traitor due to his calm and relaxed demeanor, which made her uneasy. She believed he could be a “killer.” Larsa correctly identified Dan as a Traitor, but couldn’t convince others to vote him out instead of Maks Chmerkovskiy. Larsa doesn’t seem to think that Dan was the best choice to be a Traitor. Literature ReviewOn The Traitors US season 2, Larsa Pippen correctly called out Dan Gheesling for being a Traitor.

item.title: The Trust A Game Of Greed Cant Match The Traitors (It s No Contest)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Trust: A Game Of Greed falls short compared to reality TV favorites like The Traitors and Big Brother. The gameplay in The Trust lacks strategic depth and contestants can simply choose to share the prize money. The character development in The Trust is lacking, making it difficult to invest in any of the contestants and their stories feel contrived. Literature ReviewThe Trust: A Game Of Greed is a cross between The Traitors and Big Brother, but it can’t match the best reality TV shows.

item.title: The Valley Season 1 Latest News, Cast, Trailer & Everything We Know
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Valley is a new reality show spin-off of Vanderpump Rules, featuring returning cast members Jax, Brittany, and Kristen. The show is set to premiere in spring 2024, although an exact release date has not been announced. The Valley season 1 will introduce new cast members, including couples Danny and Nia, Jesse and Michelle, and Jason and Janet. Literature ReviewThe Valley is a new reality series recently announced by Bravo that is bringing back a few familiar faces from Vanderpump Rules.

item.title: The Weirdest Baldur s Gate 3 NPC Has An Interesting D&D Backstory
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 is set in the Forgotten Realms, a setting designed for tabletop D&D with a rich lore. Kar’niss is a drider with a tragic backstory, but he finds purpose in the Cult of the Absolute. Players can interact with the drider in different ways, but allowing him to guide them to Moonrise Towers reveals more about drider lore. Literature ReviewBaldur’s Gate 3 lore goes deep, and even the strangest, one-off NPCs can have incredibly complicated backstories.

item.title: There May Never Be Another Official Zelda Timeline After TOTK
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Legend of Zelda’s timeline is notoriously convoluted, and Tears of the Kingdom seems to contradict many aspects of it. Certain characters and events in Tears of the Kingdom make it impossible to reconcile it with the existing franchise timeline. It’s unlikely there will ever be an update to the official Zelda timeline, simply because TOTK has made it too confusing. Literature ReviewIt seems impossible to place The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom on the franchise’s official timeline, vastly complicating any future updates.

item.title: There s Already A New Starcraft RTS And It s Called Stormgate
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAfter a long wait for new content in the Starcraft franchise, fans of RTS games can look forward to Stormgate, a new RTS currently under development by ex-Starcraft developers. Stormgate has gained attention from professional Starcraft 2 players, indicating that it may offer high-quality competitive gameplay. While an official release date for Stormgate has yet to be announced, closed beta testing began on July 1, 2023. Literature ReviewSpeculation of a new, non-RTS Starcraft may have some fans excited, but there’s already a solid RTS game being made by ex-Blizzard developers.

item.title: There s Glimmer Of Hope For Baldur s Gate 3 Xbox Series S Split Screen
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThere have been technical improvements in the optimization process of Baldur’s Gate 3 for Xbox Series S. These enhancements rekindled hope for a split screen mode on the less powerful Xbox console. The popular RPG is expected to arrive on Microsoft consoles in 2024. Literature ReviewLarian Studios shared that there have been technical improvements in the optimization of Baldur’s Gate 3 for the Xbox Series S line of consoles.

item.title: There s One Big Problem With Dave The Diver s Best Indie Nomination At TGA 2023
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDave the Diver, developed by Nexon, is an excellent expamle of why The Game Awards needs to redefine “indie games.” The definition of “Indie Games” has become fuzzier, with many people mistakenly assuming that unique gameplay and affordable prices automatically classify a game as indie. However, real indie games are made by small teams or individuals without the support of a big studio like Nexon. Dave the Diver’s nomination for Best Indie Game is unfair to other nominees in the category and overlooks true indie games.

item.title: There s One Good Reason In Baldur s Gate 3 Not To Pick Your Favorite Origin Character
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOrigin characters offer a range of personalities, making them appealing to different players, but custom characters are a safer option. It’s better to replay Baldur’s Gate 3 with an Origin character after experiencing them as a party member, to fully explore their interactions and roleplay them effectively. Because of this, choosing a favorite Origin character in Baldur’s Gate 3 might not be the best choice, as playing as them sacrifices their dialogue and personality.

item.title: There s One Good Reason To Tame A Gigantopithecus In Ark Survival Ascended
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTaming a Gigantopithecus in Ark: Survival Ascended is a potentially huge advantage due to its versatility and strength. The Gigantopithecus can toss humans and carry heavy loads, making it an efficient resource mover. Its humanoid shape allows it to use ziplines, equip any helmet, gather resources, and navigate challenging terrains. Literature ReviewThe Gigantopithecus has some strong general utility in Ark: Survival Ascended, but one specific advantage gives it a special edge over any alternative

item.title: There s One Major Problem With Pokémon Scarlet & Violet s Epilogue
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe recently released epilogue, Mochi Mayhem, extends the adventure and introduces a Mythical Pokémon, but it can only be accessed through a presumably limited-time Mystery Gift. Tying the DLC epilogue to a time-sensitive delivery method is a mistake, as it limits the availability of significant story content and feels exploitative. It’s currently unclear if the epilogue Mystery Gift will be permanently available, if some other method of accessing it will be introduced, or if it will eventually become lost media.

item.title: There s One Very Good Reason To Pay Attention To No Man s Sky Devs New Game
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLight No Fire aims to avoid the mistakes made by No Man’s Sky by delivering on promises and avoiding a tarnished reputation. The trailer indicates that Light No Fire will have more complete multiplayer features and additional gameplay elements compared to No Man’s Sky. Hello Games’ commitment to continually improving No Man’s Sky through updates and free expansions suggests that they will prioritize player satisfaction and deliver a quality experience with Light No Fire.

item.title: There s One Very Obvious December Date For GTA 6 s Trailer Release
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFans have been eagerly anticipating the release of Grand Theft Auto 6 for over a decade. Rockstar Games has finally announced that the first trailer for the game will release in early December. There are two dates in early December which seem like the most likely candidates to host GTA 6’s reveal. Literature ReviewA tweet from Rockstar confirming GTA 6’s soon-to-be-released trailer has fans speculating just when they will get their first glimpse at the next GTA.

item.title: There s One Way To Avoid The Most Annoying Aspect Of BG3 Honour Mode
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBaldur’s Gate 3 introduces a new hardest difficulty called Honour Mode, which eliminates save scumming and introduces tougher enemies and challenging gameplay mechanics. Honour Mode’s single save slot adds tension and forces players to carefully consider their decisions, leading to unique and interesting experiences. For players who don’t want to deal with the limitations of the single save, a mod called Save In Honour Mode allows them to save and load files as normal.

item.title: There s One Way To Explore Mexico In RDR2 Without Using A Glitch
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFinally, players can visit Mexico in Red Dead Redemption 2 without glitches, thanks to a new mod called “Nuevo Paraíso - Mexico.” Previously, players could access Mexico through glitches, but there wasn’t much to see or do in that area. The mod, created by Mexico Team, reworks and remasters many of the Mexican locations from the first Red Dead Redemption game, bringing them to life in Red Dead Redemption 2.

item.title: There s One Way To Learn A Lot More About Cyberpunk 2077 s V
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYV is a blank slate protagonist in Cyberpunk 2077, allowing players to project their own personality onto the character through choices and playstyle. The Lifepath chosen at the beginning of the game determines V’s backstory and provides unique dialogue options that shape their character. Hit letters found in the game reveal how certain gangs perceive V, painting them as a heartless adversary and a violent killer. Literature ReviewCyberpunk 2077’s V actually has a little more personality than the average RPG protagonist.

item.title: There s Only One Way To Get Into Azkaban In Hogwarts Legacy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVisiting Azkaban in Hogwarts Legacy is exclusive to only one house. Inside Azkaban, players are met with Dementors and must help a wrongfully imprisoned individual while facing intense moments. After visiting Azkaban, players cannot go back, but it’s still possible future DLC might expand the quest for other Hogwarts houses. Literature ReviewIt’s possible to go to Azkaban in Hogwarts Legacy, but some preliminary steps are required in order to visit this iconic Harry Potter location.

item.title: There Was Probably Another Hyrule Before The Zonai s In Zelda TOTK
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe possibility that the Zonai may not have founded the original Hyrule presents intriguing implications for the entire Legend of Zelda series. The existence of an additional incarnation of Hyrule would explain some peculiar details in Tears of the Kingdom, such as changes in Hyrule’s religion and the connection between the Ancient Sages and Divine Beasts. The concept of a cycle of destruction and rebuilding fits well with the story of Breath of the Wild, and Tears of the Kingdom’s rebuilding efforts align with the idea of Hyrule being continually re-established after such events.

item.title: These The Traitors Stars Call Out Host Alan Cumming For Making The Biggest Mistake Of The Season (SPOILERS)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHost Alan Cumming made a mistake in choosing the traitor team, according to Johnny, Larsa, and Marcus. The initial traitors chosen were Dan Gheesling and Phaedra Parks, who later recruited Parvati Shallow. The cast may be unhappy with the traitors’ gameplay, but they should respect the strategic aspect. Literature ReviewThe Traitors US season 2 has finally dropped its first three episodes & some of the cast members have issues with the choices host Alan Cumming made.

item.title: These Zelda TOTK Murals Give Away The Entire Plot & Almost No One Noticed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe series of ancient murals under Hyrule Castle in The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom reveals the main story of the game during the introductory sequence. Players can easily deduce the basic plot of the game by examining the scenes illustrated in the murals, making the Dragon Tear memories almost superfluous. The murals unveil the events of the Zonai era in TOTK’s past, covering major events from the founding of Hyrule to Zelda’s fate.

item.title: This BG3 Skill Finally Introduces D&D Giants To Baldur s Gate 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGiants are not included in the narrative of Baldur’s Gate 3, but players can still make their character into a giant using clever tactics. This skill in BG3 differs from the Dungeons & Dragons tabletop version. Being a giant in Baldur’s Gate 3 has advantages, but some benefits have diminishing returns. Literature ReviewGiants might not show up in any official capacity in Baldur’s Gate 3, but that doesn’t mean there’s no way to make a giant happen in game.

item.title: This Classic Nintendo RPG Deserves A Remake For Its 30th Anniversary In 2024
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEarthBound, the beloved Nintendo RPG, is celebrating its 30th anniversary in 2024 and deserves a remake for a new generation. Despite initially poor sales and marketing struggles, EarthBound’s cult fandom and internet presence made it the popular game it is today. A remake of EarthBound would be a perfect anniversary celebration, offering improved graphics and quality-of-life updates while preserving its unique identity. Literature ReviewNintendo tends to play favorites a little too often, and one title deserves a proper spotlight after receiving mostly haphazard attention for years.

item.title: This Dragon Quest 1 Remake Is A Blast From The Past (& Completely Free)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Quest+ is a fan-made remake of the classic Dragon Quest game, faithfully recreating the original with updated graphics and new content. The remake includes new story beats, a ship for easier traversal, an orchestral soundtrack, and the ability to save progress at churches. The game can be downloaded for free at RPGMaker.net and is compatible with various Windows systems, making it accessible for fans of the original Dragon Quest.

item.title: This Fantasy RPG Might Ease The Wait For The Elder Scrolls 6
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Elder Scrolls 6 won’t be released for another handful of years, but the upcoming fantasy RPG Avowed is expected to fill a similar niche much sooner. Avowed, developed by Obsidian Entertainment, may appeal to Elder Scrolls fans with its similarities in RPG style and its lived-in world. Avowed is expected to have a more narrative and character-driven focus, with interconnected open zones, providing a unique first-person RPG experience.

item.title: This Hidden Cyberpunk 2077 Minigame Is Something That Deserves A Full Release
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCyberpunk 2077 has a wide variety of minigames, but only one stands out as deserving of a full release. Arasaka Tower 3D is a mini-game that stars Johnny Silverhand. It offers replay value with secret areas, lore tie-ins, and Easter eggs, and it could easily be expanded into a full-length game. The popularity of “boomer shooters” similar to Arasaka Tower 3D, along with other full-length games based on CD Projekt Red minigames has shown that there is a market for a standalone release.

item.title: This Hidden Marvel s Spider-Man 2 Easter Egg May Be Hinting At Some Unexpected DLC
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAn Easter egg in Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 hints at potential DLC featuring Daredevil, with a hidden room on the Upper West Side filled with swords and a library. Director Brian Intihar addressed the Easter eggs for Daredevil and teased a possible appearance of the character in Insomniac’s Marvel Universe. The shared universe of Insomniac’s Marvel games is expanding, with Marvel’s Wolverine confirmed to exist in the same universe and the potential for crossover with other superheroes like Doctor Strange.

item.title: This Highly-Anticipated Horror Game Doesn t Have A Hard Release Date (But That s Actually Good)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYS.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl has a Q1 2024 release window, which allows the developers flexibility and avoids rushing an unfinished product. The game has faced numerous delays and setbacks throughout its development, but the commitment of GSC Game World to release the game is impressive. While there may still be potential issues upon release, if the developers can address the problems that were found in the preview, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 has the potential to be a great game with strong environmental design and atmosphere.

item.title: This Highly-Requested GTA 6 Feature May Not Be Possible To Pull Off (Yet)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrand Theft Auto 6 will probably not have an advanced weather system, which may disappoint players who were expecting immersive weather effects. The decision to abandon advanced weather plans might be due to technical limitations, as creating realistic extreme weather conditions would require significant processing power. While it doesn’t look like GTA 6 will have groundbreaking weather, it is likely to build upon the weather improvements seen in GTA 5 and Red Dead Redemption 2, including the use of ray-tracing technology for enhanced lighting effects.

item.title: This New FPS Game Is Perfect If You Love Mickey Mouse & BioShock
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMouse, an upcoming indie FPS, draws inspiration from BioShock with its retro aesthetic, unique art style, and first-person shooter gameplay. The BioShock series has not seen a new entry since BioShock Infinite in 2013, leading fans to look for other promising releases like Mouse. Mouse showcases its potential in a gameplay trailer, featuring distinct level design, a variety of weapons and power-ups, and an immersive world, all rendered in rubber hose animation style.

item.title: This Sci-Fi RPG May Be Giving Mass Effect Some Serious Competition
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYExodus, developed by Archetype Entertainment, is poised to rival the beloved Mass Effect series. The similarities between Mass Effect and Exodus are apparent, with both games featuring third-person gameplay, squad mates, futuristic tech, cosmic mysteries, and interstellar politics. Exodus has an intriguing setting that may rival Mass Effect’s, taking place in the far future where humanity has settled in the Centauri Cluster and undergone transhuman evolution via genetic modification.

item.title: This Traitors US Season 2 Contestant Shockingly Rejected Offer To Join Show At First
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPhaedra Parks almost passed on joining The Traitors US season 2, but her mother’s encouragement convinced her to participate. Phaedra was excited to meet Dancing With The Stars’ Maks Chmerkovskiy and The Bachelor’s Peter Weber. As the game intensifies, Phaedra’s ability to conceal her identity from the Faithfuls may lead her to victory in The Traitors US season 2. Literature ReviewThe Traitors US season 2 has a cast of 21 celebrities, but one of them almost wasn’t on the show because they nearly rejected the offer.

item.title: Timothée Chalamet s Rumored New Role May Be His Weirdest Yet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTimothée Chalamet could potentially appear in Death Stranding 2, which may be his strangest role yet. Chalamet met with DS2 director Hideo Kojima at the Kojima Productions development office. There is no definite confirmation yet, but Chalamet’s visit to Kojima Productions hints at a possible cameo in the upcoming game, or even a role in the Death Stranding film adaptation. Literature ReviewTimothée Chalamet is no stranger to unusual parts, but he could be going weirder than ever in one potential project currently in the works.

item.title: Tips & Tricks To Beat Sierra In Pokémon GO (January 2024)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTeam GO Rocket Leader Sierra returns for trainers to face in Pokémon GO this January 2024 and using the right line-up is key to winning. You will need to beat Sierra, along with Cliff and Arlo to be able to challenge Team GO Boss Giovanni this January. Sierra’s team has changed in recent months, but she will pick from the same seven Pokémon that she had to choose from in December 2023.

item.title: TLOU Part 2 Remastered - Release Date, Price, & Biggest Changes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Last of Us Part 2 Remastered will be released on PlayStation 5 on January 19, 2024, with pre-orders starting on December 5. Existing owners of the game on PS4 can upgrade to the remastered version on PS5 for $10 at launch. The remastered version of the game will feature enhanced graphics options on PS5, including native 4K output, improved texture resolution, and faster loading times. The DualSense controller’s haptic feedback and adaptive triggers will also be utilized for better immersion.

item.title: TLOU2 7 Best Weapon Upgrades For The Most Badass Ellie
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewEllie’s obsessional pursuit of Abby in The Last Of Us Part II requires a good arsenal and strong upgrades to turn her into an apocalyptic warrior. Ellie has five upgradable weapons; the pistol, the rifle, the shotgun, the revolver, and the bow. Each fits well in different play styles, from stealthy approaches with the silent bow to violent brawls with the shotgun. Each weapon has a special upgrade that not only makes it easier to wield but improves the power fantasy of Ellie’s mission.

item.title: Today s Connections Answers & Categories For January 22, 2024 (Puzzle #225)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewConnections has players grouping words based on theme and the January 22nd edition is no different. Here are today’s categories and spoiled answers. Connections tasks players with making groups of four words that go together by a mystery category. There are 16 words to choose from in the beginning and as groups become solved the game gets easier and easier. If you’re having trouble with today’s collection of words we’ve provided some hints by revealing the categories below.

item.title: Today s Connections Answers & Categories For January 23, 2024 (Puzzle #226)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe January 23rd Connections puzzle is available to solve, and today’s categories might just trip up some fans of the long-running daily game. Connections has certainly worked its way into the daily routine of many players around the world and it’s the perfect companion to doing the daily Wordle. Get a nice cup of coffee and sit down to the two best New York Times daily puzzles.

item.title: Today s Wordle Answer & Hints For December 1, 2023 (Puzzle #895)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDecember 1st’s Wordle solution is not too hard to solve if players don’t get carried away and use random words in their first three attempts. Since there can be many possible answers, you will fare better with Wordle’s hard mode. When you discover the correct position of a few letters, it is imperative that you don’t get carried away and use random guesses. This mode prevents you from doing that, as it does not let you reuse confirmed letters in different spots.

item.title: Today s Wordle Answer & Hints For December 10, 2023 (Puzzle #904)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe Sunday Wordle isn’t too difficult, but if you need a little push in the right direction we’ve got the daily hints and fully spoiled answer. Wordle quickly became a staple in many players’ morning routines. Waking up to a nice cup of coffee and solving the daily puzzle is a fantastic way to start a day. Luckily, there are still plenty of 5-letter words that Wordle hasn’t used yet so the game shows no signs of stopping anytime soon.

item.title: Today s Wordle Answer & Hints For December 11, 2023 (Puzzle #905)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe newest Monday Wordle is available to solve. If you need help we’ve got some hints, and the fully spoiled answer, to today’s Wordle For those that prefer something more difficult, there is Wordle’s Hard Mode which locks in clues from previous guesses. This is also a great way to lower the number of attempts and daily game will take, but it does require a bit more brain power and a lot less guessing.

item.title: Today s Wordle Answer & Hints For December 12, 2023 (Puzzle #906)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe daily Wordle is ready to be solved, if you need a little help we’ve got some hints, and the fully spoiled answer, for the December 12th Wordle. Wordle has been popular for quite some time and its rise to fame happened quite quickly. Despite its simple premise, there are several Wordle tips and tricks that players can utilize to become better at the game. One of the most important ones is to have a consistent starting word.

item.title: Today s Wordle Answer & Hints For December 13, 2023 (Puzzle #907)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDecember 13th’s Wordle answer can be solved in less than six attempts if players use some relevant hints from the very beginning. Since Wordle’s hard mode does not let you use random words or reuse confirmed letters in different spots, it might be the best way to solve today’s Wordle answer. Since this mode is a bit more time-consuming, you can also use hints and solve the puzzle with a strategy that can be transferred over to the regular mode.

item.title: Today s Wordle Answer & Hints For December 14, 2023 (Puzzle #908)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDecember 14th’s Wordle answer is not the hardest to solve, but if players get carried away, they might easily lose their daily streak. To discover the correct positions of the two vowels, you can use Wordle’s hard mode. Once you discover the correct spots for the vowels, you cannot use them in different spots. This essentially forces players to use words that have similar spellings and can often result in players solving Wordle puzzles in less than six attempts.

item.title: Today s Wordle Answer & Hints For December 15, 2023 (Puzzle #909)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDecember 15th’s Wordle answer could cause players some trouble; however, some hints will help them solve it in less than six attempts. You can use Wordle’s hard mode to make sure you do not sacrifice your daily streak by using random attempts. Since this mode is a bit stricter and prevents players from reusing confirmed letters in different spots, you must be more strategic with your attempts. In the long run, this mode will help you develop skills that can be easily used in the regular mode.

item.title: Today s Wordle Answer & Hints For December 16, 2023 (Puzzle #910)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDecember 16th’s Wordle answer is quite easy to solve, and it is possible to solve it in less than six attempts or by using hints. You can also use Wordle’s hard mode to solve today’s answer if you are looking for an additional challenge. Since the answer is easier than previous Wordle answers, it might be prudent to use this mode to develop new strategies that you can transfer to the regular mode.

item.title: Today s Wordle Answer & Hints For December 17, 2023 (Puzzle #911)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSunday Wordle is up and ready to solve. Here are your daily hints, and fully spoiled answer, to the December 17th Wordle. There are many different tips and tricks to help solve Wordle puzzles. One of the more popular methods is to use two starting words which is a great way to cover all the vowels in one go. Word combos like IRATE and POUND hit a lot of the most common consonants and all of the major vowels.

item.title: Today s Wordle Answer & Hints For December 18, 2023 (Puzzle #912)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe new week brings a new Wordle and today’s answer shouldn’t be too difficult for most. Here are the daily hints, and fully spoiled answer. The popularity of Wordle came quickly when the game was first released and it’s easy to see why. The single, daily method of distribution and simplistic, yet addictive, gameplay was the perfect recipe to create internet buzz. Copycats of the game cropped up all over the place and there was even a fan who made a version of Wordle in LEGO.

This mode is best used for deciphering the correct positions of repeating letters, as this mode does not let you reuse confirmed letters in different spots.
